Name: Caribe Hilton
Description: The ever-iconic Caribe Hilton is situated on a 17-acre tropical peninsula with a secluded beach, near the Old San Juan historic district and a variety of top attractions. When you arrive at Caribe Hilton, you will find more than just a place to stay -- it is a place to come alive. With 652 recently renovated rooms and suites to choose from, discover a vacation that is as comfortable as it is memorable. Relax in a private beach cabana, learn to scuba dive or take a dip in our multi-tier oceanfront pool complex.

Name: Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa
Description: Set on a half-mile of private beach, amidst 20 acres of tropical gardens, Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa is the epitome of an elegant tropical hideaway.

Name: Barrachina Restaurant
Description: Located in Old San Juan, just one block from La Fortaleza, the restaurant has been catering to tourist and locals for over 40 years in the old city. The surrounding beauty of a colonial building over two centuries old with an interior courtyard and magnificent tropical foliage is the birthplace and home of the world-famous piña colada, where don Ramon Portas Mingot, first made the famous drink in 1963.

Name: Carabalí Rainforest Adventure Park
Description: Welcome to The Ultimate Caribbean Adventure. Located between the lush foothills of El Yunque National Rainforest and the crystal waters of the Atlantic Ocean, Carabalí Rainforest Adventure Park is an action-packed ranch and a favorite adventure destination in Puerto Rico. In addition to their legendary adventures, Carabalí Bar & Grill serves steaks, seafood and the best of Puerto Rican cuisine. There is a Gift Shop for purchasing accessories, souvenirs, clothes and more.

Name: Marmalade Restaurant & Wine Bar
Description: The best dining experiences I have ever had and it is a stylish looking place with Fusion, Eclectic, Contemporary-French and vegetarian-vegan cuisine. It has a great bar and bartenders with crafting drinks before or after the meal. Absolutely incredible food. Expert assistance from the waitstaff. Hours 5 p.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Emigrante Gastrobar
Description: Designed as a culinary adventure, our cuisine explores innovative ways of interacting with conventional ingredients merging modern and traditional techniques, while delivering ingenious presentations. A memorable experience.

Name: Cocina Abierta
Description: Some of the most delicious creative culinary servings are made in this marvelous restaurant. They offer exquisite dishes and great drinks.

Name: Fogo de Chao Churrascaria
Description: We are an authentic Brazilian steakhouse. Fogo de Chao features a variety of roasted meats, available immediately upon your request. We also have a gourmet market table with fresh vegetables and mixed salads and traditional side dishes such as potatoes, polenta, bananas and more.

Name: Santaella
Description: Jose Santaella is a prominent Puerto Rican chef, cookbook author, restaurant owner and caterer with more than 20 years of experience and a vast knowledge on both Puerto Rico’s gastronomy and international cuisine. From Puerto Rico, Miami, Barcelona, New York and San Francisco, Santaella has worked with globally acclaimed chefs, such as Ferran Adria (El Bulli), Eric Ripert (Le Bernadin) and Gary Danko. In July of 2011 he opened his first restaurant, Santaella, to much acclaim in the buzzing market/nightlife district of Placita.

Name: Princesa Cocina y Cultura
Description: We invite you to come and visit the first Gastrobar of Old San Juan specialized in rums of Puerto Rico. We offer to taste the Puerto Rican cuisine of 19th Century with Caribbean and International Fusions. If you want to enjoy and know the history of our rums and refreshing cocktails we are the best destination in the city. We are the only restaurant in Old San Juan where you'll be surrounded by trees and vegetation that make you feel the magic of the story behind the place.

Name: Mario Pagán Restaurant
Description: The menu is a creation of Chef Mario Pagán, which fuses international dishes with local products. They also have a private room for private functions.

Name: Sociedad Condal
Description: Specializing in Tapas and Montaditos, Condal is the ultimate in gourmet small plates. This little piece of Barcelona serves the highest quality cured hams and marinated fish on the island and a handful of lavish main courses like the made to order Paella Marinera for two. This two story restaurant offers table dining at the "tapas bar" or open air seating on the rooftop lounge. Exceptional professional service guides you through this open ended experience equally suited for one course or nine of them.

Name: La Casita de Rones de PR
Description: A charming venue housing two bars, a restaurant and shop, located in Plaza Dársenas in Old San Juan. A true gateway to world class rum cocktails and island-flavored gourmet dining, inspired by the storied Puerto Rican rum distilleries

Name: YOP Banquets
Description: Our dedicated team of professionals has more than 15 years of combined experience in the catering and events business. We work with great passion and an absolute focus on providing our customers the best service experience they can get, whether it’s a party for five or a gathering of thousands.

Name: Parador Guánica 1929
Description: History has never been so relaxing at the historic Parador Guánica 1929, a family-friendly inn offering comfortable accommodations and affordable “All-Inclusive” packages in the heart of Guánica Bay in southwestern Puerto Rico. Our 90-year-old Parador was witness to the turn of the century sugar cane industry on the island and you will discover first hand the true beauty of its relaxing vistas and charm.

Name: Kai Organic Bar
Description: Kai Organic Bar is revolutionizing juice bars with its local and organic focus. Enjoy wonderful combinations of salads or delicious açaí bowls.

Name: Bajuice
Description: This is the perfect place to start your cleansing diet with the BaJuice Detox Program. This all day juicing experience will help your digestive system while enjoying delicious natural mixes. They also offer fresh smoothies and fruit salads for those who are just stopping by.

Name: ASAO Smokehouse
Description: ASAO Smokehouse is a family-friendly restaurant located in the central mountain region of the island, specifically in the town of Ciales. Our excellent customer service, mouthwatering food, desserts, and our special cialeño seasoning, make us the best choice in the region. On Saturdays and Sundays, there is live music after 3:00 PM.

Name: Atlantico Pool Bar & Grill
Description: The Atlantic Pool Bar & Grill takes its name from the beautiful view of the Atlantic Ocean from which you can enjoy while you delight your palate with the varied menu. Located at the Caribe Hilton Hotel, the Atlantic Pool Bar and Grill offers a good time with family. Enjoy Hilton-style grilled food, fresh salads, sandwiches, among others.

Name: La Gota de Rojas
Description: Conveniently located just steps from Coamo's main plaza, La Gota de Rojas is known for its delicious Puerto Rican food and its family-friendly environment. There are daily happy hours and on occasion, they also have live music.

Name: San Juan Smokehouse
Description: This contemporary BBQ restaurant has some of the best pork in the area. San Juan Smokehouse combines the traditional with the new, offering delicious creative Puerto Rican cuisine with an American BBQ twist.

Name: Yamburger
Description: The star of these restaurants are specialty burgers served on craft breads. You can complement any burger with fried plantains or the house potatoes.

Name: Dinghy Dock
Description: Dinghy Dock’s main attraction is the amazing view of the dock. This is where you can arrive in your dinghy boat, sit just feet from the water and enjoy an ice cold beer accompanied by some tasty food in this open, airy and aesthetically pleasing environment.

Name: La Cava Restaurant
Description: Welcome to the newly-renovated and stylish La Cava restaurant, an innovative international concept from Executive Chef Dominik Wirz and the Hilton Ponce Culinary Team. The bar features high tables and exciting cocktails. Don Q Studio, a rustic private dining room filled with Don Q’s finest aged rums is available for small group celebrations among family, friends, or colleagues. La Cava’s main dining area is a sophisticated modern space with low lighting and relaxing music where you may choose from a variety of exquisite plates, including pasta, risotto, steaks and seafood.

Name: 1919 Restaurant
Description: Michelin Star-rated Executive Chef Juan José Cuevas believes in pairing social consciousness with exquisite taste. We place the highest value on hand-selecting products that are local, artisanal and homemade in order to craft food that is flavor-forward. Always fresh and with a contemporary flair, the food at Condado’s 1919 Restaurant is served with meticulous care and pride from our island kitchen to your table.

Name: Gylro
Description: Gylro has a kitchen exposed to the public, allowing a more transparent experience directing attention to our processes in the "BOH" (Back of the house). Come and visit us in the center of the town of Rincon.

Name: Aire Libre
Description: After an exciting adventure through Condado, you probably want to relax and enjoy a delicious meal. Aire Libre offers a great ambiance and typical Puerto Rican cuisine, just minutes away from Condado Beach.

Name: Café Restaurant El Camarón
Description: A perfect place to enjoy authentic Caribbean flavors. Try the Shrimp Mofongo garlic sauce paired with pressed natural juice.

Name: Biekes Bistro
Description: A crisp and clean menu that is designed to delight. Caribbean, Argentinian, and Seafood flavors that outshine the rest. Come try our extensive wine collection or the best rice & beans you’ve ever tried!

Name: Buenos Ayres Bar & Grill
Description: This Argentinean steakhouse has been a staple in Condado for 30 years. Located in the heart of Condado, Buenos Ayres is all about homemade, comforting, and delicious dishes, made with top of the line fresh produce. As a matter of fact, all meats are Certified Angus Beef cuts…every bite is an explosion of juice and flavor.

Name: Nagoya Japanese Cuisine
Description: Nagoya is a great sushi place for an after-hours fix! It's open most days until 3 AM. The sushi presentation is beautiful and very carefully prepared. Try the Ben Ben Roll... a very popular roll. Plus, don't worry about parking. There's valet service at Nagoya.

Name: Ferrari Gourmet Restaurante Argentino
Description: Known to be the home of the Pamperi in Puerto Rico, this restaurant mixes the flavors of the Caribbean with famous Argentinian food, making a delicious culinary fusion.

Name: La Receta Del Chef
Description: Live an unparalleled culinary experience! Enjoy exquisite dishes with cuts of white and red meats, and seafood in a quiet and family atmosphere.

Name: Mandarin House
Description: Mandarin House has some of the best and most authentic mandarin in the area. The menu highlights popular dishes such as, fried rice, dumplings, sushi, and more!

Name: Eight Noodle Bar
Description: The Eight Noodle Bar mostly specializes in sushi and drinks. There's great service and excellent food.

Name: PB Ysla Restaurant
Description: This is the only restaurant in the island by the prominent Puerto Rican chef José Mendín. PB Ysla offers a unique upscale dining experience where you can enjoy the flavors of the Caribbean with a European and Asian touch.

Name: Blue Hawaii - Humacao
Description: Blue Hawaii is an Asian Fusion hidden gem in Palmas del Mar that serves many dishes such as Pho, which are sure to blow your mind.

Name: ISUSHI Asian Bistro
Description: One of the best places for sushi in Puerto Rico. They serve fresh and creative Asian dishes at a modest price and the food is complemented by the cozy ambiance for everyone to enjoy.

Name: Metropol Restaurant & Bar – Isla Verde
Description: Fine dining, moderate prices, and the best Cuban food in Puerto Rico: what are you waiting for? Metropol has a great ambiance and even better food: try their tostones (green fried plantains) with shrimp and skirt steak, congrí rice-filled hen, or their scrumptious sliders. Founded in 1956 by a Cuban immigrant, Metropol stands as a symbol of tradition and excellent service.

Name: Al Gusto Deli
Description: If you want fresh and tasty sandwiches, stop by this exquisite local deli. They also offer traditional Puerto Rican dishes like rice and beans, in a casual and friendly environment.

Name: Isla Cueva
Description: Isla Cueva is the place for post-beach family eats. We offer a variety of options for everyone. From vegans to burger lovers. Our food is made with a Puerto Rican heart and playa state of mind. We are beer aficionados and serve up the best local and fresh beers of the island. Come get a taste of the weekend with us!

Name: Lechonera Los Amigos
Description: We have ample parking, live music, as well as the best family atmosphere. Come and try the best Roast pork: Our house specialty with the most delicious companions in Puerto Rico. We are located on the Luis A. Ferré Highway, Carr. #184, exit 32 of Guavate Cayey, Puerto Rico. We are your best alternative to Chinchorreo. We will wait for you.

Name: Chef's Creations
Description: Live cooking, fresh vegetables daily in a rustic patio; family-oriented and cozy atmosphere.

Name: Las Cabañas Doña Juana
Description: From the moment you get close to the Las Cabañas Doña Juana, you’ll feel right at home. For over 50 years, this restaurant has been serving delicious Puerto Rican food. The specialty at Las Cabañas Doña Juana is their famous ribs, which are cooked in a stone oven. Open on Saturdays and Sundays from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

Name: Sullivan BBQ
Description: Best BBQ you will try in San Juan in a familiar place and good taste of food.

Name: Georgies BBQ
Description: Georgies specializes in BBQ and Caribbean food served in a comfy environment with different menus each day. Georgies BBQ offers delicious seafood dishes and deserts like; flans, squash, vanilla, coconut, cheese, nutella and plantains. -Hours 12 a.m. - 12 a.m.

Name: El Bosquecito Familiar
Description: If you want to eat as if you were in some remote corner of the Island, but you don't want to go very far, El Bosquecito Familiar is your ideal restaurant. A very typical Creole place where you will find tasty food in a very familiar environment. Come and try the specialty of the house: Roasted Chicken, roast ribs, our tasty Morcilla, cuajito, guineitos, yucca, sweet potato, potato salad, elbow salad, rice with pigeon peas and much more. Come and visit us every day from 10:00 am in our two locations.

Name: La Vista Smokehouse
Description: La Vista Smokehouse offers true competition style brisket, ribs, pulled pork, wings, and grilled/smoked seafood. La Vista Smokehouse is a local cuisine of American and Caribbean food that offers a bar, barbecue, gluten-free options with a romantic scenic view that host large groups for special occasions. Hours: 11 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Rest. La Nueva Lechonera
Description: It's a Puerto Rican food Restaurant

Name: 4 Puntos Café Bar
Description: Known for its chic bohemian decor, 4 Puntos Café offers high quality brunch at an affordable price.

Name: Ola Ocean Front Bistro
Description: Ola Oceanfront Bistro provides exquisite and unique flavors of Puerto Rican cuisine; they offer dishes made from fresh local products that are served in a relaxed and family-friendly environment. They serve breakfast, brunch, lunch, and dinner as well as drinks and refreshers from Ola’s al fresco bar. Sunday brunch is available from 11 a.m. to 4 p.m. with live music.

Name: Brasas Restaurant - Hatillo
Description: Brasa's Restaurant combines the freshest and highest quality ingredients to please the most demanding palates with an international menu featuring steaks and seafood as their main dishes. -Hours: 11 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Restaurante Azul, Cocina de Autor
Description: Located inside Club Seabourne's main building, feel free to relax and enjoy a cup of coffee while recharging your energies taking a look at their beautiful gardens. The restaurant overlooks the pool and includes tables spaced for privacy. With a very tempting menu, the food is fresh and simply delicious. You can't miss your chance to try the spectacular huge lobster, just island style. It is definitely a special dinner treat when on Culebra island!

Name: La Pradera
Description: La Pradera offers a wide menu of Caribbean food in a casual and friendly atmosphere that is open from 6 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Al Caldero
Description: Al Caldero is a Caribbean restaurant that offers top quality Creole food. In addition to this, we have drinks and desserts to the delight of the people who visit us.

Name: La Bodega del Viejo San Juan
Description: La Bodega del Viejo San Juan is a Cuban-Puertorican restaurant-bar next to the imposing San Cristóbal Fort and one of the firsts things you notice when you enter, is the modern décor. They have hundreds of unintelligible scribbles that slash the walls, dozens of wine bottles suspended in mid-air that appear to be the contemporary equivalent of the chandelier causing strings of round; their little lightbulbs hang coquettishly from wall to wall. Seductive, yes, but not nearly as much as the Caribbean flavors that you’ll get to taste in this restaurant.

Name: Cafe Del Angel
Description: Sometimes it is hard to find authentic local food in a prominent touristic area but Café del Ángel is a pleasing exception. You can enjoy delicious Caribbean comfort food in a friendly and cozy environment. When visiting, ask for the "Mofongo de Churrasco", a local favorite that will not disappoint! Hours: 8 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Que Pasta
Description: "Que Pasta is located inside the Mall Plaza Las Americas in the 1t floor near JC Penny and serves Puerto Rican Chicken Pasta including, juicy bites of chicken, sautéed peppers and onions, perfect pasta to soak up a delicious sofrito-based broth! -Hours: 8 a.m. - 9 p.m. "

Name: Don Pepe Restaurant
Description: Don Pepe Restaurant is the best place on the north coast of P.R. to enjoy local seafood and Puerto Rican cuisine. We are located 5 minutes from Luquillo Beach and close to the Wyndham Rio Mar Resort. We offer a variety of tasty options in a family-style atmosphere so you can enjoy your evening! Additionally, we offer a catering service for a variety of activities along with a take-out service for your convenience. We have an area located on the second floor for private activities or parties. Thanks for your patronage and for dining with us!

Name: FOK Brewing Co
Description: After exploring with Craft Beer kits, where you mix all the premeasured ingredients with the right amount of water, boil them, cool them, add yeast, and ferment the beer... voilà!! Craft Beer from your garage, we decided it was time to start everything from scratch to see where that took us.

Name: Brújula
Description: Now Parguera has a "Brunch" place every day. Come and delight yourself with a different and rich breakfast. In addition, we please you with coffees and cocktails to your liking. You can also enjoy a day at the pool with our daily passes. Our space will take you to complement the different gastronomic and cocktail experience. We are open every day for breakfast "Brunch" from 8am to 11pm and for dinner from 3pm. We are located within the facilities of the Parguera Plaza Hotel.

Name: Taste from PR
Description: Taste from PR is more than just a restaurant; it is also a souvenir shop and when you start entering it seems like a cute little restaurant that has the exterior sitting area and then, the inside part of it.  When you enter the restaurant, what is around you by the walls, are souvenirs, crafts and in the background is the bar. Just like the name says, in this place, you will have a taste of Puerto Rico from the food and drinks to the little reminder craft. The restaurant serves appetizers and fritters, mofongo, mash potato, tostones, among others.

Name: El Tapatio
Description: A family business since 1994. Come and try authentic Mexican food in a cheerful and familiar atmosphere. Our menu includes dishes such as burritos, tacos, quesadillas, fajitas, chimichangas, meat al pastor, tamales, pozole, among others.

Name: El Alambique
Description: El Alambique Beach Front Bar and Grill is a small restaurant with an ocean view surrounded by big buildings that illuminate the Isla Verde area, not just because of the structure but, because of the environment that each one carries and identifies it. The restaurant serves delicious food from breakfast to dinner in a cool relax ambiance. They have a regular menu and another special one that usually changes daily. The menu goes from delightful seafood, flatbread pizza, creole food, and the list keep going.

Name: Avocado Cocina Local & Patio Bar
Description: Avocado Cocina Local & Patio Bar is inspired by more than a creamy avocado fruit - our concept was created to take local cuisine to the next level.  Avocado Cocina Local & Patio Bar hours- 11:30 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Buns Burger Shop - Condado
Description: Founded by Bengie and Fidel in 2011, two young entrepreneurs with a passion for simplicity and tasty food. Together they established the philosophies that drive our corporate mission statement: NO BS in the Burger Shop. Focused on the Freshest high-quality ingredients. Working hard every day to serve the juiciest Burgers and provide the Best service in a friendly environment for the people. Nobody does it better than Buns Burger Shop.

Name: Buns Burger Shop - Old San Juan
Description: Founded by Bengie and Fidel in 2011, two young entrepreneurs with a passion for simplicity and tasty food. Together they established the philosophies that drive our corporate mission statement: NO BS in the Burger Shop. Focused on the Freshest high-quality ingredients. Working hard every day to serve the juiciest Burgers and provide the Best service in a friendly environment for the people. Nobody does it better than Buns Burger Shop.

Name: Olajas Bar & Grill
Description: A unique beachfront restaurant located on Aguada's coast. Every Sunday there's live music played by our resident DJ, making our spot the perfect place to visit on a Sunday afternoon. Our menu presents the best of Puerto Rico's coastal cuisine at an affordable price.

Name: Bocaito Bar & Restaurant
Description: Inspired by creative cuisine from 2014, Bocaito offers a wide variety of gastronomy options. They carry a selection of wines, artisanal beers, and house cocktails. Join the fun experience of Bocaito in Vega Baja.

Name: Peña Blanca Restaurant
Description: Peña Blanca is a specialist in serving Puerto Rican-style fish and shellfish, for example “La Peña”, a plantain, yucca and yellow mofongo stuffed with shrimp, fish, octopus, squid and other mollusks in a tasty white sauce. Although our specialty is seafood, we have several top-quality cuts of meat, poultry, rice dishes, and even pizza. We are located off the coast of Aguadilla.

Name: Mahi Mahi Restaurant & Bar
Description: The good seafood has an exquisite smell! Pleasant, fresh and penetrating flavor. You will taste when you try Mahi Mahi Restaurant & Bar's fresh mahi-mahi, served by one of our friendly waiters. Ask for our red snapper, halibut or lobster with delicious mofongo done at the moment just for you. You can accompany it with your favorite beer drink or our famous mojito in the perfect beach atmosphere to enjoy your best moments. Wait until you try our steak filled with chicken, sweet plantains and mozzarella cheese. Do you want it with rice or fries?

Name: El Bohio Sports And Pool Bar
Description: You won't have to stray far from your sun lounger to find a cool drink at this laid-back Ponce bar. Overlooking the pool deck, Hilton Ponce Golf & Casino Resort's cabana-style bar serves popular rum cocktails, and a varied menu of snacks, light meals, salads, favorite sandwiches and artisanal pizzas. Order them as you sunbathe or sit in the shade under an umbrella and watch sport on our LCD TVs and a jumbotron.

Name: Tablado Del Sol Bar & Grill
Description: Best Homemade Burgers at Juana Diaz.

Name: El Grifo Craft Beer & Vegan Joint
Description: Located in the urban center of Caguas, El Grifo is a craft beer and vegan joint. Aside from their extensive craft beer selection and plant-based menu, the team at El Grifo also offer multiple cooking classes throughout the year. El Grifo is also described as a collectives transformation multi-project rooted in plant-based culture, local production and sustainable planning.

Name: ZALZA Mexican Creole
Description: A combination of Mexican food with the touch and Puerto Rican flavor made with style! You can also enjoy good Creole food.- ZALZA

Name: Brasas Restaurant Bar & Grill
Description: Brasas Bar & Grill is a restaurant with a daily breakfast and lunch atmosphere and a nightlife that includes live music, tapas, and events.- Hours 9 and 11 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Ocean Front Hotel & Rest
Description: Our restaurant is just steps above the waves and on the beach. Featuring open-air & fine dining with a spectacular view of the sea. Ocean Front is an ideal spot to catch a spectacular sunset. The inventive

Name: Dulce & La Fonda
Description: Dulce & La Fonda creates dishes that are as scrumptious as they are beautiful. If you had to choose a place with great atmosphere, attentive service and Criollo dishes that look and taste like works of art, this is the place! -Hours 11 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Buns Burger Shop - Guaynabo
Description: Founded by Bengie and Fidel in 2011, two young entrepreneurs with a passion for simplicity and tasty food. Together they established the philosophies that drive our corporate mission statement: NO BS in the Burger Shop. Focused on the Freshest high-quality ingredients. Working hard every day to serve the juiciest Burgers and provide the Best service in a friendly environment for the people. Nobody does it better than Buns Burger Shop.

Name: Casa Vieja
Description: A small and quaint restaurant that's hidden away in the mountains of Ciales. Casa Vieja specializes in traditional Puerto Rican cuisine that pays homage to Puerto Rican "abuelitas" and their kitchen secrets.

Name: Martin's Pizzeria
Description: Pizzeria specializes in all kinds of pizzas, Calzones, and Lasagna. Family atmosphere and music.

Name: Sage Steak Loft
Description: Come and enjoy the amazing food that Sage Steak Loft has to offer, with different cuts of meats in a romantic place with an ocean view. - Hours 6 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Dondesea
Description: Dondesea stands by its slogan of burgers, beers, and bites, with a delicious menu offering just that... and more! The place is ideal for watching sports and having a beer with some friends after work.

Name: Bebo's Cafe
Description: Sometimes Bebo’s Café seems small because it is almost always full of people. It has a variety of food options which leads to a diversity of people. It looks like your ordinary Puerto Rican Café but, it is a delightful place where people keep confiding in its service. -Hours 7 a.m. - 12 p.m.

Name: De Jesús Restaurant
Description: Chef Jesus Arroyo and his delicious food are known throughout Puerto Rico.

Name: Boronía
Description: Boronía offers creative Caribbean cuisine. They serve fresh dishes such as the catch of the day that are made with a unique touch. -Hours 8 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Red Flamboyan
Description: Red Flamboyan brings as a concept Creole and international food. That includes mofongos, paella, pasta, salads, seafood, meat, fresh fish and more.It is right next to the sea, and the mountain breeze makes it a unique experience.- Red Flamboyan Rest in Rincón. -Hours 1 and 5 p.m. - 10 p.m

Name: Holly's Restaurant & Pizza
Description: Located in the mountains of Barranquitas and close to the neighboring towns of Naranjito and Corozal, our restaurant has been serving patrons with the highest quality food for over 30 years. We specialize in delicious pizza and exquisite and very creative dishes, made with fish, lobster, chicken and red meats of the best quality.

Name: Cosecha Restaurant & Pizza
Description: Cosecha Restaurant & Pizza's mission is to offer our visitors a quality service so that they can enjoy a gastronomic experience of excellence. -Hours 11 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Restaurante Lake View
Description: A peninsula on the shores of Lake Caonillas. Come and enjoy our menu, cocktails, cold beers and our famous spectacular view of the lake. -Lake View Bar & Rest. -Hours 10 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Via Appia's Italian Deli
Description: Via Appia's Italian Deli has a great variety of Italian dishes, from pizza to exquisite pasta. The food is complemented by an extensive menu of wine offering and the upscale service. -Hours 11 a.m. - 11:30 p.m.

Name: Pamela's Caribbean Cuisine
Description: Pamela's Caribbean Cuisine offers a unique twist of some Caribbean favorites. You can enjoy the ocean view and have your feet in the sand while enjoying an upscale dining experience. -Hours 5 p.m. - 5:30 a.m. only on Monday

Name: Restaurante Bolitas By Chef Amaury
Description: A concept by Chef Amaury where he compiles several recipes from his years of experience to form what is BOLITAS by Chef Amaury where the specialty will be banana mofongo balls, cassava mofongo and tifongo with other meats in guava or BBQ and guava sauce.

Name: La Cueva del Mar - Guaynabo
Description: La Cueva del Mar Restaurant specializes in seafood dishes prepared in the Island's distinctive “criollo” style. If you're craving fresh seafood then this is the place to visit. The menu also includes beef, pork and chicken dishes.

Name: La Cueva Del Mar - Hato Rey
Description: La Cueva del Mar Restaurant specializes in seafood dishes prepared in the Island's distinctive “criollo” style. If you're craving fresh seafood then this is the place to visit. The menu also includes beef, pork and chicken dishes.

Name: Restaurante el Galeón
Description: Located on a scenic beachfront locale, El Galeón is a family-friendly restaurant in Aguada. El Galeón specializes in fresh seafood and meats.

Name: La Casita Blanca
Description: La Casita Blanca, or “The Little White House,” is one of the most authentic, traditional dining spots in Santurce. With its delightfully old-school setting, the restaurant embodies the essence of a traditional Puerto Rican fonda—a casual and affordable family-run establishment that serves delicious local comfort food such as stewed beef with rice and beans and codfish. It is the first restaurant on the Island to receive the James Beard Foundation Restaurant and Chef America's Class Award – South Zone. Hours 11:30 a.m. - 9:00 p.m.

Name: Molini's Nature Cusine
Description: Servings of Puerto Rico traditional dishes and many other Caribbean foods, Molini's Nature Cusine is known to make delicious sangrias. -Hours 7 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Restaurante La Sombra y Longaniza Doña María
Description: At La Sombra, we've been serving mouthwatering "longanizas" since 1934. To this day, we use our family's original recipe and prepare our "longanizas" fresh every day.

Name: Ropa Vieja Grill
Description: This popular restaurant exhibits Caribbean pride and flavor through their delicious Cuban Puerto Rican fusion. While visiting, try the veal tail in Cuban sauce or the "Island Mojo", a steak served in an exquisite house sauce. -Hours 11:30 a.m. - 10:30 p.m..

Name: Sancho's Sushi Bar
Description: Located on the ground floor of the Costa Caribe Clubhouse, this casual dining experience offers a contemporary fusion of Chinese cuisine and the freshest dishes complemented by sushi and sashimi. Savor the first Teppanyaki Grill in Ponce in a relaxed atmosphere of this sushi bar overlooking the pool and the sea. A very nice option for a light meal and cocktails.

Name: Tatami Sushi
Description: Fresh exquisite food in this restaurant, specializing in sushi and among other rolls.

Name: Hacienda Tres Ángeles
Description: At Hacienda Tres Ángeles, a hidden gem tucked into the mountains of Adjuntas, you can enjoy a cup of coffee on their spacious deck while admiring the mesmerizing view of the coffee plantation below. Their coffee is one of the finest Specialty Coffees of the World, as recognized by the United Nations World Tourism Association. Don't miss out on this unique experience!

Name: Pirilo Pizza Rústica - Dorado
Description: Pirilo Pizza Rústica is a staple pizzeria in Puerto Rico with locations in Old San Juan, Ocean Park, and Dorado. They specialize in rustic-style pizzas, with an ample selection of artisanal beer, both local and international including tapas. -Hours 12:00 p.m. - 2:00 a.m.

Name: El Campo Es Leña
Description: This pizzeria in the mountains of Adjuntas specializes in wood fire pizza.

Name: Marcelo Restaurant
Description: Marcelo Restaurant in Caguas specializes in Cuban, "criollo," and international food. We have a lunch and dinner menu, to-go trays, hors d'oeuvres, wines, and catering service.

Name: Cinco Restaurant
Description: Cinco stands out on its menu international cuisine with influences from Puerto Rican cuisine. The decoration is elegant and modern. Its menu includes cuts of meat, seafood, pasta, pizza and local food, served in an innovative way and paired with updated cocktails and a short but successful wine list.

Name: La Casita Restaurant
Description: Chef Javier serves delicious dishes prepared with fresh ingredients. His specialty is the Puerto Rican food specially the Churrasco. Visit us in the beautiful town of Jayuya.

Name: El Manjar Criollo
Description: Locals love this “criollo” restaurant in Caguas. Doña Mery's cuisine and dishes are a fusion of haute cuisine and local ingredients. El Manjar Criollo is a welcoming place full of flavor and the best add-on to your visit to Caguas.

Name: Essencia
Description: Essencia is a Puerto Rican restaurant with a wide variety of dishes for all tastes. We specialize in seafood and creative Creole food.

Name: El Rancho Restaurant
Description: Restaurant located in Caguas, Puerto Rico.

Name: Annie's Place
Description: We are located right along Combate Beach in Cabo Rojo. Our restaurant has been serving the freshest seafood since 1974. In addition to seafood, our menu also includes burgers, brunch, and our famous "empanadillas" (Puerto Rican turnovers). Visit us and enjoy one of Cabo Rojo's best sunset spots.

Name: Restaurante Picoteo
Description: Perfect ambiance after a long day at the beach to kick off your sandals and relax with a warm bowl of fish soup. Then enjoy some refreshing drinks and lose yourself to the rhythm of the tropical salsa music. If you are up to it, salsa orchestras play on the weekends so you can spin and turn your night away with a mojito in your hand. - Hours 11 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: El Mesón De Melquíades
Description: Beautiful restaurant nestled high-up in the mountains of Cayey.

Name: El Fogón de Abuela
Description: At El Fogón De Abuela Restaurant, we have been serving the finest Puerto Rican cuisine for the last 25 years, with a stunning ocean view. The menu boasts a variety of mouthwatering dishes including Mofongo, seafood, burgers and a range of delightful piña colada flavors.

Name: RokaDura Wine & Grill
Description: A family style restaurant. We serve delicious food from Thursday to Sunday. located in the beautiful mountains of the town of Orocovis just minutes away from the TORO VERDE Zip line.

Name: Restaurante Fogón De Victor
Description: El Fogón de Víctor "El original" Caribbean Restaurant in Humacao, Puerto Rico - Rated 4.9 based on 8 Reviews " The food is delicious served in a safe and warm environment. Hours 7 a.m. - 6 p.m

Name: Restaurante El Taíno
Description: Hall Of Social Events Only, Restaurant is still closed to the public. 6/01/2018

Name: Lechonera El Nuevo Rancho
Description: Located in Puerto Rico's famous pork-route, El Nuevo Ranche specializes in serving mouthwatering roasted pork and traditional Puerto Rican dishes like rice with pigeon peas and blood sausage.

Name: Aventura 4x4 con Sabor a Campo
Description: Finca privada donde puedes tener la experiencia de recorrer 200 cuerdas en tu vehiculo 4x4. Las rutas tienen diferentes niveles de dificultad en las cuales pueden disfrutar de diferentes vistas. En una de las montañas tenemos un local donde puede llegar a disfrutar de nuestra comida en un ambiente completamente familiar. Nos especializamos en el fricasé de cabro con arroz con tocino. Abrimos sábados, domingos y cada tercer lunes de mes.

Name: Kai Beach Bar and Rest
Description: Beachfront views, fresh seafood, and great drinks await you at Kai Beach Bar & Rest. in Isabela.

Name: Star Fish Restaurant
Description: Star Fish Restaurant is located on the grounds of the Fajardo Inn Resort. Any stay at our Fajardo lodging puts you only a short stroll away from this elegant Fajardo, Puerto Rico dining experience! Here you have the choice of dining inside or outside on the veranda overlooking the pool, the Atlantic Ocean and our gardens. Each evening features one of our Chefs’ specialty dishes, which always include a Puerto Rican or Caribbean influence. Come enjoy this delightful restaurant in Fajardo during your stay without having to leave the Inn!

Name: Hotties Restaurant & Bar
Description: Hotties Restaurant & Bar, located in Isla Verde, welcomes you with a warm and friendly atmosphere. Their hot and tasty menu make this a great restaurant to visit. Their list of dishes includes appetizers, juicy grilled meats, seafood, salads, and other deliciousness. For cocktail lovers, they also serve special drinks, wine, and beer. The bar at Hotties is also the perfect place for sports events and if you want to see sports competitions, Hotties is the ideal place to enjoy it with your favorite beer combined with the perfect appetizer and good service.

Name: Cayo Caribe - San Patricio
Description: Cayo Caribe serves one of the best Caribbean food and seafood in the area. The best part is its modest prices and extensive offering. You can choose to enjoy your food in the outdoor patio or, in the indoor venue. -Hours: 11 a.m. - 9:30 p.m.

Name: El Negocio de Panchi
Description: El Negocio de Panchi offers its patrons a unique gastronomic experience in a family-friendly environment. Our menu is varied and it specializes in fresh meats and seafood. Our mission is a simple one— prepare delicious and memorable dishes. Some of our most popular dishes include mushrooms stuffed with prosciutto and manchego cheese, crab cakes, escargot puff pastry, among others. Due to the high volume of patrons we received, reservations are required.

Name: Charlie's Bar & Grill
Description: Charlie's Bar & Grill offers some of the best tacos in all of Puerto Rico. If that isn't enough to reel you in the local atmosphere that is accompanied by live music then, join domino games which is another selling point of the restaurant.

Name: La Mordida Taqueria Mexicana
Description: "Restaurante de Comida Mexicana auténtica, con un ambiente familiar. Contamos Con: Salón con aire acondicionado Espacio al aire libre Buena música Excelente servicio al cliente Excelente comida Ubicación perfecta en el mismo Pueblo de Caguas"

Name: Heather's Pizza
Description: Serving the best pizza in Culebra done by the best local pizzaiolos since 1998. Heather’s Pizza is the perfect place to stop for a simple yet delicious meal to get a feel of an array of local flavors of pizza, daiquiris, and mojitos.  What’s a better way to finish off a day full of amazing beaches, sand and sunbathing than at this fresh and fun place! -Hours: 10:30 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Puttanesca Italian Trattoria
Description: Enjoy an exquisite menu of pizzas and beers while listening to rock music from the '80s. Open 11 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Campioni Pizza Birra & Tapas
Description: Campioni Pizza offers the best wood-fired pizzas that range from classic cheese pizza to the most creative and delicious combinations you have ever tasted. They offer crispy edges with fresh ingredients and dough is prepared daily for freshness! -Open 11:30 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Restaurante María Bonita
Description: Enjoy Mexican cuisine in the South of Puerto Rico.

Name: La Mina Mexicana
Description: Mexican restaurant located in Toa Baja, Puerto Rico.

Name: Panuchos
Description: Panuchos offers a Mexican traditional menu with one of the best margaritas in San Juan. Panuchos is the place to go, from a great lunch tonight munchies. -Open  11 a. am. - 11 p.m.

Name: Pirilo Pizza Rústica - Old San Juan
Description: Pirilo Pizza Rústica is a staple pizzeria in Puerto Rico with locations in Old San Juan, Ocean Park, and Dorado. They specialize in rustic-style pizzas and offer an ample selection of artisanal beer both, local and international that includes tapas. - Open 11:30 a.m. - 2 a.m.

Name: Tasca El Pescador
Description: "Somos una empresa Familiar, establecida desde 1995, buscando satisfacer al paladar puertorriqueño y a los turistas que visitan nuestra bella isla del encanto, P.R. Queremos llevar los mejores y más frescos productos que el mar nos provee a través de nuestros Pescadores ,al igual que los productos más frescos que los agricultores locales nos producen de la tierra. Para satisfacer a nuestros comensales."

Name: Cortadito 787 Café Bar & Deli
Description: Cortadito 787 is a bar, deli and coffee shop all in one! Well-known for its delectable food and amazing atmosphere, if you are near Palmas del Mar, this is a must-stop for you!

Name: El Roble Restaurant
Description: This restaurant serves delicious sea food. The prices are affordable and they have dependable service.

Name: La Estación
Description: Our Nuyorican BBQ mixes traditional BBQ technique with Caribbean Flavors. We cook on open fires of wood smoke and natural charcoal with ingredients sourced from local farms and waters. We blend our own spices and make all dressings and sauces on site. We support the island’s farmers, fishermen and commerce to offer you a unique truly local experience.

Name: La Monserrate Sea Port Restaurant
Description: Our restaurant has an open-air seating area.

Name: Paisajes Curet
Description: Restaurante con una espectacular vista al Mar Caribe. Nos especializamos en comida criolla y mariscos. Gran ambiente familiar, espacio acogedor y lo mejor es que la combinación de sabores las tienen nuestros platos. Toda una experiencia, todo en un mismo lugar.

Name: El Quenepo - San Juan
Description: El Quenepo is the essence of a traditional cafe offering delicious local favorites like triplet sandwiches and pastelones. Visit and experience their unique favorites with family and friends! - Hours: 5:30 p.m. - 9:30 p.m.

Name: Made in Puerto Rico
Description: With excellent food, serving some of the most delicious typical food from our very own Puerto Rico.

Name: Restaurant Star Light
Description: Since 1967, Restaurant Star Light has been located in the town of Adjuntas offering fresh and quality products from local farms so we can guarantee that our preparations are of a high level. We are known for offering unique flavors, that when you try each bite you feel pleasure by delighting in a festival of unique sensations on your palate. Visit us and it will be your safe stop!

Name: Restaurante el Jibarito
Description: Restaurante el Jibarito is a family restaurant and also an antique museum. It specializes in wings stuffed with shrimp, crab or ham and cheese. Since 1994! -Hours: 11 a.m. - 9 p.m.

Name: Daniel's Seafood
Description: Daniel's Seafood has been serving the community of Punta Santiago and its visitors since 1986 when Daniel Ramírez and his family opened the restaurant's door for the first time. Come enjoy the freshest seafood in a family-friendly environment and attended by the attentive and cordial service of our team.

Name: Restaurante Kaplash
Description: Enjoy the best seafood turnovers on the island with an amazing view. If you're not convinced? How about some hot and fresh lobster turnovers? Or, a conch salad? Come by and discover more of our food served by our marvelous staff. -Hours: 11 a.m. - 9 p.m.

Name: C. Bar Kitchen in Style
Description: C. Bar Kitchen in Style is an attractive restaurant near Palmas del Mar, Humacao offers delicious Criollo food. It also has a wonderful view and an outside area. Hours: 5 p.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Cayo Caribe - Condado
Description: Cayo Caribe serves one of the best Caribbean food and seafood in the area. The best part is its modest prices and extensive offering. You can choose to enjoy your food in the outdoor patio or, in the indoor venue. -Hours: 11 a.m. - 9:30 p.m.

Name: Casa Blanca Bar & Grill
Description: Barra y restaurante auténtico puertorriqueño con un ambiente familiar. Puertorican restaurant & bar with a good space for families.

Name: El Platanal del Chef David
Description: El Platanal Del Chef David has been serving Puerto Rico with the best Agricultural Fairs and Festivals for 20 years and it is recognized for its long lines and original creator of the "Filled Arañitas"- The Restaurant El Platanal del Chef David is open from 10 a.m - 10 p.m.

Name: Salitre Mesón Costero
Description: Salitre Meson Costero is a full-service restaurant located in front of the Atlantic Ocean on road PR-681 Km. 3.8 Islote Ward in Arecibo, Puerto Rico. Only 50 minutes from the San Juan Metro Area and 10 minutes off exit 71 of the De Diego Expressway Road PR-22. We are minutes away from local tourist attractions like Arecibo Lighthouse and Cueva del Indio among others. Our specialty is local fresh seafood plus prime meats and a wide variety of small plates. We showcase the largest selections of wines and a full-service private bar overlooking the ocean.

Name: Pa' Pical Bar
Description: Are you craving for some “picaderas” or some seafood “empanadillas” (turnovers) or, maybe, a heavier lunch from local food? Then, Pa’ Pical is one of the best “chinchorro” in the city! It is a place near the beach, located in Isla Verde and it has affordable prices with happy hours and an extended menu. One of their best-selling items is, their crispy fish tacos; they also serve some tasty turnovers (empanadillas) stuffed with lobster, shrimp or fish and you can order pizza or anything else you want.

Name: Cafe del Parque
Description: They Serve Caribbean food, sandwiches, coffee and among other types of food, with music and even a DJ on Saturdays.

Name: Italian House & Grill Il Nonno
Description: A creative fusion of Puerto Rican and Italian cuisines. Italian House and Grill is a cozy environment with the beach close by. Try their amazing pizzas, the avocado risotto, their delicious filet mignon (which is to die for) and enjoy a romantic dinner in sunny Isla Verde.

Name: Bier Garden
Description: Bier Garden is an innovative concept. They have a restaurant, bar, lounge area and a cozy patio in the center of the island. They serve rich food, a variety of local and imported beers, craft beers on tap and other delicacies.

Name: Chihuahua Tex Mex Cantina
Description: If you're looking for a great Mexican place in Palmas, you've come to the right place! Chihuahua Tex Mex Cantina offers tacos, alongside it's their fondue. The restaurant is a joy for happy hours and sports events. -Hours: 4 p.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Alla Vecchia Rotonda
Description: Italian restaurant with a family atmosphere, specializing in pastas and handmade pizzas made by the chef Alessandro Brandi.

Name: Si no corro me pizza
Description: An Italian restaurant with a 100-year-old artisan pizza recipe. Si No Corro Me Pizza is a complete experience, from the moment you set foot in the restaurant until you get your order at your table, you can feel the passion and creativeness in the atmosphere. Hours 5 p.m - 10 p.m. re.

Name: Pueblas Crepas Mexican Grill - El Monte Plaza
Description: In Puebla Crepas Mexican Grill, you can enjoy the freshness of Mexican cuisine with a French touch in a refreshing environment, where music, family sharing, and excellent service is our greatest satisfaction.

Name: Pizzeria Al Forno Pasta & Grill
Description: Pizzeria Al Forno Pasta & Grill is a 100% Puerto Rican family business that is happy to collaborate with local families. Their dishes are all made in the house and contain organic spices obtaining a fresh and different flavor. So, I invite you to come and enjoy a great meal. - Hours: 11 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Café Museo el Yagrumo
Description: Come and visit our spectacular establishment full of great stories and antiques that will make you visit the past. We have a comfortable area for the enjoyment of our customers. We have a specific menu where we stand out for our delicious fried meat and our exquisite trifongo balls. Visit us from Friday to Sunday so that you have the best experience and eat the best Puerto Rican food in your visit to the town of Corozal.

Name: Mickey's Restaurant
Description: Specialty in seafood gastronomy.

Name: Zaco's Tacos
Description: If you’re looking to enjoy a good mix of culinary dishes with genuine Mexican style then, Zaco’s Tacos is the place to go! They offer great food in a fun environment and location with the best prices. They have great food as their signature dish, Fish Tacos or Pork Belly Tacos and great drinks, all in a laid back and funky spot. -Hours: 12 p.m. - 9 p.m.

Name: Tijuana's Bar & Grill - San Juan
Description: Tijuana's Bar & Grill offers a fun, Mexican cantina-vibe in the heart of the Caribbean where you can enjoy authentic margaritas as well as tapas and, their specialty shrimp while listening to live Mariachi. -Hours: 11 a.m. - 12 a.m.

Name: Michael Pizza & Helados
Description: Michael Pizza mostly specializes in pizzas, calzones and ice cream treats.- Hours 7 a.m. - 12 p.m.

Name: Asahi Sushi Bar
Description: The oriental cuisine meets the Puerto Rican gastronomy in this sushi bar. If you are ever in the mood for sushi or smashed plantain with an oriental touch, Asahi is the place. With a grand variety of rolls and oriental plates, the restaurant also offers Puerto Rican dishes. The staff is very friendly and is always available to advise you on what to order. Additionally, the restaurant offers beers or alcoholic beverages to accompany all your cravings. -Hours 11:30 a.m. - 11:30 p.m except, Saturdays and Sundays.

Name: Tacos y Burritos Arasibo
Description: New restaurant with the true Mexican flavor. The best tacos and burritos and tasty fresh waters. On the ground floor of the public square of Arecibo. - Hours 11 a.m. - 10 a.m.

Name: Loiza 2050
Description: Bimathe Pizza Loiza 2050 has been in business for more than twenty-six years. People line up for their famously-known light and crispy pizzas that is prepared off the secret recipe of Dona Maria and Dona Rosa! -Hours 5 p.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: La Social
Description: La Social is a Bistro, Boutique and Beauty Bar located in Condado. -Hours 8 a.m. - 6 p.m.

Name: Pizzaiolo
Description: With their specialty being on Brazilian food, in this restaurant, you’ll find some of the most spectacular dishes, with a unique view and amazing decorations.. -Hours 9:30 a.m. - 9:30 p.m.

Name: Sazón - Monte Plaza
Description: Sazón Monte Plaza is a cozy terrace where you can enjoy delicious food and a tasty cocktail 7 days a week, and brunch on the weekends. It's ideal for the whole family.

Name: Tostado
Description: Excellent food quality, Tostado offers many dishes to choose from, burgers, breakfast, coffee and sandwiches.

Name: Marea Coffee Lounge
Description: A chill vibe with a warm smile and hot coffee is the perfect morning spot. Marea Coffee Lounge is that spot. In Isla Verde, this new coffee lounge will allow you to enjoy a delicious breakfast with a strong cup of coffee to start the morning the right way. Enjoy their mocha coffee! It is made with natural cocoa and real coffee beans. Mix this with their pancakes with Nutella, whipped cream and fruits. But if you are feeling a little bit braver – and hungrier- try their unique selections of hamburgers.Marea Coffee Lounge is not only for those looking for a gastronomic experience.

Name: Chocobar Cortés
Description: The smell of hot chocolate permeates the entire restaurant. Glass cups are filled with rich, creamy chocolate creations: hot chocolate, frozen chocolate frappé, lattes with chocolate, the rum, and cognac-based Don Ignacio, and many more. Welcome to Chocobar Cortés, an innovative gastronomic space where chocolate is incorporated into almost every dish and beverage. The space also celebrates the rich history of Chocolate Cortés, a family-owned company that has been manufacturing chocolate from farm-to-bar since 1929, and is a favorite of Puerto Rican and Dominican households.

Name: Ekelekua
Description: Enjoy brunch until 3pm at Ekelekua. There are also weekday lunch specials, beer and wine. Happy hour is on Thursday through Sunday from 5pm to close.

Name: Las Vistas Café
Description: Las Vistas is an outdoor Cafe, just minutes away from El Conquistador Resort, and sitting on top of a hill overlooking all of Las Croabas surroundings in Fajardo. Privileged with a 360° panorama, you can enjoy breathtaking views to Las Croabas Bay, Seven Seas Beach, the Islands of Vieques and Culebra, Historic Fajardo Lighthouse, and the Bioluminescent Bay.

Name: Café Berlín
Description: Café Berlin is a lovely sidewalk café with outdoor seating and a full view of the Plaza Colón that gives it a somewhat European feel. But once inside, you’ll see that this restaurant is the perfect fusion between the Old and the New Worlds. From Mofongo to Spinach Quiche, Café Berlin treats you to the best of both worlds. And if you’re vegan or vegetarian, you’re in for a treat! This café has one of the most complete vegan/vegetarian and gluten-free menus around town.

Name: Bistro Café
Description: Bistro Café is a small and cozy breakfast and lunch restaurant, but great in its delights. It is the perfect place to go with friends and family to have great conversations and a good time while savoring a delicious coffee or eating their unique French toasts with Nutella and fruits. You can also have a good omelet or scrambled eggs with any of your favorite ingredients that sparkle your day with some awesome mimosas of flavors like passion fruit, guanábana (soursop), and acerola (hawthorn berry).

Name: Pinky's
Description: A local favorite, Pinky's is famous for their delicious healthy options and for serving a breakfast menu All Day. The restaurant is perfect for those looking for a fun an healthy alternative with a local twist.  Hours 7 a.m. - 4 p.m.

Name: Rotisserie II Giardino
Description: Rotisserie II Giardino offers you a wonderful view of the sea and an excellent menu in a romantic space.

Name: Rest. The Boutique Cafe & Lounge
Description: Enjoy our excellent service with tapas or a brunch menu while you are in the company of your family and friends. Hours -8 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Café Pierre
Description: Café Pierre will entice your palate with its International Cuisine enhanced with a touch of Puerto Rican flair, offering a variety of specials for breakfast, lunch, and dinner in an upscale dining ambiance. From fresh Bistro Salads to succulent skirt steak, Café Pierre is truly a superb dining experience. Located in the Hotel Lobby of Doubletree by Hilton San Juan. Hours - 6 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Name: Isla Nena Cafe
Description: You'll be pleasantly surprised by the tasty food that this roadside open-air cafe serves in Vieques.

Name: Di Zucchero Restaurant and Lounge
Description: This restaurant is considered a mix of Latin-American and European food, very lively and the main attraction of the restaurant is a DJ performing from the second floor. Hours 7 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Restaurante Las Garzas
Description: Under the concept of Meson Gastronomico, Las Grazas Restaurant offers the best of traditional Puerto Rican cuisine in conjunction with excellent Caribbean and international specialties. Our bar is very well stocked with fresh products for the preparation of a variety of tropical cocktails. Our expert bartenders will be your hosts in the most pleasant trip for new and varied flavors. In addition to the classic drinks, beers and a cellar that houses the best European and South American wines.

Name: El Ñoqui
Description: An innovative gastronomic proposal that promises to delight your palate with the delights made with fresh products and good taste by Chef Luis Alberto. Hours 8 a.m - 5 p.m.

Name: Jocky's Pizza
Description: Pizzeria with a family atmosphere serving the best pizza of Isabela since 1980. We elaborate our fresh pizzas daily for your delight and we serve calzones, sandwiches, drumsticks, hamburgers and even flans! Jocky's Pizza. Hours 9 a.m - 11 p.m.

Name: Patio del Níspero
Description: Enjoy the best, elegant, cool breeze dining San Juan has to offer in the shadow of the hotel's famous century-old nispero fruit tree. The open-air old San Juan restaurant, Patio del Níspero offers a gourmet menu of delicious and authentic Puerto Rican food served for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Hours: 6:30 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: CHIDO'S Mexican Grill & Wine Bar
Description: If you are in the Isla Verde area and you are craving for some enjoyable Mexican food, Chido’s Mexican Wine Bar and Grill is a good option. Here, you have a great selection of cocktails, a variety of wine and beers including some artisan beers from different places. You can match all these beverages with the plate that most interests you. This is a place you can enjoy with your group of friends and have a good time. Here, you can find happy hours and beer buckets specials to share with your pals. Their food menu also has some big size appetizers to share with everyone. Open 24 hours.

Name: Pitanza
Description: Vegan and visiting Río Piedras? It is ok. Pitanza is a great option for a vegetarian or a vegan person. It is a small restaurant that cooks organic food and has a huge variety of option for people that prefer avoiding the meat or the animal-derived food. Fresh vegetables, ingredients and natural dressings for you to make your favorite quesadilla, burger, sandwich, wrap, and many other delicious meals. At Pitanza, you can also taste an awesome frappe or milkshake (with alternative kinds of milk), an assai bowl or an ice pop to help with the heat of the Río Piedra sun.

Name: Crepe Maker - San Juan
Description: This restaurant specializes in making a great variety of dishes from breakfast, lunch, dinner and even dessert out of crepes.

Name: Hacienda Don José
Description: This restaurant serves some of the most delicious Caribbean food, with a touch of the traditional Puerto Rican seasoning. All the drinks are freshly prepared with local ingredients and what's best, is that it’s next to the ocean! -Hours 11:30 a.m. - 12 a.m. Monday and Tuesday closed.

Name: La Terraza Restaurant - Hilton Ponce Golf & Casino Resort
Description: Enjoy breakfast daily in this spacious Ponce restaurant while overlooking the hotel's pool and gardens. Guests of the Hilton Ponce Golf & Casino Resort mingle with locals at this laid-back restaurant that also offers daily lunch, special holiday service, "al fresco" dining or nightly themed dinners.

Name: Il Giardino La Trattoria
Description: Many kinds of pasta and Caribbean dishes served at this restaurant that welcomes your stay from start to finish. Hours: 6:30 a.m. - 3 p.m.m start to finish.

Name: Acapulco Taquería Mexicana
Description: This restaurant draws locals and tourists with its tasty Mexican eats. Try the enchiladas featuring flavorful chorizo and some succulent beans. Hours: 11:30 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Ocean Lab Brewing Co.
Description: Ocean Lab Brewing Co. is the best place for drinking a beer by the Isla Verde Beach that boasts one of the most pristine and clean shores in all of the Caribbean. Here, you can enjoy about seven of their seasonal brews that include the Sunset Amber, the Pale Ale and the IPA, among others. Moreover, you can take a tour of the brewery so that you can experience firsthand how these beers come to be. Nestled inside, VIVO Beach Club, Ocean Lab Brewing Co. is just one of the many things you can do in this sophisticated, modern beach club. Hours: 11 a.m. - 10 p.m.

Name: Delicias Restaurant
Description: Delicias is a modern Puerto Rican breakfast and dinner restaurant located at La Concha Resort. Classic American recipes blend with local favorites into a mouthwatering experience. Our buffet is among Puerto Rico’s most distinctive, with fruits and other ingredients locally sourced. Try the morning cocktails. At night, savor the taste of authentic Puerto Rican cuisine and indulge in the creations of the Executive Chef. Hours: 6 a.m. - 11 a.m. except, Sunday 6:30 a.m. - 3 p.m.

Name: Eclipse Restaurant & Bar
Description: "The Eclipse Experience is an eclectic fusion of Carribean cuisine with Puerto Rican undertones. Locally sourced organic products, organic meats, fresh locally caught seafood." -The Eclipse Restaurant

Name: Choices Sheraton
Description: Choices Sheraton is considered a five-star restaurant, from start to finish. The appetizers, main dish and exquisite desserts are to die for, they also serve drinks and many more delicious food choices.

Name: Cinco Nudos
Description: Cinco Nudos is a restaurant specializing in Puerto Rican cuisine. They have a staff of vast experience and an exquisite taste in the preparation of Puerto Rico's culinary delights.- Cinco Nudos

Name: La Mallorquina
Description: La Mallorquina is a restaurant in San Juan, Puerto Rico that specializes in the preparation of Puerto Rican and Spanish food, particularly the cuisine of Palma de Mallorca, such as asopao, gazpacho, arroz con pollo, paella and flan. It was inaugurated in 1848 and has been administered by the Rojos family since 1900 and some historians claim that La Mallorquina is the first food establishment in Puerto Rico.

Name: Bistro de París
Description: As the name suggests, Bistro de Paris specializes in French cuisine. There is only one way to describe the fairy-tale scenery: heaven. The food, consisting of traditional French plates such as Filet Mignon and Terrine de Campagne, is just as good as the venue.

Name: Soda
Description: Offering international cuisine, Soda is the place if you and your group can't seem to compromise on what to eat. There's Caribbean food, American comfort food, seafood... and more, plus veggie options!

Name: The Lunch Box
Description: A family owned and cozy little coffee shop, with a little twist to have a good time, surf the web and relax.

Name: Chez Daniel at The Club
Description: Chez Daniel at the Country Club is one of Puerto Rico's quintessential places for French Cuisine. With Chef Daniel Vasse at its helm since its inception in 1985, it had been awarded multiple times for having excellent food and service.

Name: Coqui Buffet
Description: Coquí Buffet offers their signature "100% Criollo Buffet" in Humacao, Puerto Rico. Some of the great variety you will find includes rice with pigeon peas, corned beef, and beans.

Name: El Hamburger
Description: Aside from being in front of the ocean, this establishment is famous for its delicious burgers. Well, the name of this establishment is The Hamburger and they have been serving their simple and succulent dishes since the '60s. The experience of visiting it is one of "local for locals". The atmosphere is relaxed and unpretentious since all those who work there and those who visit it have only one mission: to create a hamburger that makes your palate go unbroken. This is one of the most emblematic establishments in the metropolitan area of the island.

Name: El Joint Burguer
Description: A variety of options to mix up your slider, plus they serve wine on tap. They specialize in sliders because they believe it is more enjoyable to eat a lot of different flavors and sliders than a huge hamburger with one flavor. El Joint is a unique restaurant that makes your mouth water with all the options you can choose from to make your perfect slider!

Name: Prros Locos
Description: Fast food meets gourmet at Prros Locos. The restaurant offers a variety of special hot dogs, including vegan options. The artsy walls and youthful ambiance make it a great spot to end the day with friends.

Name: Solera
Description: This is a great outdoor bar & grill with tasty food, awesome service, and a beautiful view. La Concha’s sophisticated open-air, multi-level terrace poolside restaurant serves deliciously light lunches and tapas. Also offering pitchers of fresh, distinctive sangria and flavored mojitos to get the party started! Solera has restaurant-style seating as well as casual, tropical-style lounge areas for drinks and mingling. Exclusive lounge areas can be reserved for private events, with food and drink packages available.

Name: Pernilería Los Próceres
Description: pernilera LOSPRCERES focuses on serving "pernil" (Puerto Rican-style pork shoulder) sandwiches and other culinary creations.

Name: Ruly's Pizza
Description: Choose your own combinations in our extensive menu in a family atmosphere.

Name: Lacies Café
Description: Since 2012, Lacies Café has offered the best option of food and coffee in the town of Ciales. We offer a variety of breakfasts and lunches from Monday to Saturday.

Name: La Madre
Description: One of the very first things you’ll notice about la Madre is that it glows in subdued yellow, electric blue, and lilac. Spherical golden cushions jut out from the baby blue walls, and the curved sports bar with stools. The atmosphere resembles that of a lounge, with a live DJ at the turntables and a projector showing a film on the wall. La Madre is a Mexican cantina with a futuristic twist. Try the flavored mojitos for a refreshing take on the staple drink of the Spanish Caribbean, and the duck quesadillas to enchant your palate.

Name: Chef Calixto Cora
Description: Chef Calixto Cora is an experienced food consultant that offers different gourmet packages such as private or business parties, catering, chef tables, and Paella Shows. He offers a variety of plates, including Criollo cuisine and others.

Name: Teefrans Café
Description: This spot specializes in homemade fresh food. Since 1970, the popular plate here is beefsteak (steak) served with fries, fried plantain, rice, and salad with a side dessert plate of our homemade cheesecake.

Name: Chicharrón
Description: As the name (and the smell) suggest, "chicharrones" are the specialty of the house. The restaurant has a casual environment to go along with the creative dishes prepared. Try the chicharron with mofongo, a local favorite for a true culinary experience.

Name: Duffy's Esperanza
Description: You'll find Duffy's right in front of Vieques boardwalk in Esperanza. Stop by for refreshing drinks and delicious food.

Name: Aurora's Chicken & Grill
Description: Stop by Aurora's for a quick lunch, try their roasted chicken or order the day's special.

Name: Lazy Jacks
Description: Come hang out at Lazy Jacks, the place to relax right on the Esperanza waterfront for breakfast, lunch, dinner and late night. Sit and watch the view and hang out with the locals. Full bar, frozen drinks, specialty beers, pizzas, hamburgers, chicken sandwiches, salads and wraps, and pub food is on the menu. Friendly bartenders are happy to serve you the coldest beer and gourmet hand-rolled pizza with homemade sauce. Open early to serve you breakfast and stay open late for your nighttime fun! Nice Breeze! Always happy to see you!

Name: Pizzeria Rivera
Description: Established 40 years ago by Mr. Joaquin Rivera, this pizzeria continues with the same commitment as it always has, to serve a high-quality product in a pleasant atmosphere and with the best service.

Name: Blue Burger Bar & Grill
Description: At Blue Burger, they specialize in gourmet burgers, but for those who are looking for something different, they also serve seafood and even steaks.

Name: Los Hijos de Alto del Cabro
Description: Alto del Cabro is a cafe serving exquisite Puerto Rican food. They specialize in Caribbean cuisine so you can try many local favorites while enjoying the lively music.

Name: Jefferson Restaurant
Description: A mix of Caribbean food and many other delicious dishes, with great service and homemade desserts.

Name: Café Tropical at Courtyard Isla Verde by Marriott
Description: Experience our amazing restaurant. Don't forget to stop by our incredible restaurant during your stay with us. Here you'll be able to find delicious Puerto Rican fare and traditional breakfast and dinner dishes that will tempt your taste buds.

Name: Caracoles Restaurante
Description: Enjoy a delicious dinner at this Culebra establishment. From their "mamposteao" rice to their seafood dishes, all their options are delicious and memorable.

Name: Casita Miramar
Description: A fancy Caribbean restaurant where they serve some of the most delicious tropical foods of Puerto Rico and with excellent service.

Name: Cayo Blanco
Description: This boutique restaurant offers a unique seafood experience. Here, you can enjoy some of the best surf and turf with a Puerto Rican flavor in an upscale and fun venue!

Name: Ariel Restaurant
Description: Ariel, located in the Courtyard by Marriott in Miramar is a fine dining restaurant where you can enjoy carefully crafted international food. Chef Ariel believes in having high culinary standards and the venue mimics this sophisticated idea.

Name: La Alcapurria Quemá
Description: La Alcapurria Quemá has captured the essence of Puerto Rican food you will find in "chichorros" around the beach. Try some alcapurrias with smashed plantains for authentic Caribbean flavors.

Name: La Hacienda Meat Center - Miramar
Description: La Hacienda is an upscale neighborhood grocery store. They offer the freshest ingredients and they even have a deli where they serve subs, salads, and daily lunch. If you're a meat lover, La Hacienda is also the perfect place to find flavorful and juicy steaks!

Name: Waikiki Sea Food & Oyster Bar
Description: A trip to Puerto Rico would not be the same without tasting a mouthful of local seafood. For those who love everything related to seafood, Wikiki serves some of the best. During your visit, do not forget to sit by the ocean and enjoy the amazing oyster bar.

Name: Pure & Natural: Fresh Food & Juice Bar
Description: Tropical fruit is the way to go in Pure & Natural. Order papaya, orange, banana, in a fresh juice or a mixed shake. Juices are not the only star of this restaurant, they also serve delicious dishes with the freshest ingredients. If you are visiting, try the tuna pie, one of our customers' favorites!

Name: El Gran Chaporral
Description: Since 1972 "El Gran Chaporal" has served its beginnings uninterruptedly in the town of Aguada. In a simple and familiar environment. El Gran Chaporral one of the pioneers in the art of Mofongo, with over 50 years of experience preparing the best dishes. The Masters of Mofongo for 50 years!

Name: El Ladrillo
Description: Our dining room has 20 tables in a cozy and romantic atmosphere, where dim lighting inspires relaxation. Aware that our clientele has a demanding palate, we only use prime cuts of meat and fresh seafood. To ensure the greatest freshness and the best flavor in our dishes, all our creole components are prepared daily in our kitchen using the traditional recipes. We welcome reservations for anniversaries and birthdays, offering a service and atmosphere with the same quality as a 5 stars hotel.

Name: Panela Cocina Social
Description: This casual, social-vibe restaurant and bar evokes the simplicity of our contemporary cuisine. Panela’s all-day menu features our Chef's weekly special, fresh market salads, shareable appetizers and hearty entrees with unusual twists of local flavor influences.

Name: Zazones Creole Cuisine
Description: Zazones Creole Cuisine in Aguadilla serves exotic and international beers. Come enjoy our delicious selections and see why we are a taste for all seasons.

Name: El Eden
Description: With a nice variety of fresh seafood options and drinks, El Eden also offers a great selection of beers, as well as a bar with the best Margaritas and Culebra’s most famous Bushwackers! It is the perfect combination of a great atmosphere, service and incredible food.

Name: Tanamá Restaurant - Holiday Inn Ponce & Tropical Casino
Description: Located inside Ponce's Holiday Inn Hotel, Tanamá Restaurant serves classic Puerto Rican mofongos as well as international cuisine. During nights, you can enjoy live music at the Barlavista Lounge.

Name: Santorini Ocean Lounge Restaurant
Description: Puerto Rican-Greek grill. Outdoor dining room with a full bar and a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea with live jazz every Friday night. The Greek experience includes saganaki (cheese on fire), Greek-style grilled seafood, pita bread and hummus (homemade), gyros, and baklava. Santorini-OLR offers the best fish, steaks, and Port Greek Grill on the Island!

Name: El Sabor de Reina
Description: Satisfy your cravings for comfort food in the Caribbean with a stop at El Sabor de Reina. This restaurant has an incredible atmosphere and serves some of the best creative plantain-based dishes.

Name: Uvva Restaurant
Description: Restaurant is located at Hosteria del Mar offering a breathtaking view of the ocean and an upscale dining experience.

Name: Zafra del Caribe
Description: At Zafra del Caribe we proudly carry the history of effort and passion of our predecessors. Thanks to the delights of the Caribbean and the exquisiteness of the Mediterranean, we are inspired to offer you a unique experience with quality, freshness, and human warmth that invites you to return.

Name: Tanama Pizza
Description: This is a family atmosphere where you can enjoy one of our delicious pizza, calzones, lasagna, breadsticks, and chicken wings among other things.

Name: Golden Mountain Restaurant
Description: This location offers Chinese food with a Caribbean twist! Their fried chicken is to die for with big chunks and little grease at a reasonable price

Name: China Sun Santurce
Description: This is one of the best restaurants of Chinese food in Santurce at an excellent price.

Name: New Taste
Description: This location specializes in Chinese food, serving enormous lobsters, eels, and crabs. Its Peking duck is very famous along with other fresh dishes.

Name: Tayzan Chinese & Japanese Cuisine
Description: Specializing in a fusion Chinese and Japanese cuisine, Tayzan is the perfect place to enjoy the best of both tastes.

Name: Ding How Restaurant
Description: Ding How Restaurant is one of the most popular chinese places in Humacao. With 30 years of experience, and a very attentive staff, this place is a must for chinese food.

Name: Yamiko Sushi Bar
Description: Sushi lovers, get ready for some of the best sushi around Isla Verde! Yamiko Sushi is a small, unassuming sushi restaurant on the side of Avenida Isla Verde and is very close to some of the most popular hotels in the area. Locals and visitors love the freshness of the sashimi (which is to die for!), the friendly and attentive service, and the cooked food (try the green veggie dumplings!). Open on weekends until 3 and 4 AM, Yamiko Sushi is the perfect place for that midnight sushi craving. However, if you do not wish to get up off the couch and head over to the restaurant, don't worry!

Name: Ikebana Sushi Bars - Guaynabo
Description: Established in 2002, Ikebana Sushi Bars is not your average Japanese Sushi Restaurant. With venue location in Guaynabo, we have been chosen as the 2016 Best Sushi Bar Restaurant in Puerto Rico for the past 6 years by the prestigious Sal! Awards. And most recently, we earned the 2017 Certificate of Excellence by TripAdvisor. Our constant aim is to surpass your Expectations in all our Menu offerings. Warm, Knowledgeable and Professional Staff will extend genuine Hospitality as they guide you through your Dining Experience.

Name: Pitipuá
Description: ¡Descubre el sabor de Pitipuá! Nuestro restaurante de comida criolla utiliza ingredientes frescos de nuestro país para brindarte la mejor experiencia culinaria. Estamos abiertos de jueves a lunes desde el mediodía.

Name: Desecheo Restaurant
Description: Desecheo has been serving food that represents the flavors of Puerto Rico for more than a decade. Our specialty is mofongos. “La isla Desecheo” is the flagship mofongo, it is stuffed with churrasco with onions, and surrounded by shrimp and fish in Creole sauce. Other very popular dishes are the stuffed mamposteao rice and the Kan Kan chop, which has two pounds of juicy pork baked and fried, so that the skin remains crispy. Explore our menu so that you can discover the variety of dishes with seafood, meat and poultry that we prepare daily with the traditional touch of Puerto Rican cuisine.

Name: Silk
Description: This is an award-winning restaurant located at the facilities of the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel. It has a varied oriental cuisine menu with a friendly bilingual staff. You can select your table at an indoor or outdoor setting for all the members of the family.

Name: La Ó Pizza & Tapas
Description: For divine pizzas and heaven-sent cocktails, head immediately to La Ó! As soon as you walk in, you will feel as though you've been transported into some futuristic cloister—the décor is inescapably baroque, but with a neon twist (all the saints and virgins are encased in fluorescent light). First, you have the bar, which has a list of some of its creations chalked up on the wall (I wholeheartedly recommend the Ponche del Jardín or the Desnudo y Famoso). After ordering your drinks, you can delve into the menu at peace.

Name: El Asador
Description: El Asador The Grill-house Old San Juan, Puerto Rico, where you can find the best seafood, meat cuts and Puerto Rican cuisine, has a prime location in Old San Juan's entrance, and right in the heart of the Old City's nightlife. The stylish and exclusive décor of this Bar & Restaurant, accentuated by a magnificent interior patio, provides the perfect environment for a delightful, cozy and sophisticated experience.

Name: The Green House
Description: This is modern comfort food, craft cocktails, great wines, and a world-class staff all in a unique and electrifying environment.

Name: Asere Cubano
Description: This Cuban kitchen bar has an antique decor of a Spanish colonial house with a modern twist. The menu was designed to have some of the best Caribbean dishes, infused with African and Spanish flavors.

Name: La Casa del Chef
Description: Our Specialties are Grilled Meats and Fresh Seafood. Open 7 days a week from 11:30 am.

Name: Di Parma Trattoria
Description: This restaurant serves traditional Italian dishes with a local, Caribbean twist. Enjoy delicious entries facing the beachfront with an outdoor Mediterranean vibe!

Name: Toro Verde Restaurant
Description: If you're looking for a true culinary experience visit the Toro Verde Restaurant. The terrace overlooks the central mountain range and on a clear day you can see all the way to the coast. The menu features local cuisine with a gourmet twist, made with fresh local ingredients, and includes a few vegetarian options.

Name: Texas De Brazil
Description: The specialty at Texas de Brazil is Brazilian food. They offer a good menu selection and amazing Brazilian Steak Buffet!

Name: Mai Pen Rai
Description: Some of the most delicious and unique Thai food you could try in Puerto Rico; dishes from soups, curries, fried rice and much more!
