Name: Nonna Cucina Rustica
Description: Nonna Cucina Rustica is a restaurant where you can find a variety of dishes of exquisite Italian food, seafood and pasta which will make you come back for more.

Name: Umai Latin Izakaya
Description: Umai Latin Izakaya is a restaurant that focuses on combining Japanese cuisine with Latin cuisine.

Name: Tacos & Tequila
Description: The tacos are the star of the restaurant. Its menu includes seven varieties of these Mexican delights, including a selection of vegetarian, pork, crispy cod, steak and chicken tacos. Other dishes that go perfectly with the fun and casual environment of space are salads, tortilla soup, nachos and a variety of quesadillas. An outstanding dessert selection includes plates of cheese flan and the "Churro Ice Cream Sandwich". Drink offerings extend from beers to Tequila Patrón margaritas, specialty cocktails made with spice herbs and fresh, organic ingredients purchased from local farmers

Name: II Postino Miramar
Description: Enjoy the exquisite Mediterranean food with a Caribbean touch. Located in a beautiful old house, this exclusive restaurant serves everything related to the magnificent European coast cuisine such as tapas and delicious seafood.

Name: El Hipopotamo Restaurant & Delicatessen
Description: El Hipopótamo is a well know dinner in Río Piedras. Professors, students and everyone else go to El Hipopótamo to enjoy a great dinner with excellent wine. This diner is perfect to go with your work colleagues or your friends, seat and enjoy yourself with an abundant selection of wine. This 24-hour diner gives you the option to enjoy a hot and delicious brunch at any hour of the day. A calm vibe, excellent food and glass of wine will fix your day.

Name: Mere Pescao
Description: This location offers a wide selection of seafood, in tacos, sushi rolls, salads and much more.

Name: Boccado's Divino
Description: Bocado's Divino is a very neat place to dine in. They offer lunch, dinner and even drinks. They are well known because of the Chef Tony Pimentel international dishes.

Name: Pizza Chef's Bar & Grill
Description: Pizza Chef is a pizzeria-style restaurant that offers healthy dishes and a variety of Italian dishes such as pizzas, calzones, and meats.

Name: Betsy's Café & Restaurant
Description: Creole food of all kinds with specials every day from Monday to Saturday from 11am to 8pm. In Aguadilla behind Mr. Mofongo next to La Milagrosa Bakery. We will wait for you :)

Name: Bari Pizza
Description: Bari Pizza is a great place for any occasion. The pizza is not the only good dish here, but you can grab a bite from a variety of foods from breakfast, lunch even dinner.

Name: Bocata by Campillo
Description: If you find yourself near Rio Abajo, Humacao, make sure you stop by Bocata by Campillo. The place is well known for being the first Spanish Deli in Humacao and it is armed with an exquisite menu.

Name: Básico Juguería
Description: The Basic Juguería is a fresh and nutritious option for all those who want to enjoy a healthy juice. There is a wide variety of cold juices, smoothies and healthy meals for all tastes.

Name: Fleria Theo's Greek Café
Description: Fleria Theo’s is a cozy restaurant with a variety of traditional Greek dishes. This is a place with authentic decor that makes you feel as though you're actually in a local restaurant in Greece. If you don't know what to order, the staff and Theo can help you select the perfect dish by explaining the details of their specialty dishes.

Name: Gelateria 4D
Description: An Italian Gelato shop, known internationally for their amazing flavors and creative servings.

Name: Bangkok & Bombay
Description: Bangkok & Bombay is here to satisfy your Asian craving on this Caribbean island. They offer the perfect fusion of Thai and Indian food and the venue is fit to celebrate any occasion.

Name: Da Luigi Ristorante Italiano
Description: Italian restaurant near Calle Loíza that offers a menu full of dishes prepared with fresh ingredients such as stuffed pasta and pizza. Da Luigi promises a familiar and local experience.

Name: Orozco's Restaurant
Description: Orozco's Restaurant specializes in Puerto Rican cuisine. Enjoy delicious local dishes and fresh specialty drinks in a friendly atmosphere!

Name: Jota Restaurant at Royal Isabela
Description: Our philosophy is simple: real food cooked with real heat! This cozy restaurant has an indoor and outdoor space overlooking the Atlantic Ocean.

Name: Restaurant El Popular
Description: As the name suggests it, this is one of the most popular restaurants at La Placita. El Popular has been in Santurce, serving Puerto Rican cuisine for over three decades. While visiting, try the famous "Chicharrones de Pollo" and delicious Pina Colada.

Name: Pasatiempos Restaurant & Pizzería
Description: If you are walking through the northwest and want to eat tasty food. You will receive excellent treatment and service from all the staff. We serve Puerto Rican food every day.

Name: Emidian Restaurant
Description: Emidian is a family restaurant that specializes in international and Creole food. Large selection of wines, reservations room, live music on Sundays and extensive menu with our unique and exclusive variety.

Name: Kiosko El Boricua
Description: How can you see Kiosko El Boricua in Piñones? Well, for its long lines, of course! But do not avoid this wonderful food shack of the PR-187, as it offers some of the best fried food in Piñones. Some of the favorite dishes are the famous alcapurrias stuffed with crab, the octopus arepas and their exquisite piononos. Kiosko El Boricua occasionally organizes live music events, so come ready to party a few paces from the beach.

Name: Platos Restaurant & Bar
Description: Platos Restaurant prides itself in serving the best and most true Puerto Rican Cuisine in Isla Verde. Of Puerto Rican owners & chefs, Platos is a must stop in your culinary tour of San Juan and the Isla Verde Resort Area. Platos Restaurant offers a great variety of Puerto Rican specialties. From the so traditional mofongo to fresh seafood, like our own Caribbean Lobsters. From fried plantains to black bean risotto. And do not leave without Fthe delicious typical piononos and upgrade it with shrimps; your sense of taste will thank you for the experience.

Name: Restaurante Raíces - Old San Juan
Description: The taste of our island can be enjoyed in each of our specialties. Accompanied with our "mofongo", fried green plantains, or our typical rice and beans, you and your companions will experience the thrill of the unmistakable flavors of Puerto Rico. Enjoy all of our comfort and homely ambient. Whether for lunch, dinner or to have a friendly drink, our kind personnel will make your visit a memorable experience, you will remember, share, and surely will want to repeat.

Name: La Gran Guitarra
Description: "Restaurante de comida criolla e internacional con un toque moderno." Coamo PR, El Centro del Universo

Name: Miliaris II
Description: A place with the famous frituras and beer. This market place has adobo and other local ingredients for a Puerto Rican dish or snack.

Name: Restaurante El Coche
Description: Restaurante El Coche has a great variety of fresh seafood and grilled meats, and it has an outdoor terrace with a beautiful view of the sea.

Name: El Quenepo - Vieques
Description: Fine dining located at the waterfront in Esperanza. Innovative cuisine with lots of flavors. Featured items include fresh local seafood, specialty cocktails, and local greens. Vegan and vegetarian items also available

Name: El Burén De Lula
Description: El Burén de Lula specializes in artisanal cuisine of Burén with fresh ingredients such as yuca, coconut, and jueyes.

Name: Tío Pepe's Restaurant
Description: Tio Pepe Restaurant is on road #723 Km. 0.3 in Asomante, Aibonito Puerto Rico. We have a variety of Menu and accept the major credit cards. We have a Cocktail Lounge, Meeting room, Terrace, Activity room, Wine Cave, Children area, ample parking, and Guest House. Live music for listening, Friday to Sunday. Open from Thursday to Sunday.

Name: Bimi's Pizza & Restaurant
Description: The best pizza in a quiet and family atmosphere. To order you can call: (787) 609-6272

Name: Andrea's Restaurant & Cocktail Lounge
Description: Located in front of the San Lucas hospital, Andrea’s Restaurant offers a varied a la carte menu, seafood, fresh fish, happy hours, and more.

Name: Casa De Campo Shekina
Description: Enjoy Puertorican and international cuisines in a family-friendly atmosphere with peace and tranquility. Come and enjoy a Gastronomic Experience, an Adventure to the Palate.

Name: Delicias Criollas
Description: Delicias Criollas is a quaint cafeteria in Humacao where breakfast and lunch are served. The place offers a variety of Criollo dishes such as mofongo, rice and beans and beef stew. That being said, the menu is changed every day, so visit and find out what your favorite dish is!

Name: La Ceiba Bar & Restaurant
Description: For over 10 years, our restaurant has been delighting visitors with our delicious take on Puerto Rican classics. Every Monday to Friday from 10:30 am to 3:00 pm we have lunch specials and a la carte specials starting at $4.95.

Name: La Casita de Tita
Description: La Casita de Tita was born in honor of Grandma Tita, full of Creole dishes with many seasonings and Caribbean flavor. The menu varies every week and you can find everything from potato cake, chicken with fricassee, jibaro rice to fried cod dishes. Finish with a cup of coffee and one of our desserts.

Name: Bananas Beach Bar & Grill
Description: Whether you want a Pina Colada or a Golden Margarita, Bananas has something just for you. This is an open air beach bar and grill that offers burgers, sandwiches, salads, light bites, wings and more. The menu also includes: Bananas Bar and Grill Menu, Little Bananas and Bananas Drink Menu. Average price is around $10. Kitchen open every day from 11:00 am to 10:00 pm. Seating is on first come first serve basis, so no reservations are necessary. We appreciate advance notice if a large group is on its way. Master Card, Visa and ATH are accepted.

Name: Restaurante y Pizzeria Don Quijote
Description: Don Quijote is a Restaurant & Pizzeria establishment was founded in 1991. It has a wide variety of food for all types of tastes such as shrimp, lobster, filet of chillo, grouper, dorado, lasagña, mofóngo, asopao, churrasco, pizza and much more. A quality family atmosphere with more than 20 years of experience that makes a difference.

Name: Sirena Oceanfront Restaurant
Description: By day, Sirena Oceanfront Restaurant serves a light lunch with attentive service and tropical rhythms in a casual oceanfront setting. Choose from fresh seafood cuisine with big flavors and a variety of refreshing beverages, including specialty mojitos, a wine menu and more.
Street Address: 7012 Boca de Cangrejos Avenue Carolina, 00979, Puerto Rico

Name: Sabor Candela Bar-Restaurant
Description: Candela Restaurant offers the best of pasta, Caribbean food, seafood, beef, and soups, making it an extraordinary experience.

Name: Mana's Cafe
Description: Ana's Cafe is a great place to enjoy some Puerto Rican cuisine during the weekdays. This place is a preferred place among locals.

Name: Cafe 18
Description: Try some delicious beef soup or a classic Puerto Rican tripleta. Cafe 18 has been open for nearly 18 years and they continue to serve some of the best food in the area.

Name: Antojitos del Mar 1
Description: If you are having a craving for seafood; look no further than Antojitos del Mar. As the name suggests, they offer a menu specialized in seafood and to-go options. Visit, if you want to have an authentic Puerto Rican snack in a local environment.

Name: El Nuevo Acuario
Description: This location is a fresh, beachfront, sea food restaurant... Everything is fresh caught off of the coast of Puerto Rico. They also have local fresh fruit mojitos. Enjoy a drink from the bar with your meal.

Name: Yerba Buena
Description: This Cuban restaurant is famously known as the place "where the Mojito was born in Puerto Rico". A fun spot where you can enjoy exquisite food with live Caribbean music.

Name: Bistro Tartine
Description: Renowned French Chef Daniel Vasse is at the helm of Bistro Tartine, one of Puerto Rico's premier French restaurants. Chef Daviel Vasse has been in Puerto Rico for more than 30 years and in this time he has managed to integrate the Island's native ingredients into his cooking without losing the essence of classical French food.
Street Address: Hospital HIMA Plaza, 100 Ave Luis Muñoz Marín

Name: Tomate
Description: A casual place where you can find great authentic Mexican food. Tomate offers a series of weekly specials, where margaritas are at an inexpensive price. The margarita bar is the star of this restaurant; with a variety of options for your margarita. Located near the beach, a great place to catch up with friends and enjoy some tacos and margaritas at Isla Verde.

Name: Portela by Orujo
Description: Orujo is an inspirational and experimental Puerto Rican food concept. Orujo brings a modern twist on classical Caribbean flavors, and we are a tasting menu concept where you will experience a full gastronomic flight that ranges from 7 to 20 courses" We are a Pri-fix restaurant. Orujo serves a multi-course tasting menu, and we serve each guest an individually tailored experience.

Name: Ceviche House
Description: At Ceviche House, you will taste great seafood, amazing tostones and, of course, an excellent ceviche. Treat your family (or just yourself) to one of the most renowned ceviches in Puerto Rico, where the ingredients are as fresh as they get and the recipe is as Peruvian as it gets (adorned with the choclo and cancha corn, this ceviche is delicious!). Try the Ceviche Mixto (mixed seafood ceviche) and pair it with delicious pisco sour!

Name: Meat Market - Fairmont El San Juan Hotel
Description: A truly contemporary steakhouse, boasting a sophisticated ambiance sizzling with New York City-style energy, a happening bar scene, and a savvy menu featuring prime cuts of beef, wonderful fish, seafood and poultry dishes and a wide range of price points geared to draw both locals and visitors.

Name: Restaurante Alexandra at Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa
Description: Our award-winning fine dining experience is open from 6:30 p.m. - 10:00 p.m. on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturdays. Savor contemporary Puerto Rican fare in an elegant restaurant environment, prepared by our internationally acclaimed chef and complemented by an extensive wine list and lovely sea views. Delectable vegetarian and children’s’ menus are available as well.

Name: L'Osteria Wine & Delicatessen
Description: Serving traditional Italian food, L’Osteria does best when it comes to it, with a unique service in an Italian atmosphere.

Name: Faccio Pizza - Isla Verde
Description: Faccio Pizza originated in a small, family-owned bakery in Cupey. In 1973, brothers José and Gilberto Faccio decided to open up a bakery to sell pizza as well as delicious baked goods. Eventually, their pizza was so sought-after that the brothers chose to expand their operations and Faccio Pizza became one of the most popular pizza places in Puerto Rico. Their Isla Verde branch does not disappoint and you'll be able to experience this Italian-inspired Puerto Rican pizzeria right next to some of the most popular hotels in the Metro Area.

Name: Mario's Pizza Place
Description: This pizzeria was founded around 1960 under the name Mastro’s Pizza by Italian Israel Olivieri. After five years it passed onto Puerto Rican hands. One of the best (if not the best) pizza in Caguas.

Name: Susie's Restaurant
Description: This lovely restaurant is one of the few dining options in Culebra. Enjoy an al fresco dinner at their outdoor patio while you sip on a refreshing cocktail.

Name: Antonino's Pizza - Añasco
Description: Are you at home and you do not want to get up? Looking for Italian food nearby? Want to try your first brochette? Antonino's Pizza provides a delicious Italian food delivery service. Selecting either a simple pizza slice or a chicken brochette, you won't be disappointed!

Name: El AZ, Tu Rinconcito Chileno
Description: The AZ, "tu rinconcito chileno", the only 100% Chilean restaurant in Puerto Rico.

Name: El Gallo Fried Chicken & More
Description: The newest restaurant in the Avenida Universitaria came to spice things up. This restaurant promises a delicious mix of homemade french fries and fried chicken. But that’s not all; papas locas takes a new meaning with their menu. A variety of crazy ways of making french fries, inspired by the culinary experiences of different countries is what really makes this place stand out. Enjoy a Mexicanas with guacamole or a Borincana with fried sweet plantains. Your fries will never be the same after you visit the restaurant El Gallo.

Name: Bonsai Sushi Bar And Teppanyaki
Description: Come and enjoy an ideal environment for good sushi or teppanyaki. We have a variety of over 30 sushi rolls. Be sure to try the "Criollo" and the "Crispy Fusion". In addition to the calamari and, of course, the desserts.

Name: El Potosí
Description: El Potosi is a small, but charming Mexican restaurant in Humacao. The food is well known and appreciated for being authentic and inexpensive.

Name: Mama Mia Artisanal Pizzas
Description: Delicious pizza and pasta dishes await you at Mama Mia Artisanal Pizzas in Isabel II. Aside from their regular menu, Mama Mia also has daily lunch specials.

Name: William's Pizza - Vieques
Description: Satisfy your pizza craving at William's Pizza in Vieques. This pizza spot is located in the north coast of the island, in what is known as Isabel II.

Name: Volando Bajito
Description: Quick service restaurant: Korean style fried chicken fusion worldly comfort food, vegan and vegetarian options, free parking and take out available.

Name: Stuffed Avocado Shop - Old San Juan
Description: The Avocado is the delicious protagonist of everything sold in the Stuffed Avocado Store. From the pint, socks, hats and cell phone covers to the real bowl of stuffed avocado, this glass and culinary concrete boutique are dedicated to refreshing fruits. The process of making the bowl is done in front of the customers, so pay attention: this is one of the fun parts of the experience. Let's prepare, for example, the bowl of spicy salmon: take an entire avocado; cut it in half; Remove the skin with a spoon and put it in a bowl.

Name: Brasas Restaurant at Rincón Beach Resort
Description: Slip into your table at Brasas and savor a delectable fusion of Caribbean, Spanish, and Mediterranean flavors, resulting in a tantalizing dining experience. Indulge in authentic native cuisine and savor the freshness of locally sourced seafood. Let Brasas Restaurant at Rincón Beach Resort be your gateway to a memorable dining journey, where Caribbean fusion cuisine takes center stage.

Name: Paletados Mayagüez Mall
Description: We are a Puerto Rican company that makes handmade popsicle with a variety of more than 40 flavors, our artisan popsicle are made using fresh and high quality products to bring the best flavor to your palate unique in its flavor!
Street Address: Mayagüez Mall Shopping Center, 975 Ave. Eugenio María de Hostos, Local #61

Name: Bocca Osteria Romana
Description: Bocca Osteria Romana is a family owned, open-kitchen restaurant serving authentic Roman-Italian dishes, wines, and cocktails. Serving fresh pasta daily.

Name: Melanzana Bistro & Pizzeria
Description: Melanzana Bistro's atmosphere draws people from all over for a special Italian cuisine experience.

Name: Super Pizza
Description: A family place located in Santurce, Puerto Rico, with excellent pizza and more food on the menu.

Name: Rustica
Description: Old World Brooklyn pizza in the heart of Fajardo, Puerto Rico.

Name: Napolitana - Paseo Caribe
Description: The first and only Napolitan style certified pizza place in Puerto Rico and the Caribbean.

Name: Pancho Villa Casa de Tequilas
Description: This restaurant is known to offer more than 40 brands of tequila and a 48 oz Margarita. Pancho Villa Tequila House offers unique tacos, such as corn beef or a yucca version with cilantro and olive oil. The cantina styled restaurant is located in La Platica in Santurce.

Name: Restaurante El Mexicano - San Juan
Description: "Restaurante el Mexicano, will transport you to Mexico with its Mexican food and music. Enjoy the nigh with margaritas and delicious flautas or soft taquitos in a cozy space located in Río Piedras "

Name: Tuttobene Ristorante
Description: Tuttobene Ristorante serves traditional Italian cuisine and artisan pizzas. The venue has a traditional decor yet it has a modern ambiance. They are to serve plates with fresh and local ingredients and maintain a high quality service.

Name: Taverna
Description: In the mood for mouthwatering Italian food? Stop by Taverna in Vieques for delicious pasta dishes.

Name: Back To The 80's Pizza
Description: Relive the era of the 80's in Back To The 80's Pizza, while enjoying a rich artisan pizza with homemade ingredients.

Name: El Conde Pasta Pizza
Description: El Conde Pizza serves argentinian-inspired pizzas in Old San Juan, known for their thin and crispy crust pizzas made with fresh ingredients.

Name: Elvin's Pizza
Description: Come and enjoy the best pizza made with the best and freshest ingredients. The dough and sauce are made every day.

Name: Pizzería Pellot
Description: Located in the town of Isabela, we offer the best pizza in the entire western area. Come and visit us so you don't miss out on our wonderful dishes.

Name: Blonda Condado
Description: Distinguished by a modern scene, Blonda offers a wide range of popular comfort foods in a chic and cozy environment.

Name: Blue Hawaii - Ponce
Description: Asian Pacific cuisine made with local Puerto Rican flare. Freshly made from scratch every day, using fresh and local products. Now offering and adding to the menu our special item "Bubble Tea". Come visit us and enjoy the variety of shops in Plaza del Caribe at the town of Ponce.

Name: La Cueva del Mar - Calle Loíza
Description: La Cueva del Mar Restaurant specializes in seafood dishes prepared in the Island's distinctive “criollo” style. If you're craving fresh seafood then this is the place to visit. The menu also includes beef, pork and chicken dishes.

Name: Marisquería Atlántica Isla Verde
Description: Restaurant where you can enjoy fresh seafood and lobsters in a friendly and familiar atmosphere.

Name: Antonio's Restaurant
Description: Antonio's restaurant specializes in Spanish cuisine, has a diverse menu, and a vast variety of wine options. The flavorful dishes are served elegantly, and well balanced with the atmosphere of the venue.

Name: Casa Manolo
Description: Casa Manolo serves some of the most excellent Spanish dishes, making this restaurant so great to dine in. It's perfect, from the food, to the services and the owner Manolo makes sure that your stay is enjoyable.

Name: Ali Baba Turkish Restaurant
Description: Ali Baba restaurant offers authentic Turkish food, with some exquisite Mediterranean variations. Experience an upscale dining experience, and try the famous kebabs, fresh raki, and other turkish delights.

Name: El Punto Vegano
Description: Try vegan spins on local favorites at El Punto Vegano. Who says you can't enjoy Puerto Rican food while vegan? Most of the products at el Punto Vegano are bought from local farmers, so you don't have to neglect enjoying delicious Caribbean flavors for meat free food!

Name: Pannes
Description: Pannes is a casual restaurant that serves as a local bakery and wine cellar. Their menu offers popular Caribbean dishes and breakfast all day.

Name: PAPAYA OCEANFRONT BAR & GRILL
Description: Great food and fun awaits you at this swim-up pool bar located at the Courtyard Marriott Isla Verde! Enjoy the taste of the tropics with a Piña Colada or exotic frozen cocktail while basking in a poolside chaise lounge. When hunger strikes, grab a bite to eat from the casual American menu, offering nachos, mozzarella sticks, chicken wings, hamburgers, hot dogs, chicken tenders and French fries.
Street Address: 7012 Boca de Cangrejos Avenue Carolina, 00979, Puerto Rico

Name: 101 West Kitchen and Bar
Description: 101 West is a family-owned restaurant serving American food in a casual setting. We offer a full bar including craft beers, wines and cocktails.

Name: 1950 Condado
Description: This 50's inspired restaurant offers the best Puerto Rican comfort food. Enjoy the famous surtido jíbaro or an exquisite mofongo in a venue that will make you feel like you are in a Puerto Rican home.

Name: Shibō
Description: Shib is a Latin-Asian fusion paradise meant to be shared. The artfully crafted dishes are sizable and mouthwatering. When visiting, ask for the chef’s daily special and the delicious house drinks!

Name: Fillie's
Description: Fillie's is a casual place to eat burgers, tacos, wings and a wide selection of drinks. With a bar indoors, this restaurant gives you a great pub atmosphere in San Juan.

Name: El 8 de Blanco
Description: El 8 de Blanco is a three- floor convenient building for a good night out. In the first floor, you'll be able to get a drink in the bar and play some pool with college students. In the second floor, you'll find the restaurant. It has a diverse menu of pasta, hamburgers, sandwiches and other college lifestyle inspired food. In the third floor, you'll be able to eat in a terrace watching over Río Piedras or you will also be able to go to the bar and enjoy some chicken wings and beer while watching a game.

Name: Las Alitas Bar & Rest 181
Description: Las Alitas Bar&Rest 181 is the perfect place to satiate your wings, meat and chicken cravings. If that wasn't enough to win you over, they also serve cold beers and their original ice creams and cheesecakes for dessert.

Name: Punk Burger
Description: This popular restaurant has a punk vibe and you can enjoy burgers of all kinds. Try the unique combinations such as the salmon burger with blue cheese or the interesting and yummy black bean.

Name: The Beach House - Rincón
Description: Enjoy all that Rincón, Puerto Rico has to offer. Stay in one of our private luxury rentals, dine on our fresh market-driven menu, enjoy the entertainment & have a drink on the beach!

Name: La Jibarita
Description: La Jirabita is a magic and different bar with a lot of flavors. OPEN KITCHEN from 11am-9pm // Pizza, Burgers, Sliders & Tapas // Brunch Saturdays & Sundays from 11:00 am-3:00 pm. We serve Brick Oven Pizza, and have the Best Weekend Brunch in Mayagüez. Place is Beautiful and you will fall in love with our excellent staff.

Name: The Red Door Bar & Grill
Description: A new culinary experience in downtown Ponce. Explore Puerto Rico's culture while tasting our chef's creations. It's a small piece of old San Juan in Ponce.

Name: Atirantado Bar & Grill
Description: Atirantado Bar & Grill is a restaurant at the door to the mountain. From our establishment you can see on the right hand side the cable-stayed bridge of the town of Naranjito and Lake La Plata. Our establishment is located on the top of a mountain. We have recreational areas, an activities room and a wine cellar.

Name: HP Tavern
Description: Part tavern, part restaurant serving a variety of pizzas, burgers, and more. The venue is youthful and inviting, making it the perfect hang out spot!

Name: El Tap
Description: Just off of Calle Loíza in San Juan lies El Tap, offering 46 different beer, wine and sangria options - 18 of which are straight from local breweries! Whether kicking off a night of bar-hoping or just stopping in for a quick pint, El Tap has something for everyone. El Tap is open Sundays, Tuesdays and Wednesdays from 3-10PM, Thursdays from 3PM-12AM, and Fridays/Saturdays from 3PM-2AM. They are closed on Mondays.

Name: Levis El Rey De Churrasco
Description: This spot may be the home of the churrasco in Puerto Rico. Standout menu items include the angus churrasco with mofongo, and the delicious Caribbean Steak Sandwich.

Name: Prime Time
Description: Prime Time is a cozy sports bar where you can enjoy traditional Puerto Rican comfort food. This is a great spot to enjoy a cold beer, and a juicy cocktail while watching a game with friends.

Name: El Rincón Isleño Bar & Grill
Description: "Restaurante con una gran ambiente familiar conocido como "El Hogar del Mojito". Nos especializamos en carnes a la parrilla y marisco con ricas salsa hechas en casa. Nuestras facilidades son acogedoras al aire libre rodeado de una vista montañosa."

Name: Vidy's Café & Restaurant
Description: Vidy’s Café is an emblematic spot for college students in the University of  Puerto Rico in Río Piedras. Everyone has interesting stories of how they danced and partied the night away in el Vidy’s. During the day, Vidy’s works like a small restaurant with a diverse menu, from sandwiches to others Puerto Rican dishes. Likewise, you can go with your friends and refresh yourself with a beer and talk. During the night, Vidy’s turns into a dancefloor. Get your favorite drink and dance to electronic music, salsa, reggaetón, merengue and even bachata. Keep your eyes open!

Name: Costa Rican Cantina
Description: "We are a small place. But very cozy, we are half Costa Rican and half Puerto Rican. Our specialty is ceviche and seafood. We have pastries, stuffed arepas, wings, fish fingers and many more dishes. We are a "Chinchorro". We cook with a lot of love and respect our customers. Everything is of a high quality. It is always a pleasure to serve you."

Name: Piola Pizzería Artesanal
Description: A true culinary experience, Piola offers a fusion of Argentinean, Italian and Puerto Rican food. Aside from the famous pizzas Piola serves a variety of appetizers such as bruschettas and local empanadillas.

Name: El Axolote
Description: El Axolote is a unique Mexican restaurant specializing in flavors commonly found in Mexico City. The venue inspires conversations and is perfect if you're looking to have a relaxing evening and a delicious meal.

Name: Orale Güey Mexican Bar & Grill
Description: “Orale Güey Mexican Bar & Grill” is a restaurant open six days a week, with a wide variety of Mexican dishes ready to taste.

Name: Harry's Tacos
Description: Visit Harry's Tacos, the home of the "best taco in Puerto Rico".

Name: Huachinango - Guaynabo
Description: Mexican food restaurant with a great ambiance. Their margarita cocktails are very popular and a must-try.

Name: Tattoo Bar & Restaurant
Description: Located in the Poblado Boquero in Cabo Rojo, we offer a variety of Latin food and seafood. Our specialty is wings and drinks prepared by our bartenders. Come and visit us.

Name: Pizza e Birra
Description: In addition to their craft beers and thin crust artisan pizzas, Pizza e Birra offers a late-night culinary playground. The venue is dark and edgy, a perfect spot for a interesting first date.

Name: La Marea Bar and Seafood
Description: New restaurant offers a variety of fish and seafood dishes. The restauraunt offers an extensive and varied menu. The ambiance of the place will fascinate you.

Name: Parcela Gastropub
Description: For lovers of creative cuisine, Parcela Gastropub provides fun ambiance to enjoy a variety of unique dishes. The menu is fresh and changes according to the season, they also offer a wide selection of craft beers.

Name: Pirilo Pizza Rústica - San Juan/Ocean Park
Description: Pirilo Pizza in Ocean Park offers artisan pizzas, beverages and a variety of rich Italian and international dishes.

Name: Nacho Libre Cantina Mexicana - Hato Rey
Description: At Nacho Libre Mexican Cantina, we believe in giving people the freedom to choose. We are a company created by two young Puerto Rican entrepreneurs offering exquisite dishes inspired by the tradition of Mexican street cuisine. We pride ourselves in using only fresh ingredients and products to prepare recipes to the taste of each diner. What’s more, we provide a colorful and vibrant environment that creates a memorable culinary experience and makes our patrons want to return for more. At Nacho Libre, you choose it your way. #vivelibre

Name: Taquería Azteca
Description: What is incredible in Puerto Rico is our way of making other cultures food part of our day to day diet, by giving it our own twist. In Taquería Azteca, Mexico meets Puerto Rico to delight us with the best of the culture. Tacos, flautas, chimichangas, margaritas and a playlist of the best Mexican music. Enjoy Cinco de Mayo every day of the week!

Name: Musa Gastro Pub
Description: Musa is a chic gastro pub where you can enjoy everything from tapas and cocktails to upscale seafood dishes. This is definitely the place where art meets food in the heart of Santurce.

Name: Cinema Bar 1950
Description: Cinema Bar 1950, Old San Juan is the only place in Puerto Rico where you can be served your typical puertorrican dishes, surrounded by this beautiful Island’s artistic history from the 1950’s and of all times; and at the same time enjoy excellent local, as well as international, films. Experience the variety of local flavors in a delightful scene in one of the most historically rich spots in the capital of the city, Cuartel de Ballajá. Facing the spectacular view of the Castillo San Felipe del Morro, among other prominent monuments of this wonderful metropolis.

Name: Garabatos Bar & Grill
Description: This captivating bar is serious about its music and atmosphere, often bringing live DJs. They also have a vast selection of late night food, including a sushi menu.

Name: Yolo Restaurant Bar
Description: Yolo seems mostly like a bar, but also offers a great variety of delicious dishes too, from a selection of drinks and wine, and even has monthly lunch specials to choose from.

Name: El Coco De Luis
Description: Famously known to have some of the best Mojitos in the island, El Coco is a bar representing all things in Puerto Rico, from the food to the music.

Name: Waiter's
Description: Waiter's is a small, but cozy restaurant, it also has a flawless menu of Puerto Rican cuisine. You will taste the delicious flavors of the fusion between African and Spanish food in all of the plates.

Name: Verde Mesa
Description: Verde Mesa is a charming restaurant located in a historic Old San Juan building, featuring a radical farm-to-table concept inspired by Puerto Rican traditions and global culinary influences, and adorned with antique decor and vibrant artwork, cultivating an intimate and romantic setting.

Name: Vittorino Trattoria
Description: A great variety of dishes to choose, offering from pasta, pizza, risotto and exquisite desserts.

Name: Jiro Sushi
Description: Jiro Sushi features an array of sushi and hand rolls, from Spicy Crab to Plantain Chicken. They also offer creative Thai tapas such as the Tuna Tartar and Satay Chicken.

Name: The Bookmark
Description: The Bookmark is a hybrid space that celebrates culture and literature. Bookstore and restaurant, both under one roof.

Name: Lote 23
Description: A place where you can find a variety of gastronomy selections and cultural events for everyone. Lote 23 is well-known for its unique essence and their diverse options for almost every pallet. Come by, and try something new you won't regret in Santurce!

Name: Abracadabra Counter Cafe
Description: Abracadabra is not only a restaurant. This restaurant is a creative space where people can enjoy a healthy culinary experience and outstanding local theater performances. Abracadabra serves a brunch menu, as well as other Caribbean delights in magical environment with circus-like decor.

Name: Sabrina Brunch & Bistro Bar
Description: Inspired by Audrey Hepburn, this chic bistro bar serves an extensive array of local and international cuisine. Offering live music, exquisite dishes, and located in the trendy Calle Loiza. Sabrina is the perfect spot for brunch with friends or a relaxed girl's night out.

Name: Cafetería San Felipe
Description: Serving Caribbean food to its finest, very delicious and well known by the locals from all around making them feel at home whenever they stop at the San Felipe Cafeteria.

Name: Cafetería Quisqueya
Description: While visiting Loíza, Cafetería Quisquella is a mandatory stop for exquisite Caribbean cuisine. The casual dining room reflects the spirit of the locals. You will most likely see people enjoying a cold beer and dancing to tropical music.

Name: Café Marquesa
Description: Café Marquesa offers a wide variety of dishes like pastas, burgers, Caribbean food, sandwiches, among other dishes. In the end, you can finish with a little coffee for your enjoyment.

Name: Café Sidibou
Description: At Café Sidibou they put the Caribbean touch in Mediterranean food. You should also visit Café Sidibou to enjoy a seasoned falafel sandwich or baklava for those with a sweet tooth.

Name: Más Café
Description: Más Café serves typical Puerto Rican food to its finest. Food offered ranges from seafood to traditional dishes at a good price, and they also provide everyday specials.

Name: Pomarrosa Restaurante
Description: Pomarrosa is a restaurant with an incredible atmosphere to eat with friends, have a coffee or a drink and enjoy music.

Name: Cocobana Café
Description: Cocobana is the place to enjoy delicious vegan Caribbean food. They are known for their fresh milkshakes prepared with coconut milk and their small community library!

Name: Ana's Cafe
Description: A local place that makes you feel part of the Puerto Rican life. Ana’s serves a variety of dish options, from steaks to seafood at a great price.

Name: Pastelillería La Bodega
Description: La Bodega is one of the best bakeries in San Juan, with a fast service while enjoying your sandwiches, pastries, and a good coffee.

Name: Café La Reserva
Description: You can find this cozy coffee shop next to the Reserva Natural de Humacao. In Café La Reserva, you can enjoy your acai or coffee in their pleasant outdoor area.

Name: El After Lounge
Description: This restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner and it also has a cocktail and coffee bar. Walk-ins are welcome, but they also take reservations and groups. The restaurant offers a family-friendly environment and take-out is also available.

Name: el mezzanine
Description: El Mezzanine is a Puerto Rican deli that has been open since 1997 in San Juan, Puerto Rico. Enjoy the delicious breakfast, nutritious oatmeal, take advantage of our famous "caldo gallego", soups, crispy croquettes, their daily special, local dishes, a variety of 20 sandwiches, natural juices, and our 100% Puerto Rican coffee.

Name: Waffler Avenue
Description: Waffler Avenue feels like a sophisticated coffee shop serving delicious waffles. The coffee is 100% Puerto Rican brought from the farms in the town of Lares.

Name: Caffé Melanzana
Description: Caffé Melanzana has some of the greatest food joints you can find in Miramar.  You can go for sandwiches to their specialty plates, it is more than just a coffee shop, they even serve alcoholic drinks.

Name: Café Paraíso
Description: They offer dishes from pasta, burgers, soup, drinks to desserts, located near Rio Piedras train station.

Name: Café Finca Cialitos
Description: You don't have to stray far in order to live one of the most authentic coffee experiences in Puerto Rico. Finca Cialitos, which sits right on San Francisco Street, prides itself in its never-blended, perfectly-roasted, 100% arabiga coffee from southern Puerto Rico. If you're serious about coffee, ask for a macchiato (an espresso shot topped with a teaspoonful of frothed milk) so that you can taste the complex, fruity notes that this exquisite coffee delivers. You can also refresh yourself with an iced coffee or get a boost from a latte, all are equally delicious.

Name: Café D'Luna
Description: At Café D'Luna, the menu is comprised entirely of Caribbean culture. They offer fresh traditional dishes such as mofongo and fried pork.

Name: Cafelados - Aguada
Description: Cafelados in Aguada, is a coffee shop where we would share our knowledge as certified baristas and our passion for the coffee. With the idea of satisfying the needs of the consumer with a variety of products, a variety of flavors and top quality to delight your palate. Products such as Cafelados, Coffee, Pizza, Wraps, Sandwiches, Desserts, Quesadillas and Snacks. We currently have a very diverse and demanding clientele, who get up every day thinking about the flavor they will find in our house called Cafelados.

Name: La Vista Latin Grill - Marriott & Stellaris Casino
Description: Besides a grill and bar, they have a wide variety of dishes to offer like breakfast, dinner and an amazing buffet that you just can't get enough of.

Name: La Cueva del Mar - Caguas
Description: La Cueva del Mar Restaurant specializes in seafood dishes prepared in the Island's distinctive “criollo” style. If you're craving fresh seafood then this is the place to visit. The menu also includes beef, pork and chicken dishes.

Name: Denny's
Description: Denny’s is an international restaurant open 24 hours 7 days a week, with a large variety of breakfast, burgers, sirloins and desserts.

Name: Los Pinos Café
Description: Many people flock to this restaurant for its authentic Caribbean home cooking. A restaurant that is always open, 24 hours 7 days a week, with a wide selection of your favorite local dishes. When visiting, try the "Shrimp stuffed Mofongo with Mamposteao rice".

Name: Restaurante Doña Ana - Bayamón
Description: Originally called El Gran Café, for over 30 years our restaurant has been serving patrons with the best of Puerto Rican cuisine. Founded in 1972 by Doña Ana and Lucy, on the current Doña Ana restaurant we honor their legacy and continue to serve the same delicious food that first made us a staple of Bayamón. Among the must-try of the Doña Ana restaurant are the rice and beans and the chuck shoulder steak ("bistec encebollado").

Name: Ruben's Café - Santurce
Description: This modest Café offers exquisite Puerto Rican food. They serve fresh seafood and delicious comfort food, all in a fun and friendly environment.

Name: La Cueva del Mar - Fajardo
Description: La Cueva del Mar Restaurant specializes in seafood dishes prepared in the Island's distinctive “criollo” style. If you're craving fresh seafood then this is the place to visit. The menu also includes beef, pork and chicken dishes.

Name: Martin's BBQ - Isla Verde Carolina
Description: Martin's BBQ is a Puerto Rican "cafeteria- style" establishment that specializes in "comida criolla"--our Puerto Rican staples. Their specialty is rotisserie chicken with a Caribbean twist. Here you can order yams, yucca, plantains, mofongo, green plantains in escabeche, and many other delicious sides.

Name: Mesón Sandwiches
Description: El Meson is well known internationally for making some of the greatest sandwiches you can ever have, leaving you wanting more after each bite.

Name: Ceviche By Totti
Description: One of the best food trucks on the island, Ceviche by Totti has some of the best ceviches in town--and for the best price! Try their fried yucca sticks, they're not to be missed!

Name: Café Tresbé
Description: Known for its youthful ambiance, a bright yellow trailer is home to Café Tresbé. This is the perfect place to enjoy local empanadillas or spicy fish tacos in sunny urban terrace.

Name: Ambience Lounge & Restaurant at Cielo Mar Hotel
Description: Ambience Lounge & Restuarant invites you to enjoy a new experience while you observe a breathtaking view of the ocean.

Name: Lupi's Mexican Grill and Sports Cantina
Description: One of the best places in Isla Verde to watch a boxing match with a margarita in hand is, without a doubt, Lupi's Mexican Grill and Sports Cantina. Come and enjoy some delicious Mexican dishes (i.e. nachos and enchiladas) and Puerto Rican favorites such as Mofongo. Moreover, this open-air cantina is the perfect spot for casual dining right in Isla Verde.

Name: Costa Restaurant
Description: An urban chic restaurant that specializes in international food, especially ceviche. A casual place with live shows and happy hour.

Name: Crush Juice Bar
Description: Crush Juice Bar specializes in healthy alternatives, and offer an extensive menu of fresh beverages and delicious food. The food is served in a trendy and friendly environment bowl, plus you do not have to sacrifice taste to enjoy a healthy meal.

Name: Burgers BLVD
Description: Burgers BLVD offers steakburgers, milkshakes, pastas, sandwiches, quesadillas and wraps! Kid's Menus are available! They also have friendly Prices.

Name: El Ikokal Con Pescaderia
Description: El Ikokal is a peculiar place in Humacao, as it doubles as a restaurant and fish market. If you want amazing seafood or want to take a look at what fish is available in the local vicinity, this is the place for you!

Name: BeShanti
Description: BeShanti describes itself as not only a restaurant, but a healthy lifestyle concept. As the pioneer of 100% cold-pressed juices in Puerto Rico, BeShanti continues its mission of building a healthier and happier community.
Street Address: 97 PR-2, La Galería de Suchville, Suite 105

Name: Acai #Selfie
Description: Acai #Selfie will win you over with their delicious acai bowls! They also offer smoothies, ice cream, baked potatoes and other goodies.

Name: Banana's Pure Acai Bowls
Description: Not only do Bananas Pure Acai Bowls prepare some of the finest looking Brazilian Style bowls in Humacao, they also serve amazing frappes and smoothies.

Name: Himalaya Ice Co.
Description: This ice cream parlor will probably surprise you, not only because of its décor, (reminiscent of a 19th century train headed to Nepal) but because of the handmade rolled ice cream they serve. After mixing the ice cream, the employee will slather a thin layer of the mix on an ice-cold stone slab with a spatula. Then, they will scrape the paper-thin ice cream into four tight rolls. It’s a mesmerizing process, so make sure not to miss it!

Name: Crepes by Us
Description: Crepes by Us is the definite crepe and brunch place in Humacao. Its crown crepes, which are prepared both for dessert and regular meals, are served with a distinct flair of Criollo identity. The place also serves coffee, beers, wings, among other things.

Name: El Gigante Dormido - Bayamón
Description: This restaurant specializes in Creole cuisine and there are pork cakes all year round. The menu includes, veal to the cauldron, pork legs with chickpeas, leg of lamb, serenade with cod. The sangria is good and there are generous portions. There's a Christmas Party every Saturday from 10am-5pm! Enjoy a dynamic and friendly atmosphere in El Gigante Dormido restaurant, located in Bayamón.

Name: Mr. Frost Ice Cream Rolls
Description: Mr. Frost is not your typical ice cream shop. They serve ice cream rolls and their own specialty ice cream. The shop also serves crepes, acai bowls, coffee and other goodies.

Name: La Frutera - Mayagüez
Description: Our unique formula is made with the highest quality fresh fruits, some grown on our farms and others purchased from local farmers. The fruit is cut and carefully processed daily to maintain quality and freshness. Each frappe or salad is prepared at the moment, depending on the flavor or the preferred combination that our clients wish to make.

Name: Temptation Frappe
Description: Delicious frappés and limbers prepared to your liking. More than 50 main flavors, unlimited combinations of frappés(whatever the client wants)and a variety of limbers with tropical flavors. We also have sweets & soft drinks.

Name: Below Zero
Description: Below Zero is a small ice cream parlor that draws big crowds for their delicious rolled ice cream. The process of watching the frozen treat being stirred in a frozen surface, is just as fun as eating it after!

Name: Señor Paleta - Lote 23
Description: Our 4th paletería is located in the hip and vibrant neighborhood of Santurce in Lote 23, a food and bar truck haven and the perfect spot to spend with friends and family. Enjoy the cool and happening atmosphere with a refreshing paleta in hand! We specialize in creamy and fruity frozen desserts on a stick, made with high quality, natural ingredients. Get to know the JOY of Señor Paleta, we're here to make you smile! Lote 23, Santurce location hours: Monday-CLOSED Tuesday, Wednesday & Sunday: 12pm-10:00pm Thursday-Saturday 12:00pm-12:00am

Name: Señor Paleta - Old San Juan
Description: Our first paletería was founded in 2014 on Calle de Tetuán in Old San Juan. Enjoy a refreshing paleta while strolling through the cobblestone streets of this historic neighborhood, rich with stories. Even better went spent with the ones you love. We specialize in creamy and fruity frozen desserts on a stick, made with high quality, natural ingredients. Get to know the JOY of Señor Paleta, we're here to make you smile. Old San Juan location hours: Monday-Sunday 10:30am-10:00pm

Name: La Tiendita Típica
Description: La Tiendita Tipica is a traditional Puerto Rican desserts, candy and cheese store. It specializes in Limbers, Puerto Rican shaved ice named Piraguas, fresh ingredients, natural coconut milk, and they have 21 flavors!

Name: Bar La Unidad
Description: La Unidad is a high quality cocktail bar located in Miramar.  They offer exquisite cocktails in a relaxed yet romantic atmosphere.

Name: Panadería La Catalana Inc
Description: The Bakery La Catalana Inc. offers delicious bread, mallorca's and hand-made candies that are baked daily.

Name: Punta Diamante Bakery
Description: Enjoy breakfast, sandwiches, freshly baked bread, coffee and pastries at Punta Diamante Bakery.

Name: Panadería Siglo XXI
Description: Hot and fresh bread available all day, as well as sandwiches and pastries.

Name: La Península Panadería y Repostería
Description: La Peninsula es una panadería clásica que se inspira en las tiendas de pan y dulces tradicionales que se encuentran en los pequeños pueblos europeos. Con más de 50 años de servicio en Puerto Rico, La Peninsula se especializa en la elaboración de dulces típicos, sándwiches y comida criolla.

Name: Facciola Panadería y Repostería
Description: Facciola es una panadería clásica inspirada en las tiendas de pan y dulces que se encuentran en los pequeños pueblos Europeos. En Facciola le ofrecemos a nuestros clientes una gran variedad en panes, sándwiches, desayunos, almuerzos y postres con la mejor calidad del mercado utilizando productos 100% boricuas.

Name: Lucia Patisserie
Description: Located in Miramar, and even though it is virtually unknown, Lucia Patisserie is visited by locals who want to eat their delicious gourmet pastries, both sweet and savory.

Name: Strawberry Farm
Description: Everything is Strawberry here! They sell the most beautiful pastries and strawberry arrangements.

Name: Panchy's Tropical Food & Bakery
Description: The smell of recently brewed coffee, cinnamon, hot oatmeal, fresh bread and sweet pastries will make your mouth watery, but will definitely warm your heart.  In Panchy’s Bakery, you will find all your sweet desires delivered to you with a smile.  From a hot, complete breakfast to delicious sweets, Panchy’s will help you start your day in Río Piedras, full of adventures and with a warm and good feeling.

Name: Panaderia Borinquen
Description: In the Bakery and Confectionery Borinquen, you will find delicious bread, sweets and very helpful employees willing to help you in everything you need.

Name: Florida Bakery
Description: Bakery, cafeteria, and pastry shop serving the town of Ponce for more than 30 years.

Name: Panadería & Repostería Glenview
Description: Glenview Bakery offers the finest quality products from the bakery and cake shop.

Name: Panadería La Borinqueña - Ponce
Description: Founded in 1982, La Borinqueña is known for their delicious bread and pastries, which are baked fresh every day.

Name: La Bombonera
Description: La Bombonera is temporarily closed.

Name: Panadería San Agustin 2 - Juana Díaz
Description: Nuestra especialidad por años el mejor PAN DULCE de todo Puerto Rico! Pastelería y repostería fresca.

Name: Panadería y Repostería La Nueva Modelo
Description: Come and try our gigantic sandwiches, and our delicious pastries and cakes.

Name: Pastelillos Lamboy
Description: Pastelillos Lamboy is home to Manatí's famous flaky "pastelillos," and their traditional filling of ground beef and potatoes.

Name: Panadería y Repostería Le Patissier
Description: Sit down and relax with a good breakfast sandwich, accompanied with hot coffee.  Lunch time?  Come by and order our famous Tripleta or a classic Cuban sandwich.

Name: Panadería Kresto & Denia
Description: At Kresto & Denia, you'll find delicious high-quality pastries as well as sandwiches and other bakery staples.

Name: Panadería y Repostería La Imperial - Ponce
Description: Founded in 1975, La Imperial, more than a bakery, is a Ponceño icon and the home of the best water bread in Puerto Rico for many locals.

Name: Utopía Café
Description: Utopía, established in 1996 in the heart of Ponce, is a store dedicated to selling gifts & souvenirs.  Inside, Utopía Café also serves Puerto Rican coffee & food.

Name: Calaff Pastries
Description: Founded by Jayleen Calaff in 2015, Calaff Pastries is the first pastry shop specialized in whoopies with more than 20 different flavours including our favorite and specialty Pumpkin Whoopie. Other favorite whoopies flavors that we have in store are: Charlotas, Ferrero and Nutella, Red Velvet, Lemon with Meringue, Almond with Guava, Almond with Coconut, Almond with Nutella, Coconut with Baileys, Chocolate, Oreo, and many more. Come and visit our store and try the best whoopies in all of Puerto Rico.

Name: Double Cake
Description: Double Cake is a pastry shop that stands out for its new twist to classic desserts. Visit them and enjoy a sweet and cozy atmosphere.

Name: La Casa de los Flanes y Bizcochos
Description: Over 40 years of tradition and typical Puerto Rican flavor. Serving quality and daily freshness!!

Name: Teefrans Bakery
Description: Teefrans has been open since 1970. They serve breakfast, lunch, dinner and coffee. You'll also find a fresh variety of fresh miscellaneous products, pastries and decorative cakes,

Name: Puerto Rico Bakery
Description: A Puerto Rico in taste, our specialty are all kinds of bread, cheesecake, sandwiches, cheeses, grocery effects and lunch every day.

Name: Snow Bakery
Description: Owners for 3 years, Snow Bakery has become the preferred bakery in the community. We are part of the popular route of "Paseo Panorámico Sabor del Campo". We have our "Placita Snow Bakery" where we sell vegetables such as yams, bananas, yautia, pumpkin, achiote, among other things. Come and visit us from Monday to Sunday from 5:30 am to 9:00 pm.

Name: Panadería España
Description: For decades, Panadería España has been a favorite amongst the locals and visitors who love its legendary Cubano sandwich or fabada bean soup, and its Caldo Gallego. Here, you can have a great breakfast and buy a few pastries and Spanish imports as well.

Name: Melsamar Bakery
Description: Enjoy the convenience of buying your food necessities at our mini market with a spacious parking area.  If you're feeling hungry, we also offer breakfast, lunch and sandwiches. Do you have a sweet tooth?  Grab one of our many desserts to sweeten your day.

Name: Kasalta Bakery
Description: Kasalta is a must for breakfast in Ocean Park.  They offer a delicious fusion of Spanish and Caribbean cuisine and feature local favorites such as Cuban sandwiches and Spanish mallorcas.  (Fun fact: President Barack Obama had breakfast here during his last visit to the island.)

Name: Vanilla Bean Cupcakery - Guaynabo
Description: Specializing in bakery, Vanilla Bean Cupcakery offers very tasty and original cakes, cupcakes and coffee too!

Name: Panificadora La Jerezana
Description: The Panificadora Jerezana has water-based bread, snacks, sandwiches and cheeses made with high-quality ingredients.

Name: El Bohío - Rincón
Description: El Bohio was established in 1991 and has been a local treasure to all surfers and locals alike!  Come for good drinks, good music and good vibes.

Name: Nagoya Sushi & Tiki Bar
Description: Considered the best sushi bar in the town of Condado, Nagoya Sushi & Tiki Bar offers a delicious Asian fusion. Tiki sushi bar offers great selections of fresh and authentic sushi, in an upbeat ambiance.

Name: Andy's Pub
Description: This is a nice pub where you can relax and have a drink while enjoying playing a game of pool with other people.

Name: La Taberna Lúpulo
Description: Puerto Rico's Premier Craft Beer Bar. 50 taps and 150 bottles of the finest Local, Belgian, English, German, and American Craft Beers and great pub food! Located on historic Calle San Sebastian in an open air colonial setting.

Name: Aibonito Beer Garden
Description: In Aibonito, this tavern specializes in craft beer and has a wide variety both bottled and on tap.

Name: Pool Players Factory
Description: This is a Billiard hall with 20 Diamond Tables; 14 nine-foot PRO-AM and 6 seven-foot Smart Tables. Enjoy the friends and family ambience while you play a game, enjoy a food and drink.

Name: Hollywood Café
Description: Stop by this local bar to enjoy good music and their happy hours. Hollywood Café also serves food.

Name: Stop & Go
Description: If you are visiting Condado, make sure you schedule a visit to Stop & Go.  This small food bar, serves delicious Caribbean comfort food, as well as popular international foods at an affordable price.

Name: Grass Lounge
Description: Grass Lounge is the ideal place to relax after a long work day. The garden themed walls and personalized service will make you feel like you're in a tropical paradise.

Name: 234 Happy Place
Description: Serving the usual local favorites and other Caribbean specialties. You may think this restaurant is not too different from others in the area.  However, as the name suggests, this place is about having a fun time and creating happy memories.  The food is made fresh and the local favorites all have a modern twist.  Enjoy your food while listening to some trendy music in the outdoor terrace.

Name: Cultura Bar Artesanal
Description: Cultura Bar Artesanal has 101 Mojito Recipes, 50 Margaria Recipes, Craft beer, delicious sangrias and tapas.

Name: El Mango Sport & Bar
Description: Whether you come for beer, domino games or slot machines, El MANGO is the place for you.  It 's especially recommended if you want to enjoy the local atmosphere.

Name: Sereno Beach Bar and Grill
Description: Sit, relax, have a parcha mojito while gazing at the ocean view at Sereno; located in La Concha Resort.

Name: Bar El Rubí
Description: El Rubi offers a unique cocktail experience. The location is trendy and the drinks are delicious. This is a perfect place for a fun date, or a night out with the girls.

Name: Esquina Watusi
Description: The Watusi is a dive bar found in the Santurce area of San Juan. The spot is small, but it's a beloved hangout location for locals who from Thursday to Friday, take over the streets that are adjacent t to El Watusi. On Thursday nights, local "plena" musicians play their music, making it the perfect opportunity for enjoying traditional Puerto Rican music and culture.

Name: Los Tres Cuernos
Description: During the last decade, Los Tres Cuernos has cemented its reputation as one of the locals’ favorite bars in Old San Juan. Its inexpensive drinks, lively environment and fun décor offer one of the most authentic nightlife experiences in the old city.

Name: Video Bar
Description: This local bar has the nostalgic feeling of a dive bar: serving drinks, dim lights, jukebox in the wall and pool tables too.

Name: Taberna Los Vazquez
Description: This emblematic bar is one of the many spots at La Placita where you can enjoy local beers while practicing your salsa steps. They often have live salsa, karaoke nights, and happy hours.

Name: El Bar Bero
Description: If you’re a fan of history and creative spaces, Bar Bero is the place for you.  This unique cocktail bar accentuates traditional local culture and is also home to a barber shop.  You can experiment a variety of mixed drinks while sitting in barber styled chairs from different periods in time. This is truly a remarkable experience!

Name: Café Toñita's
Description: This is the ideal place for a cold beer and some of the best Caribbean comfort food.  Toñita's Café is located in the emblematic Placita in Santurce, a great spot for a night out.

Name: El Local
Description: El Local, with its authentic slogan "flaquear no es una opción" (which loosely translates to "wavering is not an option"), is a local's favorite dive bar located at the heart of Santurce. This is where local bands get a chance to perform.  They have activities everyday for the crowd, including a Karaoke Tuesday.

Name: El Nie Bar
Description: The Nie bar serves drinks, food, with board and console games and other sporting events.

Name: Rumors
Description: Rumors Bar and Bistro is a small bar with a friendly atmosphere where you can enjoy a cocktail with friends.

Name: El Garabato
Description: The original El Garabato, founded in 1977, closed its doors in 2018, but will reopen under a new owner.

Name: Mamiecoyle Sport Bar
Description: Enjoy the ocean view and family atmosphere!  Located behind the post office in front of the pier of Punta Santiago.  There is ample parking.

Name: Picante Lobby Bar and Grill
Description: A nightlife hotspot in San Juan, our innovative lobby bar and lounge features music and exotic Caribbean cocktails in a vibrant and tropical atmosphere. Consistently drawing a full crowd every weekend with its music, dancing and happy hour specials, Picante is the place to be!
Street Address: 7012 Boca de Cangrejos Avenue Carolina, 00979, Puerto Rico

Name: The Lobby at Fairmont El San Juan Hotel
Description: Fairmont El San Juan Hotel creates an atmosphere of convivial camaraderie for locals and travelers alike. Made iconic by the people, parties, and performances that defined El San Juan nightlife beginning in the roaring ’60s, the hotel’s jovial spirit lives on in its imaginative and intimate bars. Food, drink, and diversion come in a variety of settings, each exuding joie de vivre reflective of Puerto Rico’s island culture.

Name: El K'Rajo Beach Bar
Description: El K'rajo Beach Bar is a fun, bohemian shack where you can order a refreshing shrimp salad with pico de gallo and fried yuquitas (a delicious yuca snack-- they're like cassava french fries) while you enjoy an ice-cold piña colada or the local beer. Located a few steps away from Aviones Beach, this is the perfect spot to take a break from catching waves and sunbathing.

Name: Port O'Call
Description: Port O'Call is a sports bar and an excellent place to spend a quiet night with friends.

Name: The Wine Boutique
Description: The Wine Boutique in Isabela serves a wide variety of wines accompanied by delicious tapas.

Name: La Penúltima
Description: La Penúltima serves about everything to welcome all customers, from seafood to beef, hamburgers and even tacos.

Name: Beach Bohio Palmas del Mar
Description: Beach Bohio is a food shack that offers delectable drinks and seafood in front of Palmas del Mar. The view is enough to make it worth the trip.

Name: The Mezzanine
Description: You'll find this charming cocktail bar on the second floor of a historic building in Old San Juan. Go up the stairs in the front, and walk into the perfect Old San Juan spot. Grab a small table in one of the balconies, order your favorite cocktail, and enjoy the Caribbean breeze.

Name: Cafetería Ramos
Description: Cafetería El Domplin is a cafeteria with a family atmosphere. Enjoy creole food, drinks, and fried foods.

Name: Cafetería Punto Once
Description: Cafetería Punto Once specializes in sandwiches, fritters, lunches, and seafood salads. At this cafeteria, you'll also find vegetarian options and outdoor seating that's accessible to wheelchairs.

Name: Cafeteria El Oasis
Description: Cafeteria El Oasis specializes in Creole, mofongo, seafood and more. It offers catering service and delivery for all occasions.

Name: Chivas Café
Description: At Chiva’s Café, you can find lunch specials from Monday to Saturday. Some of the things they offer are chicken rinds, fried meat, mofongos, and seafood. They also offer sandwiches of all kinds and a variety of beers.

Name: Cafetería El Domplin
Description: Cafetería El Domplin is a recently renovated cafeteria with a family atmosphere. Enjoy a wide variety of exquisite, filled dumplings.

Name: El Criolllo Sandwich
Description: Enjoy breakfast all day with the family at El Criollo Sandwich Inc. Their XL sandwiches are our specialty. They also serve Churrasco, steaks and more.

Name: Cafetería Mi Berjori
Description: Cafetería Mi Berjori's funky name is a combination of the names of its three founders. Appropriately, this family-owned cafeteria serves breakfast and lunch, specializing on their twist of Criollo food.

Name: Cafetería el Capitán
Description: Cafetería el Capitán is an inexpensive place for great Criollo food.  It is located near Humacao's downtown area.

Name: Cafetería Mallorca
Description: The sweet smell of freshly-baked mallorcas flood the cafetería. A man comes out of the kitchen with an aluminum tray laden with golden buns, soon to be heavily sprinkled with granulated sugar.

Name: Restaurant Don Juan
Description: This is a Creole food restaurant where you will find a delicious meal and sweets in a family atmosphere.

Name: La Fiebre Speed Bar
Description: Enjoy delicious food with the marvelous view of the sea coast of Añasco.  This location is perfect for bringing your family for lunch, dine with your partner for a relaxing evening, or have a active night out full of dance and live music.

Name: ¡Qué Barbaridad!
Description: This is creative chinchorro food that will cause an explosion of flavors with products from the patio.

Name: Restaurant El Chinchorro
Description: Nuestra especialidad son mariscos frescos. La oferta gastronómica incluye: carnes, mofongos rellenos, picaderas y más. Ubicados en el Malecón de Juana Díaz y desde el tablado puedes disfrutar la vista hacia la isla Caja de Muerto. Ambiente familiar y servicio de calidad. Visítanos en Facebook: Restaurant El Chinchorro.

Name: Julio's Sport Bar
Description: Julios Sports Bar in Villa Pesquera Isabela where you can find Organic Greens, Octopus Salad, Homemade Sauces, Fresh Food, Liquor, Ice Cold Beer and Frappes.

Name: La Lomita - Bayamón
Description: La Lomita was founded in 1958 and since that day it has never been closed. The specialty of the house is the Muslito Relleno (boneless chicken thigh stuffed with ham and cordon blue mozzarella cheese) as well as the wide variety of Creole foods and typical drinks. This business is a historic one since the current management has operated it for more than 35 years.

Name: Rancho Brisas
Description: Rancho Brisas is a chinchorro located in the town of Lares. We have live music, delicious assortments prepared at the moment and always cold drinks. Come and visit us so that you have a first-class experience.

Name: Lechonera Reyes 2
Description: Explore a wide range of delicious flavors with our selection of Puerto Rican cuisine, sandwiches, pork dishes, and carbon-roasted turkey.

Name: Armando's Place
Description: A lesiruely Sunday doesn't have a price.  With exceptional service, Armandos' place offers rich pastries, seafood dishes, live music and a bar.

Name: Rancho Grande Bar & Sea Food
Description: This location has the best Creole food and the best view of the sea in Añasco with live music every Sunday.

Name: Parada Típica
Description: A typical experience from the moment you arrive to the palate. Open 7 days a week from 10AM to 10PM. Frappes, Guarapo de Cana, Typical Sweets, Natural Juices, A la carte food, Handicrafts.

Name: Cafecito del Bosque
Description: This small cafe is located right next to Las Cabañas Doña Juana, a famous restaurant in the town of Orocovis. Coffee at this little spot has been roasted in the mountains of nearby Barranquitas. The menu includes a variety of coffee choices, frappes, frappés, cupcakes, waffles, and Puerto Rican pastries like mallorcas.

Name: Bohío de Papá Andrés
Description: Relaxing spot to bring your family and try the best rabbit turnovers in Añasco! Easily park your car in our wide parking area and distract yourself while playing billiards or singing along your favorite song at karaoke.

Name: Ojalá Speakeasy Bar
Description: We are a Bar & Restaurant that's been open since November 2014 and we have the best atmosphere, music, and we always offer the highest quality of food and cocktails. Our gastronomic proposal focuses on creative "criollo" cuisine and on weekends we also serve a varied brunch menu. We also have a wide variety of tapas and main dishes.

Name: Tattoo Tavern
Description: Tattoo Tavern is a beachfront Gastropub and Tattoo Parlor in the Luquillo Kiosks. (The Tattoo Parlor is not currently operating). Tattoo Tavern offers a wide variety of local and imported craft beer. Bottled or on tap, you're guaranteed to find one you'll enjoy. If cocktails are more your thing our bartenders are prepared to make your drink of choice or give it their own twist and they love a challenge so, make it good!

Name: La Bodeguita Del Medio
Description: La Bodeguita Del Medio is a friendly bar located at La Placita. This bodega styled bar is a sanctuary for locals and travelers alike who want to enjoy fresh cocktails and good Latin music.

Name: Bar El Topo
Description: Bar el Topo is both a bar and a chinchorro.  If you want to grab an inexpensive beer or drink in a local atmosphere, this is the place to go.

Name: Doctor Lechón
Description: This is the place to enjoy delicious roast port, smoked meat and Creole food. It's truly a wonderful experience for the whole family.

Name: El Limón
Description: El Limón is a food stand in Punta Santiago, Humacao that serves fried food and beer.  This place also doubles as a restaurant that serves other types of Criollo food and sauté inside the venue.

Name: La Parrilla Restaurant Kiosko #2
Description: There is Seafood, Puerto Rican and Creative Cuisine at La Parrilla Restaurant Kiosko #2, located in the Kiosks of Luquillo Beach.  The menu includes everything from lobster, seafood, grill, steaks and more.

Name: Edelweiss Bar & Grill
Description: At Edelweiss Bar & Grill Restaurant you will find the best Puerto Rican cuisine creole style and fresh seafood. Enjoy a family atmosphere near the sea at Kiosko #38 in Luquillo, Puerto Rico. We have a variety of craft beers, house drinks and amazing dishes. We’re waiting for you!

Name: 123 Pescao
Description: Ambiente familiar con vista al mar. Disfruta de nuestras picaderas, cervezas frías y música en vivo todos los fines de semana.

Name: Terruño Comida Artesanal
Description: Found in the famous Kioskos de Luquillo, a semi-outdoor roadside strip of restaurants, Terruño is a favorite with locals and tourists alike. The restaurant specializes in the preparations of meats and fresh seafood, as well as the confection of hare in various ways.

Name: Aroma Café
Description: Stop at Aroma Cafe for a quick breakfast, coffee or snack. Located in the lobby area of La Concha Resort.

Name: Paulina Escanes Gourmandize
Description: A home-like experience where you can find Paulina baking pastries and making coffee. Enjoy a snack or a specialty dish at their dining room. There are seasonal decorations, plus explore their clothing selection and other home appliances to buy.

Name: Caficultura
Description: The pungent aroma of coffee floats in the checkered-floored, spacious Caficultura... Waiters waltzing around with trays laden with spinach and egg casseroles, banana-rum pancakes and sweet potato crepes... The lively chatter of the clients and the whirring and hum of the cherry-red La Marzocco permeate throughout the establishment... Without a doubt, coffee reigns sovereign at Caficultura. On sunny humid days try the Affogato, a delicious glass filled with ice cream and an espresso shot.

Name: Café Teatro Tierra Luna
Description: A cozy restaurant that also functions as a comedy club, small theater, and music venue. The space is available for rent for both family and corporate events.

Name: Café Lucero
Description: Café Lucero Restaurant offers delicious dishes with various options, including vegetarian dishes, drinks, and exquisite coffee, harvested in Ponce. In a family atmosphere, they have a catering service, and wheelchair access.

Name: Café Comunión
Description: Coffee shop located in Río Piedras.

Name: Icons Espresso Bar
Description: This isn't an average coffee shop. They bring people something different and something that everyone can enjoy. At Icons Espresso Bar, they try to bring creativity to something as simple as a cup of coffee, breakfast or a brunch plate by creating an environment that welcomes anyone and everyone, and by providing unique drinks and plates that are truly iconic.

Name: The Coffee Spot - Aguadilla
Description: The need to unwind with a good cup of coffee, is the best excuse to visit a coffee shop. Our foremost goal is for you to drink a cup of coffee as in your own living room, with friends, or in a business meeting. Edgar Rios and Willie Florenciani, two friends that share their love for coffee, sales and music, accepted a proposal to start an adventure called The Coffee Spot. Some of the go to activities in The Coffee Spot you can enjoy are browsing the internet, study for an exam, play board games or listen to music in our acoustic piano.

Name: It's Coffee Time
Description: This is great place to share a cup of premium coffee with friends, family or colleagues. There are also delightful sandwiches, wraps, salads, pastries, drinks and more.

Name: Don Cocó Coffee Shop
Description: This is a coffee shop that serves sandwiches, wraps, frappes, salads and coffee.

Name: Blanco & Negro Coffee Shop & Pastelria
Description: This is a local business specializing in pastries and coffee. They serve espresso-based drinks, using coffee from Puerto Rico prepared by our baristas.

Name: Buen Vecino Café
Description: We opened the doors of our house in 2014 to serve the entire community. We have different spaces, from a private dining room to an open terrace. Come and enjoy your coffee, brunch, burger, beer and dessert. Buen Vecino Café is located in the center of Hato Rey, it has baristas dedicated to serving you the best Puerto Rican artisan coffee. Our menu includes a variety of brunch, burgers, breakfasts, sandwiches, wraps, beers, desserts and much more in a community atmosphere. #Make yourself at home

Name: Café 413
Description: Everyone visiting Rincón will love this new casual restaurant in the center of the town. While the café’s laid back surfer style is welcoming, it’s the food that will win hearts. Café 413 opened its doors in February 2016 as a unique alternative for those seeking affordable dishes of healthy cuisine made from amazingly fresh ingredients!

Name: Café Nativo
Description: The store layout, menu listings, and family environment provide an intimate setting to catch up on reading or get together with friends. The menu offerings will be supplemented by free books and magazines related to the coffee industry around the world that customers can read inside the coffee bar. Nativo coffee shop offers espresso-based coffee drinks such as lattes, mochas, cappuccinos, etc, and in addition, brewing coffee methods.

Name: Café Regina
Description: Café Regina is a coffee stand that specializes in espresso and experimental coffee drinks. An explosion of flavor, they serve traditional coffee mixes and unique new flavors inspired by their famous coffee.

Name: Hacienda San Pedro
Description: Harvested in the mountain town of Jayuya, Hacienda San Pedro's coffee is a favorite among locals. Hacienda San Pedro is a four-generation artisanal coffee that's slightly sweeter than other roasts, with notes of chocolate and spices. Plan a visit to the plantation in Jayuya where you can take a tour of the grounds, learn about coffee production, and enjoy lunch or a cup of coffee surrounded by the highest peaks of Puerto Rico.

Name: Hacienda San Pedro Coffee Shop
Description: Harvested in the mountain town of Jayuya, Hacienda San Pedro's coffee is a favorite among locals. Hacienda San Pedro is a four-generation artisanal coffee that's slightly sweeter than other roasts, with notes of chocolate and spices. Hacienda San Pedro also has coffee shops around San Juan and Guaynabo, where you can buy a few pounds of their coffee beans to take home or enjoy an expertly made latte.

Name: Almedas Coffee Shop
Description: Come and enjoy delicious homemade sweets and the rich taste of coffee at Almedas Coffee Shop. This is a family atmosphere with the commitment to provide you with excellent service.

Name: Café Cuatro Sombras
Description: One of the most popular coffee houses in Old San Juan is Cuatro Sombras, a place that prides itself on its farm-to-cup operation and the high quality of its single-origin 100% Arabica coffee beans from Yauco. Their medium-bodied brew has hints of semi-sweet chocolate, spices, and caramel flavors. The trendy shop also serves sandwiches, paninis, salads, and pastries.

Name: Cafe Don Juan - Hato Rey
Description: Café Don Juan is a coffee shop that was born in 2012 founded by Juan Pablo Torres, a young barista dedicated for years to serving and exemplifying the culture of good coffee through his barista art. Our first location was located in the Señorial Plaza Shopping Center, where we dedicated ourselves to providing the experience of good coffee, desserts, and sandwiches. Today we have 8 different locations, offering a unique quality experience in every one of them.

Name: Gustos Coffee Co. - San Juan
Description: Gustos is a lovely coffee shop and bakery where you can enjoy delicious Puerto Rican coffee. The rustic and industrial design makes the venue feel cozy and welcoming. In addition, the coffee and baked goods are crafted with passion and contain local flavors.

Name: Gustos Coffee Co. Miramar
Description: Gustos is a lovely coffee shop and bakery where you can enjoy delicious Puerto Rican coffee. The rustic and industrial design makes the venue feel cozy and welcoming. In addition, every coffee and baked good is crafted with passion and have the edge of local flavors.

Name: Pa'l Café
Description: In need of delicious and gourmet coffee? Try the delightful Argentinian coffee from Pa'l Café. It is known as the best coffee in the "Universidad de Puerto Rico". A place where they give much more than great service, described by lots of people as the best coffee shop in the area and where the staff treats you like family. Order your coffee to your taste and accompany it with your favorite sandwich, muffin or pastry. Sit and feel the friendly environment and enjoy your coffee while admiring the architecture that surrounds the area at the University.

Name: ChocoLato
Description: Artisanal gelateria where you design your own dessert using our locally produced Italian gelato.

Name: Kamoli Kafé & Boutique
Description: Known for their food, fashion and juice bar, Kamoli Kafé & Boutique has vegan and gluten-free options including their well-known breakfast options and delightful dinners.
