Name: Dolche Salao
Description: Dolche Salao is a restaurant in the town of Yauco that specializes in creative breakfast/brunch and dinner options. The restaurant offers sit-down dining and to-go services. Additionally, the restaurant has space for corporate events, workshops, and social events.

Name: Nacho Libre Cantina Mexicana - Miramar
Description: At Nacho Libre Mexican Cantina, we believe in giving people the freedom to choose. We are a company created by two young Puerto Rican entrepreneurs offering exquisite dishes inspired by the tradition of Mexican street cuisine. We pride ourselves in using only fresh ingredients and products to prepare recipes to the taste of each diner. What’s more, we provide a colorful and vibrant environment that creates a memorable culinary experience and makes our patrons want to return for more. At Nacho Libre, you choose it your way. #vivelibre

Name: Guavate
Description: Known as the "pork highway," Guavate is a can't miss stop during your trip to Puerto Rico. Located in the mountainous town of Cayey, this unique gastronomical route is lined with traditional outdoor restaurants known as "lechoneras."

Name: La Vergüenza Puertorrican Chinchorro
Description: La Vergüenza Puertorrican Chinchorro is an ocean-view rooftop bar and restaurant with some of the best views of La Perla neighborhood and the Atlantic Ocean. The restaurant specializes in Puerto Rican and Caribbean cuisine, but it's also a great spot to just grab a local beer, sit back, and enjoy the views.

Name: La Terraza de Bonanza
Description: At La Terraza de Bonanza, you'll get the fully-fledged chinchorro experience— cheap beers, Puerto Rican fritters, and live music. Visit on Monday nights to enjoy live bomba music and dancing.

Name: Piso Viejo
Description: This bar is located in one of San Juan's hottest nightlife areas, Calle Loíza. Check out their social media pages for information on their live music nights, free salsa classes, and special happy hours.

Name: Hacienda Mi Remanso
Description: Hacienda Mi Remanso is an old tobacco hacienda with 50 acres of land located in the town of Caguas. The hacienda has a restaurant, bar, camping area, guest house, hostal, and an event space. Visitors of the hacienda can enjoy the outdoors by exploring the area's natural swimming pools, waterfalls, rivers, hiking paths, or by going fishing in the lake.

Name: Barullo Taberna Española
Description: Savor the delicious flavors of Spain at Barullo Taberna Española, located in DISTRITO T-Mobile in San Juan. Treat yourself to the finest tapas and cocktails at La Barra, and relish in the mouth-watering paella and fideuá at the Arrocería. At the Jamonería, indulge in the freshness and quality of Spanish hams, cheeses, and Cocas. Wine lovers can enjoy the incredible selection of over 20 delectable wines at the self-serve wine wall.

Name: Hook'd at Drift
Description: For the curious eater who wants to have the ultimate cultural experience while enjoying local fresh seafood, eats, and drinks in a beachfront bar and restaurant with a relaxed, cool & comforting ambiance. Come check out our 1st-floor bar and restaurant, ample second-floor deck with oceanfront seating, and our full-service beach chillout area. Fresh seafood, tropical local-inspired dishes with a Pacific twist. Freshly made juices, frappes, mocktails, and cocktails. Vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free friendly. In-house entertainment and events, come to eat, stay to play!

Name: Las Palmas Café at Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa
Description: Located at Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa, our alfresco eatery offers a relaxed ambiance, recently refreshed décor, and awe-inspiring views of the Caribbean; daily from 7:00 a.m. to 9:30 p.m. for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Name: La Cata by Restaurante Alexandra at Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa
Description: Located at the Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa and inside Restaurante Alexandra, La Cata is the ideal place for couples seeking an unforgettable dining experience!

Name: Restaurante Raíces - Caguas
Description: The taste of our island can be enjoyed in each of our specialties. Accompanied with our "mofongo", fried green plantains, or our typical rice and beans, you and your companions will experience the thrill of the unmistakable flavors of Puerto Rico. Enjoy all of our comfort and homely ambient. Whether for lunch, dinner or to have a friendly drink, our kind personnel will make your visit a memorable experience, you will remember, share, and surely will want to repeat.

Name: The Sangría Factory
Description: The Sangria Factory is the tasting room of Sangría Los Hermanos, an exquisite homemade sangria of fruity aroma, prepared with wine, local rum, tropical fruits, and natural ingredients of the highest quality. There you can enjoy different tastings accompanied by delicious local snacks. It is distinguished for the continuous innovation since 2014, the variety with over 12 flavors, the superior quality of our products, and for our services, such as the creation and development of private brands, tasting rooms, and private events.

Name: Huachinango - Caguas
Description: Huachinango is a Mexican restaurant with a great ambiance. Their margarita cocktail is very popular amongst its patrons.
Street Address: Centro de Bellas Artes de Caguas/ Performing Arts Center, Luis Padial Street corner Segundo Ruiz Bel

Name: Las Almojábanas - Caguas
Description: Almojábanas are an emblematic specialty of Caguas and they've been served for nearly 100 years. This Puerto Rican delight is a rice fritter stuffed with delicious cheese. You'll find them in a small colorful food stand that's located on the sidewalk that's right in front of Caguas' Tourist Information Office.
Street Address: 31 Luis Muñoz Rivera Street corner with Segundo Ruiz Belvis

Name: Caguas Food Park
Description: A great food truck park with a wide variety of food: from gourmet food, frappes, smoked meat, pizza, seafood, unique burgers to traditional Puerto Rico food. Some of the food trucks are: San Juan Frappés, Galaxy Burgers, Los Reyes de la Mofongo, Los Chorritos, El Vagón del Búho, Azol Cuisine, Las Caras Lindas, Supremos, Del Romano Pizza, and others.

Name: Nectar Acai & Lunch
Description: Nectar Acai & Lunch has a variety of nutritious meals that can be enjoyed all day long. A healthy and refreshing menu awaits you a few steps from Caguas' main town square. Nectar is famous for its spicy crab and grain salad as well as its rich variety of drinks, from 100% Arabic coffee to refreshing frappes. On your next visit to Caguas' urban center make sure to visit this spot.

Name: Pa' Cuba 1954
Description: A journey through time that will take you to Cuba in 1954. During your visit, you'll enjoy Cuba's gastronomy, live music, and festive atmosphere.

Name: Coffee at the View
Description: Come for the coffee, stay for the experience! Relax and enjoy a familiar-yet-cozy atmosphere with excellent service. Sip on various coffee beverages like hot lattes or refreshing caramel fraps while savoring a panini, biscotti, or rich madeleines. Find us across one of the most prominent shopping malls in Carolina; we’ll be happy to serve you! ¿Cafeteamos?
Street Address: Marginal Palmer 197 Calle 10, Suite 1A, Río Grande

Name: Ill Nuovo Mercato
Description: Il Nuovo Mercato is a food court with traditional Italian food. It is intended for VNP (very normal people), those seeking good taste, great quality, and to experience traveling through the flavors of the food without losing its essence and freshness. Il Nuovo Mercato offers variety in each of its bottegas, such as pizza, pasta, breads, gelato, meats, and seafood. Meanwhile, you can enjoy a natural infusion of fruits, a beer or a sparkling wine and cheese platter at the Prosecco Bar, with a stunning view towards Laguna San José.
Street Address: The Mall of San Juan Blvd

Name: Rare 125
Description: Ranked as one of the "hottest" restaurants in San Juan. Rare 125 offers an expense variety of carefully selected meat cuts for meat lovers. From our famous Beef Tenderloin Au Poivre to a one-of-a-kind wild-caught salmon filet. Options for everyone!

Name: Jamón Jamón Wine Bar & Grill
Description: With 20 years of experience cooking in the finest restaurants, our chef is excited to present their vision to you and all our guests. Our caring and committed staff will ensure you have a fantastic experience with us. Our restaurant is available for private events: weddings, business lunches, dinners, cocktail receptions, and more. We would love to discuss how to be a part of your next event.

Name: Innato
Description: Innato is a farm-to-table restaurant in the San Juan neighborhood of Miramar.

Name: Comedor Miramar
Description: Comedor is the new hip neighborhood spot in Miramar from local restaurateur Hugo Perez. Built on local, seasonal ingredients and warm hospitality, Comedor is where casual meets chic, and where customers become regulars. Fresh, bright and unexpected flavors is what Comedor is all about; from the food and cocktail menus to the interiors. Influenced by the strong commitment to local farmers, flavors and cuisine.

Name: Sal & Pimienta by the Sea
Description: Enjoy a delicious meal at one of Fajardo's best restaurants, Sal & Pimienta by the Sea. Whether you order meat or the catch-of-the-day, you'll love the explosion of flavors.

Name: La Hacienda Meat Center - Condado
Description: La Hacienda is an upscale neighborhood grocery store.They offer the freshest ingredients and they even have a deli where they serve subs, salads, and daily lunch. If you're a meat lover, La Hacienda is also the perfect place to find flavorful and juicy steaks!

Name: La Hacienda Meat Center - Dorado
Description: La Hacienda is an upscale neighborhood grocery store. They offer the freshest ingredients and they even have a deli where they serve subs, salads, and daily lunch. If you're a meat lover, La Hacienda is also the perfect place to find flavorful and juicy steaks!

Name: Restaurante Café 1984
Description: Café1984 Restaurant is a family-owned business. We want you to feel like you are part of our family and enjoy a delicious lunch or dinner.

Name: Baleares
Description: Baleares features international cuisine with a Mediterranean twist.

Name: Cafetería El Nuevo Coquí
Description: El Nuevo Coquí cafeteria offers breakfast, sandwiches, Creole food (varied menu every day), fritters, lunch boxes, catering services, cakes, beers, and drinks. Delivery service is available.

Name: Club Los Amigos de Freddy
Description: Club Los Amigos de Freddy offers specialty breakfast sandwiches of all kinds, seafood, and drinks. Enjoy a calm environment with your family and friends. Wheelchair access and parking available.

Name: El Pescador Bar & Grill
Description: It is a restaurant specializing in seafood, has an ocean view, and is a welcoming place for visitors or residents of Puerto Rico. It is open from Monday to Sunday, but its hours vary.

Name: Fusión Cuisine & Bar Restaurant
Description: Fusión Cuisine & Bar Restaurant is a family-friendly restaurant specializing in seafood and meat cuts.

Name: King's Cream - Ponce
Description: This ice cream spot is a mandatory spot when visiting Ponce's historic town square, Plaza las Delicias.

Name: La Nueva Pastelería
Description: La Nueva Pastelería is a concept created for those who seek a different environment and to feel at home. It transports us to the simplicity of enjoying a good coffee or ordering a pound of bread to take away. Enjoy the pastries, a menu with vegan options, wines, beers, tapas, and more.

Name: Coffee Bar by Ry Smart
Description: In Coffee Bar by Ry Smart, you will find a variety of delicious breakfasts, lunches, desserts, coffee and drinks. Enjoy a family atmosphere while you have breakfast or lunch.

Name: La Potoroca
Description: We celebrate the Puerto Rican character through typical dishes with a fun and experimental twist. Tapas, lunches, cocktails, and coffee.

Name: Sazón Criollo Taqueria
Description: Sazón Criollo Taquería is a family restaurant serving a variety of mexican and criollo fusion dishes and coctails in a great indoor and outdoor environment.

Name: Pueblas Crepas Mexican Grill - Galería MedCentro
Description: In Puebla Crepas Mexican Grill, you can enjoy the freshness of Mexican cuisine with a French touch in a refreshing environment, where music, family sharing, and excellent service is our greatest satisfaction.

Name: Azuk Fine Coffee & Bistro
Description: Azuk is a high-end coffee shop with a variety of four selections of coffees, wines, champagne, cocktails, craft beers, a selection of fourteen tapas, soups, and more. We serve breakfast, lunch, brunch, and desserts. Vegetarian options, free internet, wheelchair access, and outdoor tables available.

Name: Café Dolce & Amargo & More
Description: Café Dolce & Amargo and More makes 100% natural juices without preservatives, smoothies, and fruit salads, Espresso coffee, and other foods.

Name: Colao Espresso Bar
Description: Colao Espresso Bar is a coffee shop on wheels. Enjoy its tasty breakfasts, coffees, drinks, and desserts in a familiar and pleasant atmosphere. Home delivery is offered, and you can also eat on the premises.

Name: Chango Bar
Description: A local bar dedicated to the music of the '80s and '90s
Street Address: friendly atmosphere with cold drinks to enjoy.

Name: Azafrán Urban Eatery
Description: We serve meat, seafood, vegetarian paellas, grouper or shrimp ceviche, and much more. We offer catering services for corporate activities, weddings, Sweet 16th, private parties in all Puerto Rico.

Name: Tasajo
Description: Caribbean Cuban cuisine.

Name: Café Melao Coffee Shop
Description: Melao Coffee Shop offers a wide and delicious variety of breakfasts, sandwiches, pizza, burgers, salads, and fresh cupcakes. We have vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free options.

Name: Coffee House Bistro & Protein Shakes
Description: Coffee House Bistro & Protein Shakes is a business that sells gourmet coffee, protein shakes, and healthy food. In a friendly and familiar atmosphere, you will enjoy a good cup of coffee from the country and a great variety of sandwiches.

Name: El Paraíso Fonda Criolla & Bar
Description: Enjoy Puerto Rican food with a homemade style.

Name: Tropical Café & Bar
Description: Tropical Café & Bar offers breakfast, lunch, and snacks. Come and enjoy a family-friendly environment.

Name: Taquería Monterrey
Description: Taquería Monterrey is a gastronomic project based on the traditional and artisan cuisine of the city of Monterrey in Mexico.

Name: Wood Sport Bar & Grill
Description: We have a variety of liquors, beers, and an entertainment area. Come and enjoy our delicious cuisine.

Name: Wood Doughnuts
Description: We specialize in artisan donut creations, bringing happiness and sweetness to your palates.
Street Address: PR-2 Next to the Puma station

Name: JohnTin Café
Description: At JohnTin Café, you will find a wide variety of delicious breakfasts, sandwiches, lunches, coffee, drinks, and desserts in a pleasant atmosphere.
Street Address: Blvd. Luis A. Ferré (Ave. Las Américas)

Name: Patagonia Pizzería Argentina
Description: We offer artisanal pizza, Argentinian style, and a variety of craft and local beers.

Name: La Musa Bar & Tapas
Description: Tapas, wines, art, pizza and the best atmosphere.

Name: Domplines Express
Description: Domplines Express is a business specialized in a type of fried bread very traditional in the south of Puerto Rico called DOMPLINES. You can eat in various ways either just plain filled with a protein and cheese or with all your favorite fixings like a sandwich (lettuce, tomatoes, onions, mayo and ketchup).

Name: Ebenezer Express
Description: Enjoy gourmet burgers made with homemade artisanal bread.

Name: El Buey
Description: Enjoy burgers and gyros in Ponce.
Street Address: Marginal Ponce By Pass entrada hacia el Parque Monagas

Name: Coffee House Bistro & Protein Shakes - La Rambla
Description: Coffee House Bistro & Protein Shakes is a business that sells gourmet coffee, protein shakes, and healthy food. In a friendly and familiar atmosphere, you will enjoy a good cup of coffee from the country and a great variety of sandwiches.

Name: Coffee House Bistro & Protein Shakes - Fox Hotel
Description: Coffee House Bistro & Protein Shakes is a business that sells gourmet coffee, protein shakes, and healthy food. In a friendly and familiar atmosphere, you will enjoy a good cup of coffee from the country and a great variety of sandwiches.

Name: Al Estilo de Ana
Description: Al Estilo de Ana is a cafeteria-style food truck in Ponce that offers breakfast and coffee. At this spot, you can order to go or if you prefer you can enjoy your order in an outdoor seating area.

Name: Cassava Pizza
Description: Pizza food truck serving artisanal pizzas made with cassava flour.

Name: El Batey de Agüeybana
Description: Mouthwatering traditional Puerto Rican food served daily. During lunch time, you can enjoy a varied lunch menu and on some nights they have live music.

Name: El Madrigal
Description: El Madrigal offers breakfast and lunch in a welcoming environment.

Name: El Pastrami Café
Description: El Pastrami Café specializes in delicious "criollo" food. In addition to serving lunch, they also offer catering services. Free delivery from Monday to Saturday.
Street Address: Urb. Las Delicias. Ave. Ponce de León

Name: La Batera Sport Bar
Description: Visit this sport bar in Ponce for Puerto Rican food and local beers.

Name: La Huida Barra y Picadera
Description: Stop by this local bar to enjoy beers, drinks, and light Puerto Rican bites such as typical fritters.
Street Address: Vista del Mar 3256 Calle Caviar, Playa

Name: La Placita Food and BBQ
Description: La Placita is a food stand that serves typical Puerto Rican lunches during weekdays. Aside from their lunch specials, they also have fritters and flans (caramel custard).

Name: La Terapia Bar & Grill
Description: Just the kind of "therapy" you're in need of! Stop by La Terapia and enjoy a relaxed environment and great food with friends and family.
Street Address: Plaza Nueva Mundo Ave. Bulevar Miguel A Pou 1591

Name: Las Monjitas Bakery
Description: At Las Monjitas, you'll find Ponce's best bakery bread. Stop by and stock up on Puerto Rican sweets while enjoying a cup of coffee.
Street Address: Avenida Tito Castro Metro, Plaza Las Monjitas

Name: Los Gorditos Sandwich
Description: We offer a variety of sandwiches, from roasted pork and turkey to pastrami and chicken.

Name: Los Panas Sandwiches
Description: We serve a variety of delicious sandwiches, salads, seafood, and more! Sandwiches de todas las clases, Ensaladas, Mariscos, Chicharrones de Pollo, Carne frita, Churrasco, Quesadillas, Burguers, Mofongo y Más…Ven y visitanos!!

Name: Makaii Food Truck
Description: Delicious food, including traditional "mofongos" and a variety of fritters.
Street Address: Urb. Perla del Sur Calle Rafael Lugo González, al lado del Dealer Monumental Toyota

Name: Panadería Sueño Real
Description: Breakfast, lunches, and food à la carte.

Name: Picsa Al Forno
Description: Stop by this pizza food truck for mouthwatering thin crust pizza.

Name: Pollos Glenview
Description: This roadside sells roasted chicken and a variety of side dishes.

Name: Providencia Bakery
Description: Bread baked fresh every day and a variety of sweet pastries.

Name: Tripletas El Father
Description: "Tripleta" sandwiches made at the moment, as well as other Puerto Rican staples.
Street Address: Salida #95 Coto Laurel Carrertera 506 km 1.5 al lado de Pollos

Name: Yogen Früz - Ponce
Description: The perfect place to enjoy delicious frozen yogurt.

Name: Acai Express - Ponce
Description: Stop by Acai Express in Ponce for a refreshing and healthy bowl of acai.

Name: Quiero Pizza
Description: Quiero Pizza is a restaurant dedicated to Italian flavors, pizzas, and calzones.

Name: Puertorro BBQ
Description: Puertorro BBQ offers lunch, drinks and delicious pinchos.

Name: Perla del Sur Bakery & More
Description: Enjoy bakery sweets, sandwiches, breakfasts, and lunches in Perla del Sur Bakery & More.

Name: Paradisu’s Pizza
Description: Enjoy pizza, calzone, homemade hamburger, mofongo, and sandwiches at Paradisu’s Pizza.

Name: Panadería Villa del Carmen
Description: Panadería Villa del Carmen offers a great variety of pastries, cakes for any occasion, sandwiches, breakfasts, lunches, and snacks.

Name: Panadería y Repostería La Comercio
Description: With 32 years of experience, La Pandería & Repostería La Comercio, offers various pastry sweets, bread, sandwiches, juices, cupcakes, and more.

Name: Panadería San Agustín
Description: Enjoy the exquisite variety of delicate pastries at the Bakery San Agustín.

Name: Panadería La Sureña
Description: At Panadería La Sureña, you will enjoy delicious bread, sweets of all kinds, cakes, coffee, and delicious sándwiches.

Name: Menú Food & Bar
Description: At Food Menú and Bar, we offer menú a la carte and happy hours. We also have a meeting space for private events.

Name: Macondo
Description: Macondo transforms the urban area of Ponce into a point of meeting for lovers of gastronomy, literature, arts, and a good talk.

Name: Los Botao’s Grill & Sandwich
Description: Los Botao's Grill now offers a new menu, in which we combine dressings and seasonings with dishes created in the style and flavor of Los Botao's, which has distinguished us eight years ago. Food truck offers take away services.

Name: El Tuque Bakery
Description: El Tuque Bakery is a small food factory. We primarily make bread and desserts such as Flanes, puddings, and Pasteleria de Ojandre.

Name: Hacienda Real Bar & Rest
Description: Hacienda Real Bar & Rest is a family-friendly restaurant and modern "chinchorreo", located in the Barrio Real Anón in Ponce, in front of La Gallera.

Name: Midtown NY Pizza
Description: At Midtown NY Pizza, you will enjoy Puerto Rican dishes, pizzas, and much more. You can delight yourself with our drinks made with local ingredients such as our famous Mojitos.

Name: El Pilón Borincano
Description: From La Guancha, El Pilón Borincano is well known for the great flavor in its dishes. We are currently serving all our loyal customers in Villa del Carmen location and soon in Pámpanos.

Name: DoNut Eat Just One
Description: DoNut Eat Just One is a food truck specializing in mini donuts of different flavors. Our concept is of mini donuts made at the moment with a great variety of ice cream, syrups, and toppings. Our food truck is in the facilities of the Hacienda Real Restaurant in Real Anón, right in front of the Kresto and Denia bakery. Visit us!

Name: Colmado Cafetín El Grave
Description: Colmado Cafetín El Grave is a grocery store that offers necessities and makes lunches, snacks, and drinks.

Name: Ceviche D'Aqui
Description: Ceviche D' Aquí is a food truck that offers the best ceviche on the southern coast with the authentic flavor of Peru.

Name: Cesar’s BBQ
Description: The Original and Unmatched flavor of the best chicken in Ponce and at the best price. Cesar's BBQ has been serving Ponce Beach for over four decades and offers you the best BBQ chicken in all of Ponce and a varied menu of side dishes.
Street Address: Ave. Padre Noel 32 Playa de Ponce

Name: Bar El Nuevo Manantial
Description: Bar El Nuevo Manantial is a family business and offers drinks, music, and food with entertainment machines.

Name: Cabaña del Pio Pio
Description: Home of the traditional charcoal-grilled chicken.

Name: Cafetería y Colmado Ebenezer
Description: La Cafetería y Colmado Ebenezer offers a variety of breakfast, lunch, and fried foods.

Name: Rancho 107 BBQ
Description: Enjoy Puerto Rican dishes in a family-friendly environment at Rancho 107 BBQ.

Name: Viktor Pollo Villa del Carmen
Description: Since 1992, Viktor Pollo is your stop to savor delicious Puertorican food in the South area. We are your ally to bring fresh and healthy food home, for family parties, or just for sightseeing. With our varied menu, we satisfy the cravings of each member of the family.
Street Address: Ave. Caribe, Urbanización Villa del Carmen

Name: Viktor Pollo Coto Laurel
Description: Since 1992, Viktor Pollo is your stop to savor delicious Puertorican food in the South area. We are your ally to bring fresh and healthy food home, for family parties, or just for sightseeing. With our varied menu, we satisfy the cravings of each member of the family.

Name: Sabor Frappé
Description: Founded in 2013, Sabor Frappé has become the # 1 choice to indulge your sweet treats. We have more than 60 flavors and infinite possibilities of combinations.

Name: René's Sandwiches
Description: At Rene’s Sandwiches, you can enjoy all kinds of sandwiches, breakfast, baked potatoes, and seafood.

Name: Panadería y Pizzeria San Miguel
Description: At this local bakery, you'll find warm bread, sweets, and pizza.

Name: La Nueva Parada
Description: La Nueva Parada in Ponce specializes in crunchy Puerto Rican chicken fritters known as "chicharrones," stuffed mofongos and more.

Name: Marina 308
Description: Marina 308 is the perfect location for a bottle of wine or cocktails with friends and family, under the beautiful sunsets of the West Coast. Enjoy our creative appetizers, or dinner featuring the fresh catch of the day, on a laid back yet vibrant ambiance

Name: Bacoa Finca + Fogón
Description: The fresh country air and views of the farm are complemented by the flavors of the Puerto Rican wood stove and the fruits of Finca BACOA to celebrate Puerto Rican cuisine and the pleasures of sobremesa.

Name: DISTRITO T-Mobile
Description: We’re Puerto Rico’s ultimate venue for fun and entertainment. And because we believe fun shouldn’t be a once in a while thing, we’ve brought together Puerto Rico's spirit, flavors, and good vibes with innovative experiences to surprise visitors every time.

Name: Lupe Reyes
Description: Come and experience Mexican-inspired dishes. Our seductive menu features traditional plates, from Tacos, Queso Fundido to more creative dishes like Tostada de Ceviche. At Lupe Reyes, we believe in celebrating life every day. We feature an array of cocktails inspired by Mexican traditions offering an impressive collection of Mezcal, Tequila, and other spirits for your taste and enjoyment. Be ready to celebrate life with the cocktail of your choice.

Name: La Burguesía
Description: Redefining the traditional burger concept, La Burguesía elevates universally loved dishes with fresh ingredients, attention to detail, and a creatively unique touch in every bite.

Name: Sazón Cocina Criolla
Description: Be sure to stop by Sazón Cocina Criolla to enjoy the flavors of our local cuisine. Expect fresh, vibrant Puerto Rican dishes seasoned to perfection and unbeatable service.

Name: La Central by Mario Pagán
Description: Immerse in bold flavors at La Central by Mario Pagán, located in Distrito T-Mobile, San Juan, Puerto Rico.

Name: El Cuchifrito
Description: You can find el Cuchifrito and its mouthwatering "mofongos" at Santurce's famous food park, Lote 23.
Street Address: Ave. Juan Ponce de Leon 1552 PR-25

Name: Wicked Lily
Description: Our culinary team is composed of dedicated individuals from a variety of backgrounds, many of whom have elevated themselves to positions as food service directors at the center, regional, and corporate levels.

Name: Raya by Mario Pagán
Description: Our strikingly designed Caribbean Asian restaurant brings the spirit of Asia to the heart of Puerto Rico. Let us take you into a vibrant world of fresh fusion food created by our locally famous chef, Mario Pagan. Avocado chilli drops, spiced adobo kurobuta ribs, wasabi grilled cheese and beet matcha ice cream cookies are some of the recipes inspired by the flavors of Thailand, Vietnam, Korea & Japan. Experience the passion of the chef in a lively atmosphere and a dramatic setting furnished with marble patterned floors in the first floor of O:LV Fifty Five.

Name: Dulcinea Ice Cream & Churros
Description: Craving something sweet? Stop by Dulcinea at DISTRITO T-Mobile and delight yourself with their mouthwatering churros and ice creams.

Name: Bohemia Cocina en Movimiento
Description: Nestled in the luscious mountains of Cayey, Bohemia Cocina en Movimiento is a culinary experience unlike many. This five-course experience leaves you wanting to come back... the attention to details, the personalized service, the perfect wine pairing, and an unbeatable atmosphere, makes Bohemia Cocina en Movimiento the perfect retreat to enjoy fine dining. Conceptually, it is not a restaurant like the ones you know.

Name: Funche Restaurant
Description: "Contemporary Creole Cuisine, by Chef Juan R Nieves. Catering Service, Tastings, space available for small meetings or celebrations."

Name: El Caney Restaurant & Bar
Description: Outdoor family restaurant with rooftop overlooking the mountains of the Center of our Island. Our specialty is Puerto Rican food. We have a bar where you can sit down to enjoy our delicious mojitos and other drinks. Winners of the Mojito Fest 2022 and First Gastronomic place in the Mojito Fest 2023. Come and enjoy a beautiful afternoon in the Center of the town of Ciales.

Name: Madre Tierra Coffee Shop
Description: We are your newest option for vegan food in Caguas. Stop by to enjoy our creative dishes, coffee bar, beers, and vegan wines.

Name: Antillano
Description: Antillano is a lounge bar, that pays special attention to details, while serving fresh local products and providing a five-star experience. The concept for Antillano was created by Puerto Rican mixologists Edrick Colón and Stephen Alonso, who drew their inspiration from the Caribbean's unique flavors.

Name: Montadero Chocolate
Description: "Bean to Bar" chocolatier that uses 100% Puerto Rican cacao. Visit us to see the process of making your favorite sweet, chocolate. At Montadero, we offer tastings, workshops, and plenty of mouthwatering treats.

Name: Pudge's Pizza
Description: Pizza Pies Worthy of an MVP Hall of Fame Catcher, Iván “Pudge” Rodríguez, brings his new pizza concept to Distrito T-Mobile. Pudge’s Pizza welcomes guests in a family-friendly environment serving signature pies created by Iván himself and bearing names that pay homage to his Puerto Rican roots.

Name: Reserva 304
Description: Italian fusion restaurant serving homemade pasta and artisanal pizzas. at the Parguera Plaza Hotel. The bar offers a variety of cocktails and wines a la carte.

Name: Moons Bar & Tapas
Description: Enjoy mouthwatering tapas, fresh seafood, and delicious mofongos at the Parguera Plaza Hotel.

Name: Isla Cueva Burger & Beer Bar
Description: The perfect spot to enjoy a burger and beer while at La Parguera.

Name: Colmado Bar Gonzalez
Description: One of the Island's typical chinchorros, where you'll always find a cold beer.

Name: Arena Medalla
Description: A Taste Of Victory It's always game night at this two-level, 12,500 square feet ultimate sports restaurant combining our passion for sports, beer, and amazing food all in one roof. Bienvenidos to La Casa del Triunfo Boricua, a celebration of Puerto Rico’s sports’ heritage past, present and future! Immerse yourself in action and watch your favorite teams play their A-game in the latest 30-ft panoramic, multi-view LED screen technology where you can enjoy a game or two from every corner; you are guaranteed never to miss a home run, knock out, or grand slam!

Name: Roots Coastal Kitchen
Description: This creative haven of Caribbean comfort food was opened by Executive Chef Ramón Carrillo in collaboration with Top Chef finalists Jeff McInnis and Janine Booth. At this restaurant, farm-to-table goodness is given an inspired flair with plates like grilled swordfish with coconut curry rice, shrimp and bacon empanadas, and chili mango hot wings.

Name: Iguanas Cocina Puertorriqueña
Description: Delight yourself into authentic Puerto Rican flavors at this scenic dinner restaurant. Located at the Club House overlooking the golf courses, serves up some of the island’s best traditional tastes.

Name: Prime 787
Description: A contemporary take on the traditional American Steakhouse. Delicious cuts of beef, elevated seafood, and fine wine are on the menu at our upscale steakhouse. The dress code: resort elegant.

Name: Hard Rock Cafe Ponce
Description: Hard Rock Cafe Ponce is about to set the Aloft Hotel on fire with our signature style and rock and roll cuisine. Located in the heart of the south area of Puerto Rico, our cafe in the “pearl of the South” has enough room for you and over 350 of your best friends in over 12,500 square feet of party space.

Name: PROLE Cocina & Barra
Description: PROLE Cocina & Barra is a contemporary restaurant and social bar located at Santurce's up and coming Calle Cerra. Chef José Esteban Rivero returned to his home island after training in the city of Philadelphia for 11 years. In partnership with his wife, Sarah Santos, whose background focuses on Marketing, Public Relations and Events, they decided to open their first restaurant. They fulfilled their dream when they opened PROLE Cocina & Barra in April 2019.

Name: Bottega
Description: Located in la Calle Loíza, Bottega is a purveyor of fine Mediterranean dining. Tapas usually come to the table as they are ready. Relax and enjoy what you are eating without rushing to the next thing before it gets cold. Remember that dining tapas style was designed to encourage conversation, so linger over a friendly, fun meal. Take your time and eat with all your senses to enjoy every morsel of food.

Name: Papa Rupe Brewing Co.
Description: Located in the heart of Ponce, Puerto Rico, Papa Rupe Brewing Co. is located within the walls of a historic house (built-in 1893) that once belonged to Thomas Armstrong Toro, one of the most important figures of the formation of Ponce’s Golden Age.

Name: La Terraza - Dorado
Description: La Terraza was established in 1983 in Dorado, Puerto Rico. We are a Caribbean-style seafood restaurant where you can enjoy our island's culture and gastronomy.
Street Address: Carr.693 Calle Marginal C-1 Costa de Oro

Name: Patio de las Flores
Description: Patio de las Flores was born to bring an exotic experience with our Puerto Rican gastronomy. We combined our handcrafted cocktails and tapas with a unique floral atmosphere to create an unforgettable memory.
Street Address: 5916 Ave. Isla Verde El Palmar Norte Núm. 3, Local B

Name: Café Rustico Bar & Asado
Description: In the town of Naranjito you can find Café Rústico Bar & Asado. A place where you can enjoy fried meat, seafood, smoked longaniza fresh from the country. Drinks with natural juices including our famous mojitos. We have billiards, tables to play dominoes and live music every Sunday.

Name: Pórticos 1606
Description: PÓRTICOS 1606 is a restaurant with a bar that offers customers a unique and authentic experience in a cozy and quiet environment. Here, you can enjoy our land's flavor and typical seasoning through a Gallery of Caribbean Fusions to your delight and our satisfaction. We are history and a sense of belonging. We are San Germán.
Street Address: Calle Dr. Santiago Veve #55, esquina Calle Alfonso XII

Name: Abolengo Rest. & Bar
Description: Enjoy a wide variety of delicious dishes, snacks and drinks in a family atmosphere. Come and try our house specialty and variety of seafood dishes, delicious mojitos, drinks and more.

Name: Arte Mío Café
Description: "Coffeshop and Brunch in Juncos Puerto Rico. Serving puerto rican coffee and delicious brunch from morning to afternoon."

Name: Coquí Bayú
Description: Coqui Bayú and Café Latino products provide visitors to Puerto Rico a way to take a piece of paradise with them and the diaspora a way to take a piece of home with them. Coqui Bayú and Café Latino brands are rooted in Puerto Rican customs and traditions that are conveyed in an amusing/entertaining and wholesome fashion/manner, appealing to children and adults alike. We source and/or manufacture all of our products locally. We collaborate with a number of local confectioners of coffee, chocolate, and honey.
Street Address: Plaza de Recreo Antonio R. Barceló

Name: Bori Bori Cocina
Description: "Bori Bori Cocina es un concepto en el que se fusiona la gastronomía local e internacional con las pizzas. Pizzas como la de mofongo con carne frita, Pizza sandwichito de mezcla, Pizza de corned beef con amarillos y aguacate, entre otras."

Name: El Patio de La Jamaca
Description: El Patio de La Jamaca is an outdoor seating restaurant which serves tasty and delicious Caribbean food. From fresh lobster, conch meat, and red snapper to our outstanding can can pork chops. Our menu also offers traditional stuffed mofongos with our signature three cheese recipe, light meals such as fish, chicken and steak tacos to homemade burgers! We also serve brunch Saturdays and Sundays. Our bar serves Puerto Rican Piña Colada inside a locally grown pineapple and flavored fresh juice mojitos plus more!

Name: Butaque
Description: La comida mexicana ha evolucionado a medida que choca con la cultura estadounidense desde finales del siglo XIX, naciendo así un nuevo estilo gastronómico que se denominó “Tex-Mex”. Las fajitas, nachos y platos con carne de res, frijoles negros, harina de trigo o queso amarillo que tanto nos gustan, son parte de la cocina ”Tex-Mex”. En BUTAQUE, queremos que cada cliente se vaya con una excelente experiencia auténtica “Tex-Mex”.

Name: La Esquina del Pirata
Description: The only themed bar located in the urban center of Fajardo with a live music program and a wide variety of distilled spirits. Our entertainment offer includes: pool tables, dominoes, dart boards, will make your night a memorable experience.

Name: Burger Lab by The Chic & The Chef
Description: Restaurant specializing in artisan homemade burgers. All served with waffle fries, crispy onion ring, and buttery brioche bread.

Name: El Nativo
Description: El Nativo - your local spot! Located at the Kayak Village facilities at Las Croabas, right next to one of the three amazing bioluminescent bays in Puerto Rico. Enjoy a varied menu - appetizers, "picadera", cold beers, exquisite cocktails - in a casual, family environment with an amazing view of the ocean.

Name: Gogo On The Road FT
Description: Gogo on the Road Food Truck offers a variety of light food that does not hold out on flavor. Some of our signature dishes include stuffed avocados and the "tripledilla".

Name: Pelikanos Restaurant
Description: Pelikanos is a family restaurant with a beautiful view of the Naguabo Malecón that offers a varied array of seafood and meat dishes. Pelikanos has a private indoor section and a breezy outdoor terrace that are perfect for events. What makes Pelikanos stand out? Our fresh fish, live music, and unique flavors.

Name: El San Juan Beach Club
Description: Poised along the shore of San Juan’s lively Isla Verde Beach, El San Juan Beach Club invites guests to rejuvenate in private luxury cabanas and dine on coastal cuisine inspired by its timeless island surroundings. Featuring live music and inventive cocktails that re-imagine local flavors with a modern palette.

Name: Banyan Tree Grill
Description: A resort clubhouse style restaurant & bar embracing our historic Banyan Tree dating from over 300 years at Fairmont El San Juan Hotel’s surroundings and pools. Enjoy comfort food from around the world including tacos, burgers and our local empanadas; worldly and with an approachable touch of our heritage flavors.

Name: La Cevichería
Description: La Cevichería is a bar and restaurant specialized in peruvian cuisine. We make all types of ceviches with fresh ingredients prepared daily, along a full menu of peruvian favorites. We also serve drinks, beers, and our famous peruvian Pisco.

Name: Aguadilla Rooftop Experience
Description: Creative space focused on a multisensorial dinning experience, featuring Criollo food and coctails with a tropical twist inspired by the region. Our terrace oversees one of the most spectacular views of the Aguadilla Bay. At Aguadilla Rooftop Experience, art is in every plate, every space, and every view.

Name: Beerloteca
Description: Conceptual space that combines literature and gastronomy. The Beerloteca reestablishes the idea of connecting information with consumption, bringing the client a complete and informative tasting experience. We have sixteen local and international beers on tap and a wide variety of cocktails.
Street Address: Carretera 442, Paseo Real Marián, Parque Colón

Name: Harbor Café
Description: Harbor Café is a restaurant on the private island of Cayo Obispo, better known as Isleta Marina in Fajardo. It's a safe space, surrounded by the sea and fresh air, and with a lovely view of the boats and marina. The restaurant is a staple on the small Island, and has been recognized as one of the best local restaurants for its menu, ambiance and service. It's the only restaurant in Puerto Rico that requires a ferry trip from the big Island.

Name: PyP Restaurant
Description: Our varied menu is made mostly with fresh local and seasonal products, specially seafood. We have a wide variety of cocktails and wines and a cozy atmosphere for all kinds of occasions.

Name: Stoked: Xpresso + Surf
Description: Stoked : Xpresso + Surf is a hybrid concept store idea created by publicists Dagi Rodríguez and Pepe García, being the first joint business of this duo. Stoked is located at one of the most iconic surfing beaches in Puerto Rico, Playa María’s, Rincón; the epicenter of Puerto Rico’s surfing culture, that happens to be a world-class surf break as well.

Name: Al Dente
Description: Al Dente is a restaurant with a modern, industrial feel. Our menu is primarily Italian, but we offer a variety of meats, fish, and an ample tapas menu. Our bar has over 65 whiskey brands, over 25 gin brands, a variety of mezcal and a large wine cellar with space for 750 bottles. Come visit our lounge and have a sip of your favorite coctail.

Name: SUR Barra Nikkei
Description: Located in the heart of Santurce, SUR Barra Nikkei is introduced as a refreshing proposal whose mission is to serve new experiences through tradition, balance, and evolution. After staging in world-renowned restaurants in Perú, like Astrid & Gastón and El Mercado de Rafael Osterling, Chef Rafael Ubior returned to Puerto Rico to open the first Nikkei restaurant on the island. With the use of classic Peruvian and Japanese ingredients and culinary techniques, SUR aspires to awaken new sensations, bring new flavors, and raise awareness about the consumption of local marine ecosystems.

Name: Cocina : Pública
Description: A collaborative space led by the talented chef Yashira Vélez that offered a menu focused on the Latin-Caribbean spirit and heritage.

Name: Varadero Seafood & Cuban
Description: Located in the gastronomic seafood route of Joyuda, Varadero offers a wide variety of seafood dishes with a Cuban twist. Try any of our tropical drinks while you enjoy the beautiful water view.

Name: Limber Party
Description: From the southwest of our Puerto Rico, the creamy and fruit limbers. Made with first-class products, with fresh fruits from our island. Like passion parcha, guanabana, tamarind. Supporting our local businesses and farmers to obtain the raw material. A quality product made in the nucleus of a family that I had to reinvent myself when I became unemployed. And thank god I was born limber party. A product that you can enjoy at your home, work, enjoying a landscape of our island, on birthdays, weddings, graduations, on any occasion.

Name: Cake Factory
Description: Cake Factory is a pastry shop specializing in cakes and desserts. You can find a wide variety of cupcakes, among which stand out: vanilla, chocolate, lemon, carrot, guava, cheese, and red velvet. We also have panetelas, coconut kisses, carrot cookies, MAGNUM popsicles, and macaroons of different flavors. We offer cold desserts such as tres leches, flans, pudding, and cheesecake. You can accompany our desserts with the delicious coffee TASTE: coffee, mochaccino, cappuccino, and hot chocolate. By prior order: Birthday, baptism, and wedding cakes.

Name: El Quiños Sport Bar & Restaurant
Description: New option to have a good time in San German. We have an a/c room, outdoor terrace, an extensive menu and a wide variety of drinks and beers, both local and international. We will wait for you !

Name: La Dulcería by Dary
Description: Our candy store sells all kinds of sweets and typical sweets, Frappe, fruit salads and limbers of different flavors. We are waiting for you!

Name: La Chocolatería
Description: Chocolate Tree to Bar, 100% Puerto Rican. Made with Cocoa recognized among the best 50 in the world. David Bayon acquired the farm and founded Cacao Valent in 2013. Since then, Cacao Valent has been dedicated to cultivating the best Cacao in Puerto Rico and the world. This aspiration has been confirmed through the Cocoa of Excellence Awards in Paris, France. The awards received in 2017 and 2019 placed Cacao Valent samples among the top 50 in the world.

Name: Panchi Café
Description: Panchi Café is a coffee shop where you can enjoy a rich menu for breakfast all day and a light lunch. During the day, we are a coffee shop, and at night we become a theater cafe in conjunction with the Panchinietos of LIPIT with the Impro Galeria space. Panchi is not only a space where you can enjoy a delicious coffee prepared by baristas, but it is also a space where you can receive workshops related to coffee as well as enjoy artistic shows. In Panchi, you will receive the love like at grandma's house.

Name: Saraí Restaurant Viejo San Juan
Description: Saraí Restaurant offers a unique culinary experience in Old San Juan. Our menu combines appetizers, main courses, desserts, cocktails and drinks inspired by Latin culture. Enjoy a family-friendly environment and VIP treatment at Saraí!

Name: Belamar
Description: Belamar was born as a joint dream of a beautiful restaurant with a large terrace that offers an incredible view of the Isabela sea. We are Carolyn and Ely; and at Belamar we are waiting for you so that you can enjoy a culinary experience of unparalleled quality. BELAMAR COFFEE 18°30'31.9"N | 67°04'31.4"W

Name: 2 Yellow Frozen Drinks
Description: Located in the Paseo Lineal parking lot, Playa Middles, Isabela, Puerto Rico you will get the best Piña Colada- Popcorn- Nachos with cheese- Lemonades- Frozen Lemonades- Soft Drinks. The ideal for your visit to the beach.

Name: Laguna Grande Restaurant
Description: "Un espacio para todas las familias con diversos temas, acercándote a la naturaleza y la vida marina. Deleitaras platos criollos como hechos en casa, deliciosos cortes de carnes con tu termino favorito, como también podrás saborear de una exquisita Pesca Fresca cada semana. Serás parte de un dulce banquete de postres que podrás escoger a tu antojo. Donde los niños serán nuestros principales clientes.
Street Address: Bo. Barrio Las Cabezas de San Juan

Name: Guararé Cocina Puertorriqueña
Description: Guararé Puerto Rican Cuisine is an authentic Puerto Rican Food Restaurant; it is a kitchen in motion in the heart of Santurce. Guararé pays tribute to the customs and culture that characterize all of us Puerto Ricans who love our typical food, our cocktails, and local rums, and also to those who hum all the salsa songs of the greatest exponents of Puerto Ricans. And all of us who love urban art that converges the murals of La Cerra and in which Guararé integrated.

Name: El Patio de la Cerra
Description: Santurce has a new beer spot perfect to beat the summer heat. El Patio de la Cerra, located at 851 Ernesto Cerra Street, offers a variety of 120 local and international beers and 12 draft beers from France, Canada, New York, Pennsylvania, and Puerto Rico.

Name: The Aviator’s Brewery
Description: In April 2008, we discovered craft beer on a trip to the state of Oregon. We could sample a Widmer Brothers brewery that was expanding its operations. We found his Hefeweizen style. We had never tasted beers with such striking body, flavors, and aromas. We took on the task of looking for more information and discovered that it was allowed to make your beers in Oregon, but in Puerto Rico, it was not illegal. So, although we were crazy to keep trying more styles, we had to settle for only when we were on a trip to the US could we look for craft beers.

Name: Hacienda Vilella
Description: In the town of Lares, you can find Hacienda Vilella, a secluded space for people to enjoy delicious food and drinks while watching a great view and listening to live music.

Name: Cold Blood Brewery
Description: Offering a cool combination of classic tastes and bolder treats and tasting notes of tropical, floral and malt, Cold Blood Brewery is located in Quebradillas and offers unique sips such as their Hard Ginger Beer and the Imperial Whiskey Stout. Other notable beers include Puente la Bellaca, Puerto Hermina, Matabuey, Pirata, El Merendero and Guajataka. The brewery is open Fridays and Saturdays 12-11PM and Sundays 12-7PM.

Name: Reina Mora Brewing Co.
Description: Located in Sabana Grande, Reina Mora Brewing company offers 11 different beers on rotation throughout the year, four core brews including Spindalis (Dry Hopped Ale), 873 (NEIPA), Unidad 9 (IPA) y La Pajarita (Blonde Ale). With notes of tropical citrus, it is the perfect place to grab a brew and enjoy the Island’s atmosphere.

Name: Cervecería del Callejón
Description: Located in Old San Juan, this small batch artisanal brewery offers bold, full-flavored twists to classic brews with notes of citric and tropical. Stop by and try one of their notable brews such as the signature Rienda Suelta IPA, the Desorden Ejecutiva Hazy IPA and the Saison Claroscuro as well. Looking for something seasonal? Try their Dinámica Fluida Saison in the summer months and the Callejón Oscuro in winter. The brewery is open Mondays, Wednesdays and Thursdays from 4:20-10PM, Friday and Saturdays from 12-11:20PM and Sundays 12-10PM.
Street Address: 312 Calle San Francisco Local B Esquina, Cjón. de la Capilla

Name: Boquerón Brewing Co
Description: An artisanal brewery located in Cabo Rojo, Boqueron Brewing company is known for its seasonal beers inspired by iconic spots across the Island, as well as its delicious year-round brews. With significant tasting notes of fruity, bitter, soft, sweet and malt across their brews and offering 12oz cans year-round, notable brews include the Boqueron Lager, Caja de Muerto Caribbean Ale, Boqueron Blonde Ale and the Crash Boat IPA.

Name: Brew!!! Taller Experimental
Description: Brew!!! Taller Experimental es una cervecería en la cual se ha creado un espacio para degustar así como aprender y disfrutar de Cervezas Artesanales de nuestras marcas DragonStone Abbey y Brew!!! Nuestro tap room sirve las cervezas de los estilos reconocidos como también experimentales. Hacemos colaboraciones y se le da exposición a cervecerías locales.

Name: Miramar Brewing - Old Harbor
Description: The Island’s first artisanal brewery that opened its doors in 1996, the beers of Old Harbor are brewed for flavor and promise both quality and freshness, along with fruity, soft, sweet and floral notes. Some notable beers to try include Coqui Helles, Santo Viejo Pilsner, Taina Blonde Ale, Kofresi Stout and Yunque Session IPA.
Street Address: Carr. 887 Km. 9.6 Parque Industrial Julio N. Matos Lote # 2

Name: Denko Asian Eatery
Description: "Enjoy your food, delivered to your table via "rocket" & delight your palette with our diverse Asian dishes."

Name: Okui Sushi Bar
Description: We are more than just a sushi bar! Pick from over 25 rolls, delicious appetizers, vegan options, different types of rice and much more.

Name: Nueva Patria Mía
Description: Nueva Patria Mía is a place where you can come and have a good time with your friends and family. Where you will eat delicious and enjoy a spectacular view! We have a variety of lunches and our a la carte menu! Come and enjoy!

Name: The Oyster Shack
Description: The Oyster Shack is a family business that began during the pandemic. It was born from the love for eating fresh oysters and seafood and connecting with people over a fine dining experience. As our homemade recipes made it to our clients' hands for their enjoyment, we realized how important good, fresh food is to a human connection between family and friends. We set our roots in San Juan, so The Oyster Shack turned into a home for the dedicated seafood lover and those with a curious palate who like trying new and exciting dishes.

Name: Mercado La Carreta
Description: We are a restaurant focused on local produce, and our food is Creole with an international twist. We specialize in “brunch” lunches and tapas, everything homemade.

Name: Rafburger & More Food Truck
Description: Rafburger & More Food Truck is a business that makes artisan burgers. In addition, we have a variety of dishes on our menu, and our mission is to delight our consumers with our plates. With this business, we intend to contribute to the gastronomic world. Our products are local from Puerto Rican hands, promoting the economy's growth in Puerto Rico.

Name: Al Lado
Description: A small bar in the heart of the town of Arecibo that focuses on artisanal and local beers.

Name: Cacique Brewing Company
Description: We are a Nano Brewery located in Orocovis, Puerto Rico. We produce craft beers in compliance with the highest standards of traditional-style brewing. We have a taproom in the same brewery where people can go and taste the beers that we have available. Beer styles we produce: Centinela Helles Lager, Sanamuerto Juicy IPA, Guaguancó Hazy Passion Fruit IPA, El Jacho Cascadian Dark Ale, La Múcara American-style Stout, Mete Miedo Imperial West Coast IPA, among others.

Name: Epicuro
Description: By reservation only, this space is a gastronomic proposal defined as a culinary journey through the kitchens that have moved the Puertorican chef during his stays in South America, Europe and Asia; a daring blend of flavors that is seasoned with a touch of the Caribbean. The exclusive 12-seat counter offers an intimate dining experience with an open kitchen overlooking the chef’s work.

Name: Lavenida
Description: We are a tapas restaurant in San Juan that offers breakfast, lunch, dinner menu, and brunch on weekends.

Name: Sabor Arte Picnic
Description: Sabor Arte Picnic is a restaurant that offers a unique picnic experience mixed with art and flavor.

Name: Pocillo Dulce
Description: Our mission is to be a space where clients feel comfortable and have trending products to drink and eat. This is why our menu constantly changes; we listen to our customers and gradually create a better culinary experience every day. Our main focus is coffee, and it's super good, but we also liked the chicken tenders, acai, sorullitos, cheese sticks, and waffles.

Name: Aovara
Description: 100% plant-based and mainly sourced from local harvest and agroecological farms, Chef Jerome will take you on a culinary journey to Italy, Mexico and the Caribbean.

Name: Cañita Santurce
Description: Cañita Santurce is a Bar located at Avenida Juan Ponce De Leon in Santurce.
Street Address: Avenida Juan Ponce De Leon esquina, 1103 C. Barcelona local 3

Name: La Pachanga
Description: La Pachanga Calle Loiza is a Mexican restaurant and Bar in Guaynabo. They offer a variety of traditional Mexican dishes and drinks.

Name: Julio César
Description: Julio César was born from the idea of our owners, Wilmer Matos and Katia Concepción, to bring an elegant and authentic culinary experience that transports their clients to the streets of Italy. Accompanied by our chef Diego Bongiovanni and our sommelier Stefania Bobbio, we prepare a menu with fresh pasta, Neapolitan pizzas, and traditional Italian dishes from different regions. We invite you to discover Italy from the palate with us!

Name: Vida By Yara
Description: Vida by Yara has been making a name for itself for the past two years due to its hand-crafted luxury chocolates and desserts. In 2022 we opened our doors to the public as the first dessert and cocktail bar in Puerto Rico. This is the perfect atmosphere where you can find desserts, cocktails, wine, and coffee. We also offer charcuterie boards and some savory tapas. One of the most fantastic things about our concept is we can suggest a drink like our Cornetto martini, which is our twist on an espresso martini. The cornetto pairs well with our cheesecake bonbon or a charcuterie board.

Name: The Btch Bar
Description: We are the main btch in charge! We have everything to offer, from beers, tacos, and cocktails to hot wings. We are a queer restaurant bar passionate about drag queen shows and any type of entertainment. We host weekly events, productions, and weekly drag brunch. It is an inclusive space where you can be your true self. Visit and discover the magic of being your own btch!

Name: CukiDou
Description: CukiDou is a Puerto Rican confectionery company specializing in dessert making with cookie dough as its main product by Chef Glorimar Ocasio and Chef Edgardo Cancel. We bring to the market a grand array of desserts, among them: cookies, edible cookie doughs of different flavors, ice creams, biscuits, and sweet loaves of bread. We also offer our visitors hot and cold beverages such as coffee, tea, water, and juices.

Name: Paolo's Playhouse
Description: A pet-friendly coffee bar located in Lote 23 in San Juan.

Name: Sonora Ocean
Description: Mezcal Bar located in San Juan.

Name: AlaVera Bar & Kitchen
Description: Enjoy the best view of the Cayey mountains at AlaVera Bar & Kitchen.

Name: Pasiones Coffee Roasters
Description: Pasiones Coffee Roasters is a 100% specialty coffee brew from Puerto Rio. In our roasting, you get all our coffees with very fresh roasts just packed. We have a coffee bar for the general public. The coffee roasting area is exposed so that visitors can see the coffee roasting process. Training rooms for barista fans and rooms are available for 4 and 6 people for meetings, conferences, or work.

Name: Clandestino Gastrobar
Description: Clandestino Gastrobar has a varied Tapas menu where you will find fusions of flavors to delight.

Name: Marcella Orquidea Violeta
Description: Marcella Restaurant is a different concept that invites you to taste the confections of Chef Jose Sanchez, where the main product is made or harvested by locals. From the onion soup croquettes that have become the classic on every table to the dishes with pie crust. Marcella Violet Orchid, why do you have a violet orchid? The orchid is the favorite flower of chef Jose Sanchez's grandmother, from whom he inherited his passion for cooking; Marcella is a proposal with local products and Puerto Rican roots but with international techniques.

Name: C Note Jazz Club
Description: C-NOTE is an intimate jazz club that offers world-class live music. Boasting three stories, the colorful club has become an iconic piece of Luquillo. Each floor at C-NOTE is dedicated to a specific purpose and provides something for everyone.

Name: Cóctel 33
Description: An exclusive, subdued and private atmosphere, haute cocktails and delicacies in tapas.

Name: Kane Rum Bar
Description: At Kane, we not only offer spectacular cocktails and delicious food, we also celebrate rum, Puerto Rico's most emblematic liquor.

Name: El Champi
Description: El Champi is a Spanish restaurant located at Antigua Casa Cabildo in Old San Juan.

Name: Jacinta Cuisine
Description: Come and celebrate at Jacinta Cuisine, a cozy, casual, elegant space in the picturesque setting of La Placita de Santurce.
Street Address: La Placita de Santurce, 1360 C. Roberts

Name: Café Caleta
Description: Coffee Shop in Old San Juan.
Street Address: Antigua Casa Cabildo, 78 Caleta de San Juan

Name: Habitante Café
Description: Coffee Shop located in the heart of Santurce.

Name: Corchea
Description: A restaurant with international cuisine and live music.
Street Address: 5916 Avenida Isla Verde El Palmar Norte #3 Local A

Name: Amor y Sal
Description: Amor y Sal is a concept whose purpose is rich food; we have native Boricua, Asian, Italian flavors, and a little more. We wanted to enclose our cuisine with a little bit of the world tied to a sexy environment with a first-class "fine Dinning" service. We are a team whose passion is to serve, and our goal is our client's total satisfaction. We have rich creative, classic cocktails, and we want our brand to be one of the most precious memories of people visiting PR. Our philosophy goes hand in hand with our actions, making us a favorite for both Brunch and dinner.

Name: Salao Tapas & Bar
Description: Salao is a tapas bar-restaurant with a style that delights its diners with an unforgettable gastronomic and cultural experience. Our establishment offers a varied menu, where each dish is completely prepared at home, thus providing the freshness and quality that characterizes us. At Salao, we merge Spanish and Asian gastronomy to offer a unique and exciting proposal for lovers of good food. Our clients can enjoy a wide selection of exquisitely prepared dishes, sweets, and tapas, as well as a menu of cocktails and carefully selected wines to complement their culinary experience.

Name: Cocina Al Fondo
Description: We are a Puerto Rican-owned and operated culinary destination that is rooted in the traditions, flavors, and history of our island. We offer fresh, elevated Puerto Rican cuisine with a twist—dishes incorporate and extoll the fertility and fruits of our land and sea yet with an international influence that connects us to diverse cultures around the world. We believe in a circular system that supports a sustainable future and showcases the strength and beauty of our land—and that includes our people.

Name: Sikiri Grill
Description: Food truck located in Moca that offers a variety of Mofongos, Hamburger Homemade, Chicken Skewers, Chicken dumplings and Quesadillas.

Name: Panderri Bakery
Description: Local Bakery located in Luquillo, Puerto Rico.

Name: Me latte un pocillo
Description: We know that a good coffee makes you happy. We prepare it how you like it, and with the convenience "to go". Accompany it with our innovative waffle pops! Take a break at @Melatteunpocillo.

Name: Isa Pikadera
Description: Come and have a nice time with us in a family atmosphere, cold beers, mojitos and delicious picadera!!

Name: El Paseo Pizzeria Sport Bar y Rest
Description: Pizza creators of the highest quality and unique for each of our customers.

Name: Antaños 1910
Description: Puerto Rican restaurant for family enjoyment.

Name: Mesón Café III Tiempos
Description: Pons Farm (formerly Buena Vista Farm) located in the Castañer Bo sector. Bartolo.
Street Address: PR-128 km 39.4 Bo. Bartolo Sector, Castañer

Description: It is a haute cuisine restaurant where we prepare 5 to 7 tasting courses focused on native ingredients from the Caribbean and Tropical America. It's a garden-to-table concept. At the restaurant we have 15 organic gardens where we use the harvest to provide the freshest food on the menu. The menu changes every 2 weeks, and a menu is never repeated in order to always see something new. At the end of the tasting, a tea made from aromatic herbs from the garden is served. We are the first restaurant in the Caribbean to be officially certified as a sustainable restaurant by European agencies.

Name: Crucero Seafood
Description: Crucero Seafood® Restaurant at Aqua Marina Beach Club in Rincon, Puerto Rico, invites you to a sublime dining experience that captures the splendor of a luxurious cruise. Nestled by the sea, the restaurant combines the sophistication of fine dining with the relaxed, airy feel of a coastal retreat, making it a perfect locale for culinary exploration. Our menu highlights exceptional dishes emphasizing the freshness and quality of locally sourced seafood, with our renowned signature paella hailed as the best on the island.

Name: Wabbles Milk Bar
Description: Wabbles Milk Bar: A picturesque and health-conscious gem in Rincon, Puerto Rico. This bistro cafe is a favorite for its artisanal Italian gelato and various exquisite, customizable pastries with options for gluten-free, vegetarian, vegan, and sugar-free diets. Wabbles takes pride in its on-site gelato preparation, using fresh local produce and the finest Italian imports. The menu also features unique offerings such as pink coffee, creamy milkshakes, and beloved mini donuts.

Name: Kueros Island Bar & Kitchen
Description: In the pulsing heart of Old San Juan, a rhythmic percussion of culinary artistry beckons. Step into Kueros Island Bar & Kitchen, where pure sensory exuberance awakens your senses. Name: La Paz Pizza
Description: We design every detail of our warm space with great intention. Our love for design, good music and sitting down to share a delicious meal with our family and friends were our inspiration. This sense of care for every detail is reflected in our pizzas, made with the best ingredients, an infinite passion for what we do and the great love and commitment to our community.
Street Address: 1552 Av. Juan Ponce de León Lote 23

Name: La Patrona Tacos & More
Description: Welcome to La Patrona Tacos & More, an open-air place with a family atmosphere. We have an extensive menu of Mexican food to delight your palate, such as: tacos, burritos, nachos, flautas, corn on the cob, desserts and drinks (Horchata and Flor de Jamaica). Our specialty is Birria Tacos, La Patrona Burrito and tequila flan.

Name: Kumo Rooftop
Description: Kumo Rooftop main goal is to provide an immersive space where people come together, and experiences are found. We are not just another Japanese Restaurant, we take the most primitive culinary expression that is cooking on fire to a higher level, transforming flavor into a visual performance, and working with two very popular styles of food: Peruvian and Japanese. Our chefs are a group of creative minds that honor and respect many traditional techniques and ingredients of Japanese & Peruvian cuisine focusing on our Robata (Japanese-style grill).

Name: La Casa de las Barquillas Cruz

Name: El Gallo Pinto

We also have the most complete wine cellar in the entire Northeast of Puerto Rico, and a wide variety of bottled, draft and craft beers. We have a large space suitable for 300+ people and a lounge-type activities room with a private bar.

Name: Mamplé
Description: Mamplé was born from a family history, in which Miss Margarita Cordero is the interpreter of a very special recipe for her family. A recipe that has always had the task of unifying the members of this “group” full of characters, each one with a unique distinction, that makes their shared time unforgettable moments. Each one acts as an element within Miss Margarita’s recipe, thus, with their unique characteristics, they enrich the family flavor that occurs at that table, that dinner, that sharing; because Mamplé, under its meaning, is a mixture of elements.

Today, Apa is the owner and protagonist when it comes to preparing a good roasted pig. The quality of his products is so high that he has visited restaurants such as Bernardine in New York, participated in the Food and Wine Fest in Aspen Colorado and traveled with the tourism company to promote our culture and the flavors of this land. Apa is distinguished by being simple, humble, but above all proud of his work.

Name: CRU Wine Shop
Description: Located on Calle del Parque in Santurce, CRU Wine Shop is your new destination for unique and different wines. CRU Wine Shop is a wine shop located on Calle del Parque in Santurce, created and curated by sommeliers. The shop's selection features a wide variety of regions, grapes, and styles. You can find a Grower Champagne (a champagne made by the same people who pick the grapes, which therefore gives them absolute control of the quality of the wine) like Pierre Peters for $112 or you can find a sparkling wine like Izar Leku, made with Hondarrabi Zuri - the grape for Txacolí - for $42.

Name: Coffee Therapy PR

Name: Capital Burger

With a focus on locally sourced meats and produce, Capital Burger offers a unique twist on the classic burger. Guests can savor a variety of flavorful options, from juicy burgers and crispy wings to refreshing drinks and indulgent milkshakes. Whether you’re stopping by for a casual meal or a night out, Capital Burger promises an unforgettable dining experience in the vibrant coastal town of Luquillo.
